The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Sunday at Madison_Square_Garden in New_York . The Bucks showed superior shooting , going 46 percent from the field , while the Knicks went only 41 percent from the floor . Zaza_Pachulia also had a strong showing , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and a team - high of 14 rebounds . Notching a double_double of his own , Giannis_Antetokounmpo recorded 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 3 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds . The 12 rebounds matched a season - high , while it was his second double_double of the season . He went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the free_throw line to score 15 points in 20 minutes . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. led the team as the starting shooting guard , going 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score 17 points , while also adding 4 assists . He finished with 15 points and 7 rebounds in 38 minutes . While he did n't have his best night defensively , Cole_Aldrich scored 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and grabbed 7 rebounds in 20 minutes . The only other Knick to reach double_figures in points was Jason_Smith , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) .
The Grizzlies ( 50 ) used a strong second half to outlast the Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 in Phoenix on Wednesday night . Memphis found itself behind 6 at halftime but outscored Phoenix 30 - 19 in the third quarter and 26 - 20 in the final period . The Grizzlies shot 50 percent from the field , led by strong performances from Courtney_Lee and Mike_Conley . Courtney_Lee scored 22 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 4 - 5 3PT ) , while Mike_Conley led all scorers with 24 ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) and 11 assists . Marc_Gasol added 18 points , 6 assists , and 5 rebounds . It was a quiet night for Goran_Dragic , who scored just 6 points in 26 minutes . The third member of the backcourt trio , Isaiah_Thomas , had 15 points and 2 assists off the bench , while Markieff_Morris added 20 points and 5 rebounds . The Grizzlies out_rebounded Phoenix 37 - 35 and outscored the Suns in the paint 46 - 32 . Memphis also registered 25 assists compared to only 13 - on 32 field goals - for the Suns .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Sunday at the Air_Canada_Centre in Toronto . Despite being out - scored 31 - 25 in the final quarter , the Raptors were able to hold of the Pistons ' late comeback attempt and secure the 4 - point victory in front of their home crowd . While the game may have been close , the Raptors shot the ball much better than the Pistons , going 53 percent from the field compared to just 46 percent from the field for the Pistons . After combining for only 14 points over his last 3 games , DeMar_DeRozan returned to form Sunday , finishing with 25 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 8 - 10 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . He went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the free_throw line to score 20 points , while adding 11 rebounds and 3 blocked shots as well . He 's now recorded a double_double in 3 out of his last 4 games , while also notching 3 blocks in 2 consecutive outings . Amir_Johnson had a solid showing as well , finishing with an efficient 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 2 rebounds . Both Greivis_Vasquez and Louis Lou_Williams reached double_figures in points as well , with 13 and 12 points respectively . With Brandon_Jennings going down for the year , DJ_Augustin stepped up in a big way , going 12 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while adding 8 assists as well . Greg_Monroe had another strong stat line Sunday , recording 21 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 16 rebounds . Andre_Drummond nearly notched a double_double of his own , but came up just shy with 14 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 FT ) and 8 rebounds . The only other Piston to reach double_figures in points was Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope who added 16 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) , 3 rebounds and 2 steals .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Saturday . Even though Milwaukee outperformed them from beyond the arc by a margin of 58 percent to 40 percent , Detroit was able to nail 6 of their first 7 three_point attempts , and 11 of their 19 overall in the first half . Their defense also elicited 21 turnovers from the Bucks , which they were able to convert into 23 points . Reggie_Jackson paced the Pistons ' attack with 22 points , 8 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . Marcus_Morris followed with 20 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists . Milwaukee was led by Khris_Middleton 's 26 points , which he supplemented with 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Jabari_Parker followed with 13 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Miles_Plumlee continued to start at center over Greg_Monroe , and collected 10 points , 6 rebounds , 1 steal and 2 blocks . Greg_Monroe paced the reserves with 10 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , and outpaced Miles_Plumlee in minutes by a margin of 27 - 21 .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 118 - 101 Tuesday at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center . The Bucks ( 8 - 8 ) took advantage of a Cavaliers ( 13 - 3 ) team that looked disinterested from the second quarter on , as Milwaukee managed to open up a 4 - point lead at halftime and won the game with the help of a dominant third quarter , which they won 34 - 20 . Fellow young star Jabari_Parker posted 18 points of his own , while Michael_Beasley had 1 of his best performances of the season off the bench , scoring 17 points . As a team , the Bucks put together 1 of their best shooting nights of the year , as they shot an astounding 54 percent from the floor . LeBron_James led the way with 22 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists , while Kyrie_Irving added 20 points . Kevin_Love was the only other Cavalier to score in double_figures , as he posted a double_double of 13 points and 13 rebounds
The second - seed Cleveland Cavaliers ( 40 ) completed their sweep of the seventh - seed Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) in a 101 - 93 slugfest Sunday . Cleveland came out with purpose in the first half , wining both of the first 2 quarters to go into the break with 57 - 36 lead . LeBron_James played a team - high 46 minutes and was followed closely by Kyrie_Irving with 43 minutes of his own . Kevin_Love was forced from the game in the first quarter with what appeared to be a dislocated left shoulder after Celtics big man Kelly_Olynyk appeared to pull down on Kevin_Love 's arm while fighting for 1 rebound . The Celtics made a run in the third quarter , outscoring the Cavs 25 - 13 in the third window , but it was n't enough
The Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Tuesday at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena in Oklahoma_City . They shot 50 percent from the field , compared to the Bucks who shot only 41 percent from the field . Despite turning the ball over 20 times , the Thunder were also able to out - rebound the Bucks 54 - 31 , giving them enough of an advantage to sneak out the victory at home on Tuesday . Russell_Westbrook had a team - high of 28 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , while also handing out 7 assists . He 's now scored over 20 points in 7 out of the 8 games he 's played this season , recording season averages of 24 points and 7 assists per game . Kevin_Durant on the other hand shot 7 - for - 11 from the field , but only 1 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score 23 points . He went a perfect 8 - for - 8 from the free_throw line and came close to a triple_double with 9 rebounds and 7 assists . Serge_Ibaka had a solid all - around game in the victory as he went a perfect 5 - for - 5 from the field to score 15 points . Reggie_Jackson supplied the Thunder with an effective bench presence as well with 18 points and 7 rebounds . OJ_Mayo was the leading scorer on the other side for the Bucks , as he shot 6 - for - 13 from the field , but only 0 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 18 points . Giannis_Antetokounmpo was also able to reach double_figures with 17 points and 7 rebounds . He did n't shoot all that well from the field ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , but he was able to get to the free_throw line 11 times and converted on 8 of those attempts . Jarryd Jerryd_Bayless had the most production off the bench as he went 3 - for - 6 from the field and 5 - for - 5 from the free_throw line to score 11 points .
Carmelo_Anthony 's season - high 45 points ( on 36 shots ) over 46 minutes led New_York . Brandon_Jennings provided an 18 - point , 11 - assist double_double . Courtney_Lee compiled 17 points and 9 rebounds . Kristaps_Porzingis and Justin_Holiday had 15 points apiece , while Mindaugas_Kuzminskas posted 13 . Kent_Bazemore managed 24 points , while Dennis_Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double_double . Dwight_Howard and Tim Hardaway had 19 apiece , with the former adding 12 rebounds . Mike_Dunleavy ( 12 points ) led the bench .
Reigning MVP Stephen_Curry scored a team - high 29 points and dished out 11 assists . All-Star shooting guard Klay_Thompson scored 21 along with 7 rebounds . As a team , the Warriors shot over 53 percent from the field , made 14 three_pointers , dished out 38 assists , and saw 7 players score in double_digit . Blake_Griffin shot 10 - of - 19 for 31 points and came away with 3 steals . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal_Crawford scored 21 with 5 three_pointers . Despite the loss , Los_Angeles shot 50 percent from the field and hit 10 threes on the night .
The New_York Knicks ( 28 - 40 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 14 - 53 ) 90 - 87 on Sunday . The game was largely a tale of 2 halves , with New_York dominating the first 2 quarters despite missing 2 starters on offense , and jumping out to a 46 - 35 lead by intermission . Carmelo_Anthony led the way for the Knicks with a 26 - point , 12 - rebound double_double , to which he added 4 assists and 1 block . Robin_Lopez contributed 16 points , 8 boards , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Derrick_Williams , getting a spot start in place of the sidelined Kristaps_Porzingis ( illness ) , filled out the stat sheet with 8 points , 9 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Jose_Calderon finished with 9 points , 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Kobe_Bryant spearheaded a pedestrian Lakers attack , tallying 14 points , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Jordan_Clarkson was the only other member of the starting 5 to manage double_digit scoring , recording 12 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . D'Angelo_Russell notably turned in 1 of his worst efforts as a starter , posting only 4 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal over 22 minutes . Lou_Williams paced the reserves after a 5 - game absence , supplying 15 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal .
DeMar_DeRozan and Terrence_Ross combined for a whopping 55 points on 17 - of - 28 shooting , helping lead the Raptors to outstanding 51 and 56 percent success rates from the field and three_point range , respectively . Kyle_Lowry went for 18 points , while DeMarre_Carroll supplied 13 points of his own . Jonas_Valanciunas registered an 11 - point , 12 - rebound double_double . The top - heavy Bucks got their own stellar 30 - point performance from Giannis_Antetokounmpo , while Jabari_Parker followed with 27 points . However , only 1 other Bucks player managed to get into double_digit in the scoring column , and that effort came from the bench in the person of Greg_Monroe ( 11 points ) . Tony_Snell ( 8 points ) , John_Henson ( 7 points ) and Matthew_Dellavedova ( 2 points ) considerably underwhelmed , while Milwaukee particularly struggled from long range , shooting just 17 percent from beyond the arc .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 10 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) 105 - 101 Wednesday at the FedExForum in Memphis . It was n't the cleanest game ever played , with the Timberwolves handing out 23 turnovers and the Grizzlies racking up 17 of their own , but it was still a tight matchup that ended with a close finish . Marc_Gasol finished the game with 32 points ( 12 - 17 FG ) , 9 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals , and 2 blocked shots , getting a little bit of everything on the stat sheet Wednesday . Not far behind was Zach_Randolph , who had 25 points ( 12 - 16 FG ) , 13 rebounds , 1 assist , and 1 block . Mike_Conley also passed the double_digit benchmark and finished with 16 points to go along with 1 rebound , 6 assists , and 1 steal . The other starting guard , Courtney_Lee , shot 5 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from behind the arc to score 14 points in 36 minutes of action . Thaddeus_Young was very efficient in his debut , scoring 26 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and grabbing 4 rebounds , 4 assists , and 2 steals . Mo_Williams matched Thaddeus_Young 's efficiency and added 18 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) of his own . Mo_Williams also contributed 4 assists and 1 steal . 1 overall pick Andrew_Wiggins made his regular season debut but only had 6 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist , and 2 steals , playing just 19 minutes .

The Nets seized control of this game from the very start , opening up a 31 - 14 lead after the first quarter . They also ended the contest on a very strong note , winning the fourth quarter 42 - 18 . Jarrett_Jack ( 14 ) and Thaddeus_Young ( 10 ) were the only other Brooklyn players to score in double_figures , and while he did not reach double_figures scoring , Deron_Williams still put together a solid stat line of 9 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , 9 assists and 7 rebounds in 31 minutes . Bradley_Beal played well in the losing effort , scoring a team - high 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , while Marcin_Gortat recorded a monster double_double of 21 points ( 9 - 11 FG ) and 16 rebounds . Ramon_Sessions filled in for Wall once again , but struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 7 from the field for 2 points to go along with 10 assists and 7 rebounds .

The 20 points were a new season - high for the forward , as he had yet to break double_figures in points during this season . He finished with 17 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) , 7 rebounds and 1 steals , while playing 45 minutes . The Miami Heat ( 30 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) 107 - 102 on Sunday at American_Airlines_Arena in Miami . In a close game between 2 Eastern_Conference playoff hopefuls , the Heat were able to slip away with the victory despite committing 16 turnovers compared to the Raptors ' 10 . Miami had 22 assists as a team , which helped to compensate for the high volume of turnovers . The Raptors were led by All-Star DeMar_DeRozan , who finished with 30 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist , and 4 steals in 41 minutes of action . Kyle_Lowry added 22 points of his own , to go along with 2 rebounds , 3 assists , and 2 turnovers . Center Jonas_Valanciunas neared a double_double with 14 points and 8 rebounds . Filling in for Amir James_Johnson ( ankle ) in the starting lineup , Patrick_Patterson was held scoreless but only played 15 minutes despite drawing the start . The Raptors isntead turned to Tyler_Hansbrough and James_Johnson , who played 24 and 20 minutes , respectively . Greivis_Vasquez came off the bench to score 12 points and fnished with 2 rebounds , 2 assists , and 1 steal . Dwyane_Wade nearly had a triple_double , posting a line of 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds , 7 assists , and 2 blocked shots . Chris_Bosh had 21 points of his own , along with 11 rebounds , 4 assists , and 1 steal . Luol_Deng got the start at small forward and put up 18 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal , and 1 block . Mario_Chalmers came off the bench for 12 points but fouled out in 24 minutes of game time . Shawne_Williams chipped in 16 points while making his third consecutive start at center .
Chris_Paul racked up 1 of the rare monstrous double_double efforts this season after scoring 20 points and adding 20 assists . The Clippers point guard stepped up in the absence of Blake_Griffin ( knee ) and contributed a hand in 60 of the teams 133 points . Chris_Paul added 5 rebounds and 3 steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action . Jamal_Crawford finished with 22 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting , while Marreese_Speights added 17 points on 17 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting .
The Magic had trouble mustering offense on anything resembling a consistent basis Monday and saw Evan_Fournier lead the team with just 14 points . Aaron_Gordon was the only other player to reach double_digit in the scoring column , posting 11 points off the bench . The Pacers posted their best defensive effort of the season , holding the Magic to a season - low 69 points , a 32 field - goal percentage , and a 20 percent tally from three_point range . Paul_George and Monta_Ellis each posted 13 - point efforts , while Thaddeus_Young and Jeff_Teague each supplied 11 points . CJ_Miles led the team with 16 points , which he accomplished off the bench over an efficient 23 minutes .

The veteran tallied 21 points , 6 assists , and 3 rebounds , for his fourth game of 20 points or more in the last 5 contests . Matt_Barnes parlayed his rare starting opportunity into a solid tally of 14 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals over 38 minutes . Jeff_Green acquitted himself well filling in at power forward for the ailing Zach_Randolph ( knee ) , pitching in 19 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks in a tough matchup against Dirk_Nowitzki . Mario_Chalmers led the Memphis reserves with 14 points , while JaMychal_Green made the most of his return to the bench by amassing 13 points over just 17 minutes .

Denver , which jumped out to a 14 - point first quarter lead , extended the advantage to 21 points by halftime and never looked back . Minnesota was able to bring the final margin to a respectable 9 points behind some late baskets , including a 70 run in the final minute . Kenneth_Faried added 15 points and 7 rebounds , and Ty_Lawson had 8 points to go with 12 assists . Jusuf_Nurkic added 14 points and Nate_Robinson finished with 12 points and 6 assists . Minnesota , meanwhile , tumbled to its 12 consecutive defeat despite hitting 10 three_pointers and committing just 12 turnovers . Andrew_Wiggins added 20 points and 7 rebounds , while Shabazz_Muhammad had 19 points in 37 minutes .

The Charlotte Hornets ( 19 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 23 ) 124 - 119 in double overtime on Monday afternoon . Kemba_Walker was outstanding for Charlotte , amassing a career - high and franchise - record 52 points , while Utah 's Gordon_Hayward responded with 36 points of his own . Trey_Burke 's key basket culiminated a 31 - 22 run by Utah in the fourth quarter to erase what had been a 73 - 64 deficit entering the period . Trey_Burke 's memorable afternoon consisted of a season - high 25 points , along with 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Rudy_Gobert put together a second straight impressive double_double , tallying 14 points , hauling in 14 boards , dishing out 3 assists , and recording 1 steal and 2 blocks . Trevor_Booker also made a significant contribution off the bench with 12 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Kemba_Walker almost added a triple_double to his spectacular afternoon , supplementing his eye - popping scoring numbers with 9 rebounds and 8 assists . Marvin_Williams was a distant second to him in scoring , but still turned in a solid effort with 19 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Cody_Zeller managed 14 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , while Nicolas_Batum was 1 rebound short of a double_double with 10 points , 9 boards , 4 assists and 1 steal . Rookie Frank_Kaminsky III paced the Charlotte bench with 17 points , 7 rebounds and 1 block .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 28 - 1 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 8 ) 89 - 83 on Friday . The Warriors shot 41 percent from the field and 28 percent from beyond the arc , with both numbers notably lower than their respective 49 and 42 season figures in those categories . Cleveland fared even worse , draining only 32 percent of their buckets overall , including a paltry 17 percent from long range . The Cavs were led by LeBron_James ' game - high 25 points , which he supplemented with 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 2 blocks . Despite the solid scoring total , the perennial All-Star was 1 of the superstars struggling with his shot , sinking only 10 of his 26 attempts . JR_Smith provided 14 points and did so largely on the strength of 1 of the game 's only solid shooting performances from three_point range ( 4 of 8 ) . Kyrie_Irving continued his journey back from the fractured kneecap he suffered the last time he 'd faced this Warriors squad in the 2015 Finals , playing a season - high 26 minutes and managing 13 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Kevin_Love helped spearhead Cleveland 's outstanding team total of 55 rebounds on the evening by hauling in 18 boards , and pairing them with 10 points in his second straight double_double . Matthew Delladedova paced the Cavaliers ' bench with 10 points over 31 minutes . The 25 - year - old posted his fourth double_double in the last 6 contests with 22 points , 15 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 blocks over 39 minutes . Draymond_Green was 1 of the few players on either team to put together a solid shooting effort , managing a 47 percent success rate from the field , including draining 2 of his 3 attempts from three_point range . The perpetually dependable Klay_Thompson was exemplary once again in his typical supporting role , pitching in with 18 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Shaun_Livingston was highly productive off the bench with a season - high 16 points , leading the Warriors ' reserves .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 12 ) beat the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 36 ) , 101 - 83 . Zach_Randolph recorded 17 points , 14 rebounds and 4 assists in 27 minutes . Recently acquired Jeff_Green scored a team - high 18 points and was joined by Vince_Carter ( 13 points ) in the double_digit scoring brigade . Rookie Jerami_Grant scored a career - high 16 points . Michael_Carter-Williams was the only other Sixer to tabulate double_digit scoring , squeaking by with 10 points , 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 5 turnovers . Larry_Drew_II was the only Sixer to shoot better than 50 percent from the field , compiling 9 points and 4 assists in 20 minutes .
San_Antonio rested Tony_Parker , Manu_Ginobili and Pau_Gasol on the second leg , but still managed to put together a solid offensive performance , shooting 47 percent from the field and an astounding 58 percent from behind the arc . It was backup point guard Patty_Mills who shined off the bench Wednesday , as he shot 9 - of - 12 shooting from the field overall and 5 - of - 6 from behind the arc en route to a team - high 23 points . Kawhi_Leonard managed 21 points , but shot just 5 - of - 16 from the field , while LaMarcus_Aldridge could not get anything going , scoring just 5 points on 2 - of - 9 shooting . Danny_Green was the only other Spur to score in double_figures , notching 11 points . It was yet another offensive struggle for Dallas too , with Wednesday 's 87 points being the seventh time this season where they failed to score 90 points . Harrison_Barnes was the only other starter to reach double_figures with 17 points , while Seth_Curry and Dwight_Powell scoring double_figures off the bench , scoring 14 and 10 points respectively . As a team , the Mavericks shot a lowly 43 percent from the field .
The Houston Rockets ( 50 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 3 - 1 ) 108 - 91 on Tuesday at the American_Airlines_Arena in Miami . The Rockets used a strong fourth quarter to finish off the Heat , outscoring them 25 - 14 to secure the victory . With Terrence_Jones out with a leg injury , Donatas_Motiejunas got the start at power forward but only played 13 minutes due to foul trouble and finished with 2 points . Dwight_Howard had his fourth double_double in 5 games and posted a team - high 25 points and 10 rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Coming only 2 rebound shy of a triple_double , James_Harden also went off and scored 25 points to go along with 10 assists and 9 rebounds . Patrick_Beverley had to sit out the Rockets ' last 2 games with a hamstring injury but was able to return in this one and scored 15 points , going 5 - for - 8 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three_point line . Trevor_Ariza was the fourth Rocket starter in double_digit , as he added 19 points ( 5 - 8 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 5 assists . Chris_Bosh and Dwyane_Wade scored 21 and 19 points a piece to lead the Heat in scoring . Chris_Bosh also had 8 rebounds and is now averaging 25 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Mario_Chalmers came off the bench again but played 29 minutes compared to starter Norris_Cole , who only notched 16 minutes and went scoreless . Mario_Chalmers had 12 points , shooting 4 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from beyond the three_point line . Shawne_Williams continued to start for the Heat , and he finished the game with 14 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and 5 rebounds . Rookie Shabazz_Napier came off the bench as well and had 5 points and 4 assists in 27 minutes .
The host Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday , 116 - 101 . All-Star center DeMarcus_Cousins paved the way for Sacramento ( 6 - 9 ) to earn the easy win , scoring 36 points and pulling down 13 rebounds . DeMarcus_Cousins ' rebounding effort helped the team establish a 46 - 38 rebounding advantage against the normally tough Thunder . Kings guard Darren_Collison added 21 points , but turned the ball over 4 times while dishing 6 assists . DeMarcus_Cousins , Collison , and forward Rudy_Gay each added 3 three_pointers , contributing to the 12 made by the team on the night . For the Thunder ( 8 - 8 ) , things are continuing to get worse after the team started a surprising 5 - 1 to open the season
The Phoenix Suns ( 34 - 32 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 14 - 49 ) 106 - 97 on Wednesday at the US_Airways_Center in Phoenix . The Suns got out to a quick start in this one , grabbing a 25 - 18 lead right away after the first quarter . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three_point line , while the Timberwolves finished at just 44 percent from the floor and a disgraceful 8 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns were led by Markieff_Morris , who finished with a team - high of 24 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 3 rebounds and 2 assists in 37 minutes . Also getting a piece of the action was Eric_Bledsoe , who had a great night shooting the ball to finish with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 9 assists . Rookie TJ_Warren had a breakout performance and scored 17 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) in just 19 minutes . Marcus_Thornton also reached double_figures off the bench , with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) and 4 rebounds in 22 minutes . In a solid performance off the bench , Justin_Hamilton went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score a season - high of 15 points , while also adding 3 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . In 28 minutes , he finished with 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 3 rebounds . Andrew_Wiggins did n't have much of an impact either , as he also had just 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and 4 rebounds .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 2 ) were blown out of the building in their home opener Friday against the Utah Jazz ( 1 - 1 ) , losing 99 - 71 . The Jazz jumped out to a 28 - 19 advantage after the first quarter and kept pouring it on throughout the contest , leading 50 - 33 at the break and outscoring the 76ers in the final 2 quarters as well . Though Utah shot just 41 percent from the field , they ran away with the game by winning the turnover battle by a huge margin , surrendering the ball just 7 times to the Sixers ' 18 giveaways . Rodney_Hood and Alec_Burks led the backcourt with 17 and 15 points , respectively , while Derrick_Favors secured a double_double with 20 points and 12 boards to accompany 3 steals and 2 blocks . The 76ers compounded their turnover problems by shooting even worse than Utah from the field , submitting a 30 percent mark as a team . The chief offender was star center Nerlens_Noel , who accrued just 8 points while going 2 - for - 12 from the field .
Russell_Westbrook turned in a massive line as he notched his 25th triple_double of the season , with 38 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists . Steven_Adams followed up with a double_double consisting of 16 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , and 12 rebounds , in 44 minutes of action . Joffrey_Lauvergne came up big with 16 points on 6 - of - 7 shooting , including 3 - of - 4 from deep , in 29 minutes off the bench , while Anthony_Morrow added 15 points in 19 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Marc_Gasol led the way for the Grizz , with 31 points , along with 8 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block , 42 minutes . Mike_Conley followed up with 18 points , 3 steals , 2 assists and 1 rebound .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 126 - 98 , at Barclays_Center on Thursday evening . They 'd tallied 5 victories in 12 games in March but they were chasing a particularly significant win against the Suns ( 22 - 50 ) . However , they roared back in the second by outscoring Phoenix by a 30 - 18 margin and then took it up a couple of notches in the second half . The Nets outscored their visitors , 74 - 48 , over the third and fourth quarters for 1 of their biggest victories of the season . A whopping 8 players hit double_digit in the scoring column , and Brooklyn played a stellar defensive game overall , limiting the Suns to a 37 percent success rate from the field and 28 percent figure from three_point range while also causing 19 turnovers . Phoenix was led by Devin_Booker , who managed 28 points , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Marquese_Chriss continued his recent stretch of excellent play with 23 points , 11 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Alex_Len followed with an 11 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Tyler_Ulis chipped in with a 10 - point , 12 - assist double_double that also featured 2 steals . Leandro_Barbosa paced the second unit with 11 points , 6 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Brook_Lopez led the way for the Nets with 19 points , 6 rebounds and 1 block . KJ_McDaniels followed with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Trevor_Booker managed 14 points , 8 boards and 1 assist . Jeremy_Lin tallied 13 points , 5 assists and 3 rebounds . Archie_Goodwin and Quincy_Acy contributed matching 12 - point efforts as reserves . Isaiah_Whitehead compiled 11 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 block over 28 minutes . Justin_Hamilton supplied 10 points and 0 rebound . Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson mustered a modest 5 points but hauled in 16 boards , dished out 2 assists , recorded 2 steals and posted 1 block .
For Phoenix , Devin_Booker led the team with 33 points and shot 11 - of - 24 from the field . Eric_Bledsoe , meanwhile , had 20 points , 6 rebounds , and 4 assists . As a team , Phoenix shot only 41 percent , but made 12 three_pointers and was a solid 29 - of - 35 from the free_throw line . DeMarcus_Cousins led the team with 22 points , 11 rebounds , and 12 assists . Three Kings guards added at least 18 points as well , with sixth man Ty_Lawson coming off the bench for 18 . The Kings shot a stellar 45 percent from the field , but held a significant disadvantage at the free_throw line .
The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Monday at the Staples_Center in Los_Angeles . Despite the double_digit victory , Chicago trailed Los_Angeles 50 - 48 going into halftime . As the game transitioned to the second half , Chicago 's offense heated up as they shot an outstanding 59 percent until the end of the game , while Los_Angeles only shot 44 percent . The Chicago Bulls had all 5 starters score in double_digit , with Jimmy_Butler leading the way scoring 22 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) , while also contributing 6 rebounds and a game - high 8 assists . While he only had 11 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) , Joakim_Noah was able to make a tremendous impact as he had a season - high 16 rebounds and 6 assists . Coming off the bench , rookie forward Nikola_Mirotic had an extremely solid performance , as he had 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , while also grabbing 7 rebounds . The Los_Angeles Clippers were lead by potential MVP candidate Blake_Griffin , who had a 19 point ( 7 - 15 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebound double_double performance . While Blake_Griffin was the better all - around player , Clippers sixth man Jamal_Crawford lead the entire team with 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 3 - 5 FT ) , while also dishing out 5 assists . The NBA 's leading rebounder , DeAndre_Jordan , continued to clean up the glass , as he collected 17 rebounds , while also adding 10 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 103 , at Barclays_Center on Monday night . The Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) came in to Monday 's contest a bit short - handed , as Tony_Allen was given the night off to rest his 35 - year - old body . That transpired once again Monday , as Brooklyn shot a very respectable 46 percent from the field and committed a relatively modest 12 turnovers , significantly less than their average . However , Mike_Conley took the reins of the Grizzlies offense with a 32 - point , 6 - assist , 1 - rebound , 1 - steal performance over 37 minutes , while also making a game - high 11 visits to the free_throw line . Five players hit double_digit in the scoring column for the visitors , and they shot 51 percent from the field overall . Marc_Gasol checked in second with a near double_double of 19 points , 9 rebounds , 8 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Brandan_Wright stepped in with a season - high 17 points that paced the bench , a total he supplemented with 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal over 21 minutes . Vince_Carter supplied 14 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals as a reserve . JaMychal_Green totaled 10 points and 6 boards . Trevor_Booker matched Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson 's scoring total and added 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Bojan_Bogdanovic submitted 11 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .

The Heat posted a 52 percent success rate from the field , with 4 members of the first unit managing double_digit in the scoring column . Hassan_Whiteside and Dion_Waiters led the way for the Heat with matching 23 - point efforts . Eric_Gordon matched Clint_Capela 's point total and added 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal in 32 minutes off the bench . Patrick_Beverley and Trevor_Ariza notably combined for just 12 points , with the former exiting after just 13 minutes with a strained left groin muscle .
The Pelicans got their first win since the DeMarcus_Cousins trade in this 23 - point victory , but it happened to come with him being suspended for this fixture . Detroit killed themselves shooting , as they shot 39 percent from the field , 18 percent from the free_throw line and 13 percent from three_point range . The Denver Nuggets ( 19 - 27 ) defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 22 ) 93 - 85 on Wednesday at the Smoothie_King_Center in New_Orleans . The Nuggets shot much better than the Pelicans in this game , going 46 percent from the field and an impressive 59 percent from the three_point line , while the Pelicans shot 39 percent from the floor and just 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans out_rebounded the Nuggets 48 - 39 , but it was n't enough to overcome a poor overall shooting performance , as they dropped a tough loss at home . Arron_Afflalo got hot from the floor for the Nuggets , going 7 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 20 points . Jusuf_Nurkic came just shy of a double_double , finishing with 15 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . He has n't been doing much scoring for the Nuggets so far this season , as he 's averaging only 7 points per game on the year , so the 15 points were a nice surprise . In 32 minutes , Kenneth_Faried reached double_figures as well , scoring 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) , while also adding 7 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 blocked shot . It marked his second straight night with 14 points , pushing his season average to 12 points per game . Ty_Lawson really struggled offensively , scoring only 5 points ( 2 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , but also recorded 13 assists , as he found his teammates at a high rate . Tyreke_Evans posted 25 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 1 steal , while Anthony_Davis recorded 24 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . Anthony_Davis has recorded 4 double_doubles in a row , averaging 26 points and 10 rebounds over that span of games . Eric_Gordon had 11 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 6 assists , while Ryan_Anderson posted 11 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and 7 rebounds .
Reigning MVP Stephen_Curry went 0 - for - 10 from beyond the arc , failing to hit a three_pointer for the first time in 157 games . As the NBA record fell , Stephen_Curry 's backcourt partner Klay_Thompson saw struggles of his own , going just 2 - of - 10 from downtown . Los_Angeles forward Julius_Randle pulled down a season - high 14 boards , helping to give the Lakers a 51 - 40 rebounding advantage . Sophomore Larry_Nance_Jr. also provided a force in the paint , contributing 9 rebounds and 12 points on perfect shooting .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 133 - 102 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday evening . The Suns ( 17 - 38 ) have been 1 of the most porous defenses in the NBA throughout the entire season , while the Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) , as customary , have been 1 of the most prolific scoring squads . Both of those patterns held true Saturday , as Houston compiled a whopping 77 points in the first half on their way to a blowout home win . James_Harden led all scorers with 40 points , which he supplemented with 8 assists and 6 rebounds . With Eric_Bledsoe sitting out for rest , Phoenix could n't come close to keeping pace , and shot just 39 percent overall , which largely negated the 21 turnovers they elicited from the Rockets . Devin_Booker led the way for the visitors with 18 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal . TJ_Warren followed with 14 points , 5 boards and 3 steals . Alex_Len drew the start and managed 13 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . The second unit featured a trio of double_digit scoring efforts led by Tyler_Ulis , who posted 13 points , 6 assists , 1 rebounds and 1 steal . Jared_Dudley and Leandro_Barbosa followed with matching 12 - point efforts , with the former adding 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , and the latter hauling in 3 boards . Marquese_Chriss chipped in with 7 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . Patrick_Beverley was a distant second behind James_Harden with 19 points , 9 boards , 5 assists and 2 steals . Ryan_Anderson generated 16 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Trevor_Ariza and Clint_Capela provided a pair of 9 - point tallies , with the former also collecting 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals , and the latter hauling in 5 boards , dishing out a pair of dimes and recording 1 block .

D’Angelo D'Angelo_Russell put forth 1 of his best campaigns during his rookie season and finished with 21 points ( 8 - of - 12 FG , 1 - of - 2 3PT , 4 - of - 5 FT ) , 3 rebounds and 2 assists coming off the bench . Lou_Williams and Jordan_Clarkson combined for 26 point , while Julius_Randle added 11 points and 9 rebounds . CJ_McCollum added 28 points on 50 percent shooting and the combo guards were simply too much to handle , as it helped the Trail_Blazers successfully outrun their opponents , both in transition and in the half court offense . Portland dominated the glass and won the rebounding battle 42 - 30 , led by a balanced mix of starters and bench players . Mason_Plumlee totaled 13 points and 8 rebounds , Noah Venloe added 11 points and 7 rebounds and Ed_Davis contributed 8 boards off the bench .

The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 107 - 103 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday . The Knicks ( 7 - 7 ) continued their solid efforts at home with the hard - fought victory , which came on the strength of Kristaps_Porzingis ' 31 points , 9 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . The second - year big man 's contributions were particularly valuable on a night where Carmelo_Anthony was held to 7 - of - 22 shooting and 17 points overall by Maurice_Harkless . Despite his relatively modest scoring output , the rest of the team , particularly the second unit , managed to pick up the slack , and New_York shot 47 percent from the field overall . The Trail_Blazers ( 8 - 8 ) were led by Damian_Lillard 's 22 points , which he supplemented with 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals . Backcourt mate CJ_McCollum followed with a full stat line of 16 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Maurice_Harkless complemented his strong defensive work against Carmelo_Anthony by contributing 15 points , 8 boards , 1 steal and 1 block . Ed_Davis turned in a solid start at power forward , posting a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 2 blocks . Evan_Turner paced the reserves with 11 points . Carmelo_Anthony supplemented his scoring total with 6 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Mindaugus Mindaugas_Kuzminskas paced the second unit 's night with 10 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
The second half is when New_York really turned it on , as they scored 61 points and committed just 1 turnover . The assist - to - turnover margin was a huge factor , as the Bulls committed 12 turnovers with 15 assists , while the Knicks committed just 5 turnovers to their 32 assists . The 27 points from Kristaps_Porzingis marks a season - high and this is the first time all season that all 5 starters scored in double_figures . The 35 points and 5 three_pointers are a season - high for Dwyane_Wade as well , as those 5 threes nearly matches his season total from last season

He also hauled in 8 rebounds , dished out 6 assists , and tallied 1 block and 1 steal . He did add 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block .

Joey_Dorsey stepped in for Howard at the starting center position , but played just 13 minutes and failed to score . Rajon_Rondo is averaging 9 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists in January for Dallas , who has now lost 4 - straight games .

But the Hornets chipped away and were able to pull into halftime with a 2 - point lead . The Hornets led for much of the second half but the game remained close throughout , as Charlotte never held a lead larger than 8 points . Kemba_Walker ( 7 - 18 FG , 4 - 9 3PT ) and Al_Jefferson ( 10 - 16 FG ) led the Hornets with 21 points apiece . Kemba_Walker added 7 assists and rebounds each , and Al_Jefferson grabbed 10 rebounds for his second double_double in his past 4 games despite his continued minutes restriction . Nicolas_Batum scored 19 ( 7 - 19 FG ) and added 7 assists . The Hornets caught fire from three_point land , as they drilled 13 of 26 attempts ( 50 percent ) . Luol_Deng 's 22 points for the Heat led all scorers , as he shot 7 - 13 from the floor and knocked down a pair of three_pointers . Josh_Richardson scored 18 points , the second - highest outcome of his rookie year , on a brilliant 7 - 9 shooting night ( 3 - 4 3PT ) . Hassan_Whiteside scored 17 points and 7 rebounds to round out a solid bench effort from the Heat . They shot a brilliant 53 percent from the floor , but committed 15 turnovers , 7 more than Charlotte , and their sloppiness cost them .
The Clippers ( 49 - 25 ) defeated the Celtics ( 32 - 41 ) 119 - 106 at TD_Garden on Sunday . That was the story all night long , as JJ_Redick finished with a team - high 27 points , going 5 - for - 6 from beyond the arc in 33 minutes . The Clippers went to the line almost twice as much as the Celtics , attempting 40 free_throws compared to Boston 's 23 . The Clippers ' Blake_Griffin and Chris_Paul each had 21 points . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Houston Rockets , 128 - 112 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday . The Pelicans came out early , as they took a 36 - 23 leas after the first quarter and never relinquished the lead from there . Shooting was key , as the Pelicans hit 53 percent of their shots , while holding the Rockets to just 41 percent from the field . They also dominated the assist margin , winning that , 29 - 18 . The Pelicans ( 28 - 41 ) are now 20 without DeMarcus_Cousins since acquiring him , as he missed this game with rib and knee issues . Solomon_Hill was the star , as he accumulated 30 points , 6 rebounds , 7 assists and 3 steals in this win . Anthony_Davis finished with 24 points , 15 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steals . Jrue_Holiday collected 19 points , 4 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 blocks . Tim_Frazier was a nice spark off the bench , providing 14 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists . Lou_Williams led the bench with 14 points and Eric_Gordon dropped 12 points .
The Chicago Bulls ( 32 - 20 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 16 - 38 ) 98 - 97 on Sunday at the Amway_Center in Orlando . Jimmy_Butler was all over the place , recording a team - high of 27 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 5 assists and an impressive 6 steals . He 's played extremely well of late , averaging 24 points , 4 steals and 5 assists over his last 3 games . Pau_Gasol , on the other hand , posted 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 15 rebounds in 37 minutes . It was his twelfth double_double in a row , pushing his season averages to 18 points and 12 rebounds per game . He finished with 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 5 - 4 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 1 steals . Derrick_Rose notched a double_double with 10 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 assists . Victor_Oladipo finished with a team - high of 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also adding 6 assists and 2 steals . He 's now averaging 17 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists on the year . Tobias_Harris nearly recorded a double_double , posting 15 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 3 steals . He 's had a nice 3 - game stretch where he 's averaged 24 points and 8 rebounds per game . The ever so consistent Nikola_Vucevic had somewhat of a down game , totaling 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 7 rebounds in 32 minutes . Coming off the bench , Evan_Fournier was very efficient with his time and posted 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , 3 rebounds and 3 assists in only 18 minutes .
The dynamic backcourt duo of Kemba_Walker and Nicolas_Batum led the way for the Hornets with matching 20 - point efforts , with the latter adding 11 rebounds , 10 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Cody_Zeller went for 13 points , while Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist had a near double_double with 12 points and 9 boards , along with 4 blocks . Frank_Kaminsky III 's 13 points paced the bench . The Hornets struggled from three_point range with just a 28 percent success rate , but also recorded 13 blocks on the night . Jimmy_Butler 's 26 points paced the Bulls , and Dwyane_Wade registered 12 points . Taj_Gibson supplied 10 points , while Rajon_Rondo went for 7 points , 10 assists , 9 rebounds and 2 steals . Doug_McDermott 's 15 points and Nikola_Mirotic 's 11 - point , 10 - rebound double in 19 minutes were the top bench contributions .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 32 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 58 ) Tuesday night at Philips_Arena , 103 - 90 . Phoenix exploded to a 10 - point lead with a 38 - point first quarter and entered halftime with a 12 - point lead . But the Suns offense could n't maintain the pace , as they could n't reach 20 points in any of the final 3 quarters . Atlanta opened the fourth quarter on a 12 - 2 run to turn a 73 - 70 deficit into an 82 - 75 lead , and they would n't give it up . Jeff_Teague 's 20 points led the Hawks as he knocked down 3 of his 7 three_point attempts . The Hawks got double_doubles from Paul_Millsap ( 13 points , 17 rebounds , 8 assists ) and Al_Horford ( 16 points , 10 rebounds ) . Kent_Bazemore nearly added a third , as he poured in 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , grabbed 9 rebounds , dished 5 assists and swiped 5 steals . Atlanta shot just 41 percent from the floor , but they were active both on the offensive glass ( 13 offensive rebounds ) and in the passing lanes ( 16 steals ) , and that allowed them to nab the win despite lacking their shooting touch . Devin_Booker made the Suns offense go , as he scored a game - high 34 points on a ludicrously efficient 12 - 25 shooting night , including 4 - 9 from deep . Devin_Booker added 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals and turned the ball over just twice despite using over 30 possessions . He got little help , though , as Ronnie_Price was Phoenix 's second leading scorer with 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) . Ronnie_Price committed 7 turnovers , however , and the Suns were sloppy all night , as Phoenix committed 24 turnovers and managed just 19 assists .
Karl-Anthony_Towns went off for 37 points on 15 - of - 27 shooting , to go along with 13 rebounds and 4 blocks , to lead the way for the young Timberwolves . Andrew_Wiggins followed up with 23 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds , while Zach_LaVine added 20 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Shabazz_Muhammad came up big with 18 points off the bench to give the T-Wolves an added boost . Meanwhile , Brook_Lopez was the Nets ' only truly effective player , as he poured in a team - high 25 points , to go along with 7 rebounds and 2 blocks , in 30 minutes
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets , 121 - 94 , to take a 3 - 1 lead in their Western_Conference first - round playoff series Sunday at Toyota_Center . The Warriors , who won Game 2 without Stephen_Curry , dominated the second half , as they won the third quarter 41 - 20 and were able to coast home in the final period . Even before the injury , Stephen_Curry struggled in his 18 first half imnutes , as he scored just 6 points on 2 - 9 shooting ( 1 - 7 3PT ) . Klay_Thompson shouldered the load for the Warriors with Stephen_Curry out , as he led all scorers with 23 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 7 - 11 3PT ) . Andre_Iguodala excelled in 24 minutes off the bench as well , with 22 points on a brilliant 9 - 11 shooting effort ( 3 - 4 3PT ) . Even without Stephen_Curry , the Warriors ' offense was cooking , as they shot over 50 percent from the field and from three_point land ( 21 - 40 ) , and they recorded a brilliant 38 assists against just 16 turnovers . Dwight_Howard led the Rockets with 19 points and added 15 rebounds , and James_Harden posted his own double - doubble with 18 points and 10 assists to go with 7 rebounds and 7 steals . Michael_Beasley added 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) in just 19 minutes off the bench . With the Rockets ' offense stagnating , the Warriors had no problem clamping down on the three_point line , as Houston shot just 5 - 27 ( 19 percent ) from deep .

Cavs Star LeBron_James had a similarly dominant game , tallying 29 points , 6 rebounds , and 4 assists . The All-Star missed the 2014 - 15 season with a fractured leg , but has n't skipped a beat in his return , averaging 23 points , 9 rebounds , and 4 assists per game through 7 games so far this season .

The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Miami Heat , 98 - 86 , at Staples_Center on Sunday . A Clippers blowout appeared to be the likely result with the recent form of these teams and that was just the case in this easy 12 - point win . Miami was able to grab 2 early leads , but the Clippers held a double_digit lead for the final 30 minutes to keep things at ease . The second quarter was the difference in the game , with Los_Angeles winning that quarter , 32 - 20 . Defense was key for Los_Angeles as well , as they held Miami to 37 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 15 turnovers . The Clippers , on the other hand , committed just 11 turnovers and recorded 27 assists to the Heat 's 14 . However , 1 plus is the fact that Hassan_Whiteside ( eye ) returned for this game , as he totaled 15 points and 13 rebounds in 31 minutes of action . Goran_Dragic led the team with 24 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists , despite committing 5 turnovers . Tyler and James_Johnson each scored in double_figures off the bench , combining for 24 points , 13 rebounds and 3 assists . Chris_Paul was the player of the game in this win , collecting 19 points , 6 rebounds , and 18 assists on 7 - of - 11 shooting . DeAndre_Jordan only scored 7 points , but snatched down 18 rebounds . JJ_Redick had his best game in weeks , scoring 25 points and grabbing 7 rebounds on 9 - of - 19 from the field . Marreese_Speights led the bench , dropping 19 points before fouling out .

The Detroit Pistons earned an Eastern_Conference road win Monday at Barclays_Center as they defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 105 - 100 . The Pistons took a 10 - point lead in the third quarter and looked poised to run away with it , but the Nets bench led by Andrea_Bargnani put the Nets back on top early in the fourth quarter . It remained tight throughout the fourth quarter , as neither team managed more than a 5 - point lead at any point in the period , but Detroit 's 1 - 2 punch of Andre_Drummond and Reggie_Jackson proved to be too tough for the Nets . Andre_Drummond finished with his third double_double in his past 4 games as he scored a team - high 21 points and grabbed a game - high 18 rebounds , including 7 on the offensive end . Jacksom scored 19 and dished out 6 assists , and Ersan_Ilyasova and Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope scored 16 apiece . The Pistons shot poorly ( 43 percent ) but used a ridiculous 19 offensive rebounds to keep their offense from going stagnant . Brook_Lopez was ultra - efficient , as he scored a game - high 27 points on 13 - 19 shooting and grabbed 5 rebounds . Andrea_Bargnani scored 18 off the bench on 7 - 12 shooting , but Wayne_Ellington ( 4 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) was the only other Nets player to reach double_digit with 11 . The Nets shot 49 percent from the floor , well above the Pistons ' mark , but thanks to their work on the glass , Detroit took 16 more field goals ( 98 ) than Brooklyn ( 82 ) , and that proved to be the difference in the game .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 15 - 2 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 9 - 8 ) 97 - 85 on Sunday at Sleep_Train_Arena in Sacramento . They were able to out - score them 58 - 42 , allowing them to coast to their fifth straight victory . The Kings were able to secure the rebounding advantage with 42 compared to the 35 of Memphis , but were forced into 23 turnovers , making it tough to get any sort of momentum in this one . The Grizzlies were led by Zach_Randolph , who shot 8 - for - 16 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the free_throw line to score 22 points , while also grabbing 12 rebounds . Marc_Gasol also had a big game , as he finished with 18 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Courtney_Lee and Mike_Conley were the other 2 to reach double_figures in scoring , as they finished with 11 and 10 points apiece . He shot 7 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three_point line to score 20 points , while grabbing 3 rebounds . He was able to score 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) in 41 minutes , bringing his season average up to 11 points per game . He recorded 35 minutes , after averaging only 14 minutes throughout the beginning of the season
The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 51 - 26 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 28 - 49 ) , 107 - 92 . Coach Doc Austin_Rivers didn’t remove his starters until the 3 - minute mark of the fourth quarter . Defensive_Player_of_the_Year candidate DeAndre_Jordan finished with 14 points , 22 rebounds , 3 blocks and 2 assists in 34 minutes . However , his 3 - of - 6 shooting dropped his yearly average to 70 percent from the field . Matt_Barnes converted 2 - of - 10 three_pointers and JJ_Redick was slightly better at 4 - of - 10 from distance . Chris_Paul , aspiring Most_Valuable_Player , contributed 23 points , 9 assists , 5 rebounds , 2 steals , 4 three_pointers and just 1 turnover . JJ_Hickson started in Gallinari 's absence , tallying 7 points and 6 rebounds in 24 minutes . Erick_Green replaced Jameer_Nelson in the second half starting lineup and scored 11 points . Wilson_Chandler scored a team - high 17 points on 15 shots in 34 minutes and Randy_Foye registered the team 's only block . Neophytes Jusuf_Nurkic and Will_Barton each shot 3 - of - 9 from the field and combined for 19 points . Kenneth_Faried recorded 3 assists for the first time since March 1st , supplemented by 10 points and 14 rebounds in 34 minutes .
Denver took advantage down low , as they outscored the Knicks , 68 - 52 in the paint and outrebounded them , 44 - 33 . Nikola_Jokic was the player of the game , as he scored a career - high 40 points on 17 - of - 23 from the field . He also added 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals to his line . Wilson_Chandler collected 19 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists , while Jameer_Nelson provided 16 points and 12 assists . Will_Barton recorded a double_double off the bench , totaling 15 points and 10 rebounds . Carmelo_Anthony did everything he could against his former team , as he accumulated 33 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists on 13 - of - 20 shooting . Kyle_O'Quinn was a huge spark off the bench , as he amassed 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 blocks .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 121 - 117 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday . Denver were able to hold on though , despite missing their last 4 free_throws . The Bucks ( 21 - 28 ) put in a valiant effort to pull out a comeback win , but fell just shy to mark their 10th loss in 11 games . Jabari_Parker was Milwaukee 's best player , as he accrued 27 points , 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . Giannis_Antetokounmpo was n't far behind , collecting 23 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 109 - 87 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday . In fact , they held Dallas to 41 percent from the field and 32 percent from three_point range . Ball movement was a huge factor for the Rockets as well , recording 31 assists on 37 made baskets . Houston shot 50 percent from the field and 51 percent from three_point range . Wesley_Matthews continues to revive his career though , as he led the team with 26 points , 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Harrison_Barnes was second on the team , with 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Dwight_Powell had a nice game off the bench , accruing 8 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals on a perfect 4 - of - 4 shooting . Houston ( 17 - 7 ) was expected to win this game fairly easily and they did just that by never trailing after the first 5 minutes . James_Harden was once again the catalyst , as he tallied 18 points , 9 rebounds and 17 assists , despite taking just 12 shots and making just 4 of them . Trevor_Ariza provided 17 points and 7 rebounds on 6 - of - 11 shooting . Clint_Capela recorded another double_double , totaling 13 points and 10 boards . Eric_Gordon was once again productive off the bench , scoring 18 points and handing out 3 assists .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 93 - 91 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Tuesday . The battle of 2 teams with unsightly records and questionable defenses turned out to surprisingly be a low - scoring affair , and saw the Sixers ( 9 - 24 ) jump out to an impressive 29 - 16 lead after 1 quarter . However the Timberwolves ( 11 - 24 ) battled back during the middle portion of the game , outscoring their hosts by a 52 - 50 margin over the second and third periods . The Timberwolves were led by Zach_LaVine , who went for 28 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steals and 1 block . Karl-Anthony_Towns produced a 23 - point , 16 - rebound double_double that also included 5 assists and 2 blocks . Gorgui_Dieng was effective down low as well , posting 10 points , 8 boards , 2 assists , 1 steal and 2 blocks . Andrew_Wiggins endured a nightmarish shooting performance , going just 2 - of - 15 from the field , which helped lead an 8 - point performance . Ricky_Rubio produced 5 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals , with 1 of his 2 made baskets from the floor being the aforementioned clutch three_pointer . Shabazz_Muhammad led the bench with 10 points , 5 rebounds and 1 steal . The Sixers were paced by Joel_Embiid 's 25 points , which he complemented with 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Ersan_Ilyasova supplied 19 points , 5 boards , 1 assist and 1 block . Robert_Covington generated a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also featured 2 assists , 4 steals and 1 block . Nerlens_Noel and Dario_Saric led the second unit with a pair of 8 - point tallies , with the latter also contributing 7 boards and the game - winning assist .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 111 - 104 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday afternoon . A matchup against the defensively - challenged Brooklyn Nets proved to be what the doctor ordered , as Dallas shot 54 percent from the field and used a 57 - 43 halftime lead as the foundation for the road victory . Dirk_Nowitzki and JJ_Barea 's 20 - point efforts from the starting 5 and bench , respectively , led the way , and modest but balanced efforts across the rest of the rotation helped the Mavs hold off the feisty Nets ( 13 - 56 ) . Dirk_Nowitzki contributed a near double_double of 23 points and 9 rebounds . Harrison_Barnes tallied 19 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists . Wesley_Matthews supplied 15 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Yogi_Ferrell registered 8 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 block . Devin_Harris was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points , 2 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Brook_Lopez paced Brooklyn with a game - high 27 points , which he supplemented with 7 boards . Spencer_Dinwiddie followed with 18 points , 7 dimes , 2 rebounds and 1 steal while leading the bench . Randy_Foye registered 11 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Quincy_Acy matched Randy_Foye 's point total and added 3 rebounds . Isaiah_Whitehead poured in 10 points and added 2 boards and 2 assists . Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson mustered a modest 6 points but also hauled in 9 rebounds and recorded 1 block .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Atlanta Hawks 135 - 130 , at Philips_Arena on Friday evening . The Cavs knocked down an NBA record 25 three_pointers on their way to victory , but came very close to letting it slip away , as the Hawks battled back from a 25 - point deficit , to bring it to a 1 - point game with 1:31 left . The Cavs ( 42 - 18 ) shot a blistering 54 percent from deep , as they hit 25 - of - 46 of their three_point attempts . Kyrie_Irving finished with a game - high 43 points , while LeBron_James filled the stat sheet with 38 points , 13 rebounds and 8 assists . Channing_Frye and Richard_Jefferson were the only other players to score in double_digit for Cleveland , finishing with 11 points each . Meanwhile , the Hawks ( 34 - 27 ) mounted an amazing rally to trim a 25 - point deficit with 7 minutes left in the third quarter , to a 1 - point margin with 1:31 left in the game . Paul_Millsap hit a couple clutch shots late in the fourth to bring the Hawks as close as they would come , and finished the game with 27 points and 9 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. was the high - point man for Atlanta , finishing with 36 points in 35 minutes off the bench .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 27 - 1 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 12 - 15 ) 103 - 85 on Wednesday . Stephen_Curry finished well below his league leading 32 points per game and struggled with the long ball , as he scored 16 points , alongside 9 assists and 5 rebounds on 5 - of - 14 shooting ( 2 - of - 8 from three_point territory ) . Draymond_Green is starting to gain more attention for his status in the league , and the power forward only added to his impressive 2015 - 2016 campaign with 15 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks in 38 minutes . Andrew_Bogut turned in a strong performance , as the big man finished with 10 points , 13 rebounds and 4 assists in 27 minutes . Utah shot 41 percent from the floor as a unit , which was not enough to keep the game within single digit striking distance . Four Jazz players finished in double_figures , led by Derrick_Favors ' 17 points and 9 rebounds . Gordon_Hayward proved to be the achilles heal in the loss , shooting 2 - of - 15 and posting a plus - minus of - 20 . The San_Antonio Spurs ( 48 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 24 - 32 ) 108 - 92 at Sleep_Train_Arena on Wednesday . Tony_Parker 's 23 points were good enough to lead all scorers in the contest , and his impressive shot selection made his 11 - of - 17 shooting from the field look easy . Tony_Parker added 6 assists and 3 rebounds to his all around strong performance , 1 that flashed his brilliant basketball IQ , especially when finding Danny_Green around the perimeter or Kawhi_Leonard in transition . Unsurprisingly , the Spurs shared the ball in selfless fashion , as marked by their team 's total of 26 assists . Kawhi_Leonard was originally listed as questionable with a calf injury entering Wednesday morning , but still started and logged 28 minutes of game time , as he contributed 18 points , 1 assist and 7 rebounds in the well rounded performance . The Spurs shot 52 percent from the field as a unit , and had no trouble handling DeMarcus_Cousins during the first half , specifically the second quarter , where they held the Kings to only 14 points and entered the half with a double_figures lead . DeMarcus_Cousins failed to register a basket in his first 10 attempts , and if not for Rajon_Rondo 's supreme passing ability , the double_figures lead that the Spurs entered the half with could have been much worse . DeMarcus_Cousins stormed out in the third quarter , leading his unit to outscore the Spurs by 5 points in the third quarter alone , but it was not enough for a comeback to be kept within striking distance

The Jazz actually shot 55 percent from the field , but took just 71 shots in total . The Heat shot 42 percent on 82 attempts and the teams combined for just 35 free_throws . In fact , they held Miami to just 54 points in the final 3 quarters and outscored them by 25 points . The Golden_State Warriors ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 3 ) 98 - 78 on Wednesday at Oracle_Arena in Oakland . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in the first quarter , at 1 point leading by double_digit . The Warriors came back late in the first though and ended with a 1 - point lead going into the second quarter . The Warriors then out - scored the Grizzlies 23 - 16 in the second quarter and never let off the gas pedal to finish with a 20 - point win in front of their home crowd . The Warriors finished the game shooting 47 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three_point line , while the Grizzlies finished at 40 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . Stephen_Curry finished with 18 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 6 - 13 3PT ) , 7 rebounds , 5 assists and 6 steals over 33 minutes . Stephen_Curry hit 6 three_pointers for 15 points in the first half alone , but did n't have to do much in the second half considering the Warriors ' extensive lead . Defensively , the 6 steals marked a career playoff - high for Stephen_Curry as well . Harrison_Barnes finished with 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 3 - 5 FT ) and 3 rebounds over 33 minutes , while Andre_Iguodala added an efficient 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) and 3 assists over 25 minutes off the bench . Marc_Gasol recorded 18 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 6 assists , but he did n't receive enough help from the rest of his team . The double_double was his third straight , increasing his series averages to 19 points and 10 rebounds per game . It turned out to be the exact opposite though , as he hit just 1 shot the rest of the game and finished with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds over 34 minutes . Zach_Randolph had put up at least 15 shot attempts in 7 of the first 8 games of the postseason , but he 's now gone 2 straight outings with 12 attempts or less . Mike_Conley posted 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and 5 assists , while Jeff_Green recorded 10 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) and 4 rebounds .

As a team , the Pelicans shot 59 percent from the field , 60 percent from 3 , and 81 percent from the free_throw line . Giannis_Antetokounmpo scored a career - high 29 points for Milwaukee on 11 - 16 shooting to go along with 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals , and 3 blocks in 37 minutes . Michael_Carter-Elliot_Williams also played his best game as a member of the Bucks , recording 25 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting and 7 assists in 32 minutes . Khris_Middleton scored 17 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in a team - high 40 minutes . As a team , Milwaukee shot 52 percent from the field in the losing effort , and the loss leaves them in sixth place in the Eastern_Conference .
The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 7 - 4 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 6 - 6 ) 110 - 93 on Thursday . Chris_Paul led the way with a double_double of 26 points and 12 assists in 33 minutes m Thusday . Shabazz_Napier enjoyed a career night , putting up 17 points , 5 rebounds , and 3 assists in 32 minutes off the bench .
The Boston Celtics ( 41 - 30 ) earned a home win against the Orlando Magic ( 29 - 41 ) Monday night at TD_Garden , 107 - 96 . Five Celtics finished in double_figures and 3 went over 20 points as the Celtics offense largely had its way with the Orlando defense . Boston shot a robust 33 - 63 ( 52 percent ) from inside the arc and shot 20 - 24 from the free_throw line , good for a 7 - point free_throw advantage over the Magic . Isaiah_Thomas 's 28 points led all scorers , and he added 7 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal . Avery_Bradley scored 22 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) and added 9 rebounds , and Kelly_Olynyk scored 22 of his own in just 21 minutes off the bench behind a hugely efficient shooting night ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) . Boston shot just 7 - 22 ( 32 percent ) from the three_point line but was sharp enough in the rest of their offensive game to overcome the poor outside shooting . Victor_Oladipo 's 25 points led the Magic . Evan_Fournier , Aaron gordon and Andrew_Nicholson were the only other Magic players to top double_digit , as they scored 13 points apiece . Orlando shot just 42 percent from the floor and a brutal 5 - 18 ( 28 percent ) from three_point land , as they never were able to generate the offense to compete in this one .
The Houston Rockets ( 11 - 3 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 4 - 11 ) 91 - 86 on Monday at the Toyota_Center in Houston . With Carmelo_Anthony leaving the game in the second quarter due to back spasms , the Knicks were unable to make a comeback after being down 51 - 46 at halftime . He shot a ridiculous 11 - for - 22 from the field and 7 - for - 12 from the three_point line to finish with a season - high of 36 points , while also adding 5 rebounds and 6 assists . With Terrence_Jones out for at least another 3 or 4 weeks , Donatas_Motiejunas continued to take his place and scored 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , while grabbing 8 rebounds . He seemed to struggle with his shot though , as he went only 3 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three_point line . Despite playing only 18 minutes , Carmelo_Anthony led the team in points with 14 . Jose_Calderon led all other starters with 9 points and 5 assists . He shot 3 - for - 7 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three_point line in only his second game of the season since returning from injury . The Knicks did receive 49 points from the bench in this matchup , though spread out between many players . Travis_Wear led all bench scorers with 9 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) in 17 minutes . Amar'e_Stoudemire , Shane_Larkin , JR_Smith and Pablo_Prigioni all had 8 points off the bench as well .

The Utah Jazz defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 109 - 95 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Friday . The Jazz ended up shooting 50 percent from the field , while holding the Bucks to 43 percent . The Jazz ( 36 - 22 ) have been 1 of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . Gordon_Hayward continued his barrage , as he led the team with 29 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists . Derrick_Favors finished second on the team with 19 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Rudy_Gobert added another double_double to his tally , amassing 15 points , 16 rebounds and 3 blocks . George_Hill finished with 19 points and 4 steals , going 8 - of - 8 from the free_throw line . The Bucks ( 25 - 31 ) went into the All-Star break with 3 - straight wins , but this loss was more indicative of their prior form . Giannis_Antetokounmpo did all he could for Milwaukee , as he led the team with 33 points , 12 rebounds , 3 assists and 5 steals . Michael_Beasley was the only other Bucks player in double_figures , as he accrued 22 points and 6 rebounds on 10 - of - 17 shooting .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Orlando Magic 122 - 92 at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . The Warriors ( 54 - 14 ) bounced back with 2 straight wins following a 3 game skid with a rout of the Magic ( 24 - 45 ) on Thursday , led by Klay_Thompson 's hot hand , where he scored 27 points in the first half . Golden_State started off on a 21 - 7 run and carried a 20 - points lead into the second quarter . Orlando had no answer for the 57 percent shooting effort put for by the Warriors , and when Klay_Thompson cooled off considerably in the second half , Stephen_Curry picked right up and started to rack up some points of his own . Klay_Thompson finished with 29 points , 5 assists and 4 rebounds on 12 - of - 20 shooting , including 5 three_pointers . Stephen_Curry went on to finish with 25 points , 9 assists , 1 board and 3 steals , including a highlight reel nutmeg pass to Zaza_Pachulia for an exclamation point during the game . Zaza_Pachulia completed a double_double to the tune of 10 points and 10 rebounds , while Draymond_Green rounded out the box score with 9 points , 11 rebounds and 6 assists across 25 minutes . Elfrid_Payton led all Magic scorers with 13 points , while Evan_Fournier 's 12 points and Nikola_Vucevic 's 10 points were no match for the starters of the Warriors . Jeff_Green was the strongest bench player , and added 13 points and 4 rebounds on 6 - of - 9 shooting across 18 minutes . The Magic shot just 37 percent from the field and 26 percent from behind the arc .
The Boston Celtics hung on to defeat the host Atlanta Hawks , 103 - 101 , at Philips_Arena on Friday evening . After a strong 28 - 18 first quarter , the Celtics let up a bit in the second , allowing the Hawks to pull within 4 points heading into halftime . Isaiah_Thomas has been leading the charge all season and this game was no different , as he poured in 13 of his team - high 28 points in the fourth quarter . Isaiah_Thomas had help though , as Kelly_Olynyk poured in a season - high 26 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . Jae_Crowder chipped in 18 points , while the only other Celtics player to score in double_digit was Al_Horford , who added 10 . Atlanta had 5 players score in double_digit , including Tim_Hardaway_Jr. and Paul_Millsap , who each finished with a team - high 23 points . Dwight_Howard added 11 points and grabbed 8 rebounds , while Malcolm_Delaney added 17 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting , including 3 - of - 4 from long range , in 27 minutes off the bench .
The Pistons pulled off the road upset in the season opener against the Hawks on Tuesday night , upending Atlanta by a score of 106 - 94 . The 2 teams ' performance from the three_point line was the determining factor in this one , as the visiting Pistons knocked down 12 - of - 29 shots ( 41 percent ) from deep . The Hawks , meanwhile were an ugly 8 - for - 27 ( 30 percent ) from beyond the arc . Detroit rode a balanced scoring attack to the victory column , as all 5 starters finished with at least 15 points . Leading the way was Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope , who shook off a recent foot injury to pour in 21 points on 7 - for - 14 shooting , including a 4 - for - 7 mark from three_point range . The Pistons also received strong production on the interior from Andre_Drummond , who tallied 18 points and 19 rebounds . In addition to getting very little scoring from their starting backcourt , the trio of Jeff_Teague , Kyle_Korver , and Kent_Bazemore finished with just 25 points between them , the Hawks were also bullied on the interior by Andre_Drummond & Co. Al_Horford pulled down just 4 rebounds on the evening , and the Pistons held a 59 - 40 edge on the glass over the night .

Tony_Allen was in top form as he posted a career - high 12 rebounds with 9 points and 4 steals in 40 minutes . Nikola_Vucevic finished with 16 points and 14 rebounds , as well as 3 assists and 2 blocked shots in 39 minutes . Tobias_Harris finished with 16 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists in 39 minutes . Orlando made 19 turnovers , leading to their sixth loss in a row .

Trevor_Booker continued to be highly productive off the bench , tallying a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 1 block . Sean_Kilpatrick managed 10 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , leading , 53 - 43 , headed into the locker room . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Heat shooting 53 percent , while the Bucks could n't crack 42 percent . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led Milwaukee in scoring , as he accumulated 24 points , 10 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals in the defeat .
