The Indiana Pacers ( 29 - 34 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 21 - 44 ) 118 - 86 on Tuesday at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . In an all - around dominant performance , the Pacers used a strong second half , where they out - scored the Magic 59 - 39 , to finish off the 32 - point victory in front of their home crowd . They shot extremely well in this one , going 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three_point line , while the Magic finished at just 37 percent from the floor and a meager 24 percent from deep . The Pacers got a ridiculous amount of production from their bench , as their bench out - scored the Magics 73 - 18 . That effort was led by Rodney_Stuckey , who went 13 - for - 19 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding 6 rebounds and 7 assists . It was a new season - high in points for the guard , who 's now averaging 19 points and 4 assists over his last 6 games . Joining Rodney_Stuckey off the bench was Luis_Scola , who recorded 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds in just 20 minutes . He 's now averaging 9 points and 6 rebounds on the year . He took advantage of the start , hitting nearly everything he shot and finished with 17 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 6 - 7 3PT ) , to go along with 5 assists . George_Hill added 13 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 8 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and 6 assists as well . Doing the best he could to keep the Magic close in this game was Tobias_Harris , who went off for 22 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 2 assists in 30 minutes . He 's picked his game up of late , and is averaging 21 points and 4 rebounds over his last 3 games . Victor_Oladipo struggled offensively in this one , and scored just 13 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , while adding 3 steals and 3 blocked shots . Over that 3 - game stretch , he 's averaging 14 points , 6 rebounds and 8 assists , as he 's done a little bit of everything for the Magic during that span . Nikola_Vucevic chipped in with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 5 rebounds as well .
DeMarcus_Cousins exploded for a massive 36 - point , 20 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , but it was n't enough to overcome a similarly impressive 31 - point outing from Bradley_Beal that included 12 - of - 24 and 4 - of - 7 tallies from the field and three_point range , respectively . John_Wall registered a 19 - point , 11 - assist double_double while also hauling in 8 rebounds , but he committed a game - high 11 turnovers . Otto_Porter and Marcin_Gortat combined for 25 points and 15 rebounds , while Kelly_Oubre_Jr. led the bench with a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double_double . Ty_Lawson led the bench with a 12 - point effort .

The Rockets ( 45 - 21 ) have been 1 of the NBA 's best squads all season , and a great deal of their success is rightfully attributed to their prolific offense . The Chicago Bulls ( 18 - 12 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 18 - 13 ) 102 - 100 in overtime on Wednesday . The game was a tale of 2 halves , with Chicago building a 50 - 40 lead by intermission , largely on the strength of a second period in which they outscored the visitors 29 - 19 . The Pacers ' attack was spearheaded by George_Hill , who tallied 20 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 4 steals . Paul_George continued his recent string of sluggish performances , collecting 19 points on 7 of 20 shooting , including 3 of 9 from three_point range . Monta_Ellis was able to pitch in 13 points and add 5 assists , 1 rebound and 2 steals , while Lavoy_Allen posted a double_double in a rare start , collecting 10 points and hauling in 12 boards . Rodney_Stuckey led the Indiana reserves with a 13 - point outing . Jimmy_Butler finished with an outstanding 28 points , and added 4 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Pau_Gasol had a relatively subdued but efficient double_double with 13 points and 11 rebounds . With Derrick_Rose sitting with a sore hamstring , Aaron_Brooks showed he had the hot hand early despite yielding the start to Kirk_Hinrich , and ended up playing a robust 41 minutes . Aaron_Brooks tallied a season - high 29 points , and was successful on 4 of his 7 three_point tries . 2015 first - round pick Bobby_Portis also pitched in significantly off the bench with 16 points , 7 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Miami Heat ( 17 - 21 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 27 ) 78 - 75 on Tuesday at the Staples_Center in Los_Angeles . The Heat were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field , while the Lakers went just 32 percent from the floor . Dwyane_Wade started this game , but had to leave after only 15 minutes as he suffered a mild left hamstring strain . He still finished with 4 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . With Dwyane_Wade out of the game , Mario_Chalmers took over , scoring 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 5 - 7 ) , while adding 8 assists and 2 steals . Chris_Bosh did n't have his best game , as he struggled with his shot and scored only 8 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) . Hassan_Whiteside continued to impress , scoring 15 points ( 7 - 9 FG ) and grabbing 9 rebounds in 21 minutes . Over his last 2 games he 's averaged 19 points and 13 rebounds , despite averaging only 7 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Kobe_Bryant had a rough night , shooting only 3 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from the three_point line to finish with 12 points . He did have 6 rebounds and 7 assists though , so that at least helped offset his poor shooting performance . Jordan_Hill had 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) of his own , while adding 6 rebounds as well . The only other Laker to reach double_figures in points was Ed_Davis , who went 6 - for - 7 from the field to score 12 points in 23 minutes . He also had 8 rebounds .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 18 - 20 ) snapped a 7 - game losing streak with a decisive 107 - 84 win over the Atlanta Hawks ( 23 - 16 ) on Wednesday . Point guard Kemba_Walker led the team with 23 points , and also provided a strong defensive performance as he stole the ball 3 times . With center Al_Jefferson ( meniscus ) still out , Cody_Zeller was able to shine in his starting role , posting a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double_double along with 3 blocks . The Hornets simply dominated every aspect of the game , out - rebounding Atlanta 54 - 37 and shooting 7 percent better from the field . All-Star forward Paul_Millsap was the only Hawk to score in double_digit , as he led the team with 20 points . Overall , Atlanta struggled from the field , shooting just 37 percent on the night . In what was an unusual issue for Atlanta , a team known for its ball movement , the Hornets held a 26 - 17 advantage in team assists .

Kyle_Singler has started at small forward both gmes , but after he played just 17 minutes Tuesday , it appears his hold on the job may not be too tight . While defense is n't the Lakers ' forte , they were successful in limiting the Pistons to 37 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc .

Coming off the bench , rookie Jordan_Adams added 13 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) in 23 minutes .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Washington Wizards , 98 - 93 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday night . The Wizards ( 42 - 27 ) checked into Saturday having played very well over their past 2 weeks , but also burning the proverbial candle at both ends . They shot just 37 percent from the field and 33 percent from three_point range while also turning the ball over 12 times . The Hornets ( 30 - 39 ) were able to capitalize on their visitors ' fatigue in the second half , when they outscored the Wizards by a 59 - 53 margin to pull off the home victory . John_Wall led Washington with a modest 19 points , which he supplemented with 8 assists , 3 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Otto_Porter_Jr. followed with 16 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 steals . Jason_Smith drew another start for Markieff_Morris ( illness ) and provided 8 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 blocks . Bojan_Bogdanovic led the bench with 12 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist . Cody_Zeller paced Charlotte with 19 points , 5 rebounds , 4 steals and 2 blocks . Kemba_Walker and Marvin_Williams supplied matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding 6 assists and 2 rebounds and the latter registering 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Nicolas_Batum returned after a multi - game absence due to migraines and tallied 8 points , 10 rebounds and 5 assists . Frank_Kaminsky III paced the reserves with 14 points , 4 boards , 2 assists and 1 block . Marco_Belinelli was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , 2 assists and 1 rebound .

The Mavericks ( 2 - 8 ) checked into Wednesday scoring the third - least points per game in the league ( 95 ) , and that trend would rear its ugly head yet again against a Boston squad that was ranked in the bottom 10 in points allowed . They also dominated the rebounding and assists , as they won the rebounding differential , 42 - 34 and the assist battle , 24 - 15 . Dallas ( 10 - 23 ) had just 3 road wins coming into this matchup , but they showed some serious fight in the second half to get that tally to 4 . But the Hawks just could n't find their shot , as they made just 42 percent of their field goals and shot 10 - 34 ( 29 percent ) from three_point land .
Atlanta is not accustomed to being held to 68 points on 31 percent shooting , but they have n't seen a defense like the 1 Utah possesses . The Jazz actually ranked first in the NBA with under 95 points a game allowed and that number surely dropped here . However , it was clear from the onset that Chicago had a different mindset , as they walloped their hosts by a 36 - 26 margin in the first quarter . They maintained their advantage through the second period , leading to a 61 - 49 halftime edge . However , intermission must have served as a wake - up call for Washington , which roared out of the gates in the third quarter and doubled up their feisty visitors , 32 - 16 . Marcin_Gortat posted a 10 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 1 steal and 1 block . Jason_Smith led the second unit with 7 points , 6 rebounds and 3 blocks .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 4 - 3 ) completed a fourth quarter comeback to beat the Utah Jazz ( 3 - 6 ) 100 - 97 on Wednesday night at Philips_Arena . Utah scored only 9 points in the fourth , and were out - scored 18 - 9 to lose by 3 when all was said and done . Alec_Burks lead the way with 22 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Trey_Burke posted a double_double for the Jazz , with 11 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) and 11 assists . The Hawks have to be happy to walk away with the win after scoring just 18 points in the fourth quarter . This was Atlanta 's third win in a row , and they got a monster game from Paul_Millsap , who had 30 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) , along with 17 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Kyle_Korver also posted a double_double , with 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He also chipped in 6 assists in 38 minutes .
The Chicago Bulls ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 4 ) 98 - 90 on Tuesday at the United_Center in Chicago . Tobias_Harris recorded a team - high 21 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and also had 9 rebounds . Tobias_Harris has been 1 of the few positives for this Orlando team and is averaging 18 points and 8 rebounds . Nikola_Vucevic has been the other bright spot , and he posted his fourth double_double in as many games , finishing with 19 points and 13 rebounds . Rookie Elfrid_Payton struggled to find his shot and went 3 - for - 14 from the field to score 9 points , while also adding 7 assists . Evan_Fournier continued to start as the other guard and had 13 points of his own , to go along with 2 assists in 40 minutes . Jimmy_Butler shot 7 - for - 15 from the field to score 21 points and added 9 rebounds . Pau_Gasol recorded his second double_double of the season , going for 16 points and 13 rebounds in 41 minutes . Filling in for Derrick_Rose at the point , Kirk_Hinrich got the start but only scored 5 points and 3 assists in 30 minutes of action . Rookie Doug_McDermott found his stroke off the bench , shooting 4 - for - 6 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from three_point land . He finished with 12 points , and this was his first game since the opener where he was able to score in double_digit .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 34 - 19 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 21 - 33 ) 104 - 87 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Spurs came out and got off to a quick start in this one , out_scoring the Pistons 20 - 12 right away in the first quarter . To go along with the quick start , the Spurs also shot the ball well , going 48 percent from the field , while the Pistons went 41 percent from the floor . To put the icing on the cake , the Spurs finished with a 45 - 36 rebounding advantage , helping push them to a convincing 17 - point victory . Danny_Green went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 5 - for - 10 from the three_point line to finish with 19 points , while also adding 8 rebounds and 4 assists . Tony_Parker was just behind Danny_Green , recording 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , 3 rebounds and 6 assists . He 's put in 2 great performances in a row , combining for 36 points and 12 assists during that stretch . In 24 minutes , he posted 12 points ( 6 - 8 FG ) and 3 rebounds . Both Manu_Ginobili and Marco_Belinelli reached double_digit points off the bench , with 13 and 10 points respectively . Point guard DJ_Augustin finished with 22 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , 3 rebounds and 6 assists . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope also had a solid showing , posting 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 3 rebounds . The only other Piston to reach double_figures in points was Andre_Drummond , who nearly recorded a double_double with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . It was the third time in his last 4 games with 2 blocks though .

The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 21 - 45 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 44 - 21 ) 99 - 96 on Friday . This could hardly have been more evident Friday , when Minnesota pulled out 1 of the season 's most improbable victories by toppling the struggling yet third - seeded Thunder in their home arena . However , they scuffled on offense throughout the night , shooting only 22 percent from three_point range and committing double the amount of turnovers ( 24 ) of the visitors . The Timberwolves were led by Gorgui_Dieng 's near double_double that consisted of 25 points , 9 boards , 1 assist , 3 blocks and 2 steals . Karl-Anthony_Towns followed with a 17 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 3 blocks and 1 steal . Ricky_Rubio rounded things out for the first unit with 13 points , 12 assists and 3 steals . Kevin_Durant tallied 28 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , but did commit 6 turnovers . Russell_Westbrook was close behind with 26 points , 8 assists and 4 rebounds , but turned the ball over 5 times himself . However , Enes_Kanter was the only other player to tally double_digit scoring , posting a 17 - point , 14 - rebound double_double . Among the starters , Serge_Ibaka had 1 of the most forgettable games of his career , going scoreless over 20 minutes before fouling out . Andre_Roberson could only contribute 2 points himself , and despite bringing in 13 rebounds , Steven_Adams pitched in a modest 8 points .

The Utah Jazz ( 3 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 2 - 4 ) 97 - 96 on Sunday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . After trailing by 5 points going into the fourth quarter , the Jazz were able to outscore the Pistons 23 - 17 to finish the game and steal a victory in Detroit . The Jazz shot 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three_point line compared to the Pistons who shot only 39 percent from the field and 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Jazz were also able to get to the line 10 more times than the Pistons , which gave them just enough of an edge to get the 1 - point victory . It was Derrick_Favors ' third on the year , as he finished with 16 points and 12 rebounds , while Enes_Kanter contributed his first of the season with 14 points and 11 rebounds . Gordon_Hayward scored 17 points of his own , shooting 5 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three_point line . Alec_Burks also reached double_figures , shooting 6 - for - 13 from the field to finish with 14 points and 4 assists . With Rodney_Hood sitting out with plantar fasciitis in his foot , rookie Dante_Exum soaked up the majority of his playing time , as he had 9 points and recorded 5 assits in 21 minutes . He finished the game shooting 8 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from beyond the arc for 23 points and 5 assists . Andre_Drummond had a huge game on the boards as he finished with 18 rebounds . Greg_Monroe was n't far behind with 11 rebounds of his own , and the pair helped the Pistons out - rebound Utah 51 to 43 . Greg_Monroe also had 19 points , as the team continues to play their big lineup with Kyle_Singler coming of the bench . Josh_Smith reached double_figures in scoring as he produced 13 points , while also coming 1 rebound shy of a double_double with 9 .
The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 47 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 35 - 50 ) 99 - 79 on Wednesday . The Clippers carried a 26 - point lead into the fourth quarter and dominated throughout . The key for Los_Angeles was their defense , as they held Minnesota to under 35 percent shooting and forced them to commit 16 turnovers . To put that in perspective , Los_Angeles committed just 7 turnovers and shot 44 percent from the field . Chris_Paul was majestic , as he tallied 20 points , 16 assists and 8 rebounds in the win . Andrew_Wiggins really struggled though , as he collected just 7 points and 1 assist , while committing 6 turnovers on 3 - for - 9 shooting .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Washington Wizards 126 - 115 Wednesday at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena . For the Thunder ( 12 - 8 ) , they continue to roll as they have now won 4 in a row after dropping 3 straight . Wednesday night , Russell_Westbrook served as the hero , as not only did he drop yet another triple_double with 35 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists , but he also hit a step - back three_pointer in the closing moments to send the game into overtime , the only 3 he hit in the game . From there , he would not be denied a victory , as he went on to score 14 of the team 's 21 points in the overtime period , outscoring the Wizards , 14 - 10 , on his own . Russell_Westbrook 's night was n't the most efficient , however , as he shot just 12 - of - 35 from the field and 1 - of - 6 from behind the arc . Victor_Oladipo , on the other hand , had a very efficient evening , shooting 10 - of - 16 from the field en route to 25 points on top of 6 rebounds and 6 assists . The Wizards ( 6 - 11 ) are now losers of 2 of their last 3 games as they continue to battle inconsistent play early in this season . His 31 points on Wednesday night was his second straight 30 - point effort in a row and he is now averaging 29 points over his last 3 games . His partner in the backcourt John_Wall struggled shooting from the field , going just 6 - of - 20 overall and 2 - of - 7 from behind the arc , but he did record 15 points and 15 assists , his second double_double in a row and fourth in the last 5 games .

The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 119 - 110 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday . The Timberwolves ( 1 - 5 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest having played solid defense through their first 5 games , allowing only 100 points per game , while the Nets ( 3 - 4 ) had been much more generous , allowing 107 points per contest . However , the roles were somewhat reversed Tuesday , with Brooklyn tallying a season - high 119 points on the strength of outstanding 55 percent shooting . Six players also managed to hit double_digit in the scoring column , allowing them to overcome 20 turnovers and a season - high 36 points from Andrew_Wiggins to secure their third victory of the season , which have all come at home . Andrew_Wiggins complemented his scoring total , which came on 29 shot attempts , with 8 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Zach_LaVine managed 17 points , 2 boards and 1 assist , while Kris_Dunn was notably held scoreless and only contributed 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal over 16 minutes . However , Tyus_Jones received a season - high 32 minutes with Kris_Dunn struggling and led the bench with 12 points , 7 assists , 5 rebounds and 5 steals . The host Golden_State Warriors demolished the Sacramento Kings on Friday , 114 - 100 . Golden_State ( 58 - 14 ) is on the verge of its third straight 60 - win season , holding the league 's top record with just 10 games remaining . Reigning MVP Stephen_Curry was the team leader in scoring , pouring in 27 points , and also contributed 6 steals on the defensive end . All-Defense forward Draymond_Green , meanwhile , had 3 steals and 1 block while scoring 23 points . The 2 more than made up for a cold night from sharpshooter Klay_Thompson , who went just 3 - of - 14 from the field . The night was just 1 of many great ones for the historic Warriors offense , as the team shot almost 49 percent from the field while dishing out a ridiculous 37 assists . Buddy_Hield scored a team - high 22 points to go along with 8 rebounds and 7 assists . Just a week after becoming the first member of the 2016 draft class to score 30 points , Skal_Labissiere narrowly missed his first career triple_double , coming away with 10 points , 10 rebounds , and 8 assists .
The Utah Jazz ( 34 - 36 ) dispatched the Milwaukee Bucks ( 30 - 40 ) Sunday at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center , 94 - 85 . Utah held just a 42 - 41 lead after a tight first half , but the Jazz ended the quarter on a 26 - 8 run to carry a 14 - point lead into the fourth quarter . The Jazz also got double_doubles from Rudy_Gobert with points 12 ( 4 - 7 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds ( 6 offensive ) and Shelvin_Mack with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) and 12 assists . Trey_Lyles added 14 points in just 23 minutes off the bench as he also grabbed 4 rebounds and dished 4 assists . The Jazz were launching three_pointers all game , and managed to hit 13 of 37 attempts ( 34 percent ) . Jabari_Parker of the Bucks finished with a game - high 19 points ( 8 - 14 FG ) and added 8 rebounds and 2 assists . Khris_Middleton ( 13 points ) and Giannis_Antetokounmpo ( 12 points , 7 assists , 3 rebounds , 2 steals , 2 blocks ) were the only other Bucks to even reach double - figures . The Bucks actually shot a solid 34 - 65 ( 52 percent ) from the floor , but they managed just 2 offensive rebounds and hit only 3 three_point shots , and even their relatively efficient performance inside was n't enough to keep up with the Jazz 's three_point barrage .
While Dennis_Schroder got the win , Russell_Westbrook edged him out in the box score , posting 46 points , 11 rebounds and 7 assists to Dennis_Schroder 's 31 points , 8 assists and 5 rebounds . Combined with Saturday 's monster performance , Russell_Westbrook has now posted 72 points , 29 assists and 22 rebonds over his last 2 games . For Dennis_Schroder , it was just his second performance this season with at least 30 points , but after shooting 63 percent from the field Monday , the point guard has now shot over 50 percent in 7 of his 9 games in December after shooting a poor 42 percent from the field throughout November .

Kawhi_Leonard 's 25 - point , 10 - rebound double_double led the way and the bench combined for 56 points . LaMarcus_Aldridge and Tony_Parker combined for a modest 17 points , while Pau_Gasol went scoreless over 17 minutes . However , Patty_Mills , David_Lee and Davis_Bertans supplied respective tallies of 19 , 15 and 15 points from the bench . Isaiah_Thomas ' 24 points led Boston , while Avery_Bradley contributed 19 points . Jae_Crowder and Al_Horford combined for 30 points , with the latter also hauling in 12 boards . Kelly_Olynyk and Marcus_Smart paced the bench with a pair of 9 - point efforts .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 91 - 70 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday , The Clippers have been playing some dominant basketball this season , but this was a dud against a desperate Pacers team . The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor as well , with Indiana recording 26 assists to just 13 turnovers and Los_Angeles committing 20 turnovers to just 11 assists . Los_Angeles ( 14 - 4 ) has been 1 of the best teams early on in the season , but they really struggled here . Blake_Griffin led the team in scoring , tallying 16 points and 9 rebounds on 6 - of - 15 shooting . Chris_Paul also struggled with his shot , totaling 13 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists on 3 - of - 11 from the field . The only other player in double_figures was Jamal_Crawford , who scored 12 points off the bench . DeAndre_Jordan grabbed 14 rebounds , adding 8 points to his line . Myles_Turner was the player of the game , accruing 17 points and 12 rebounds in the win . Glenn_Robinson_III also scored 17 points , filling - in for Paul_George . Jeff_Teague scored just 7 points , but dished out 10 assists , Al_Jefferson and Rodney_Stuckey were nice sparks off the bench , accumulating 28 points and 13 rebounds between the 2 .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 1 - 1 ) 106 - 90 on Tuesday at Philips_Arena in Atlanta . After suffering a tough 104 - 98 defeat to the Wizards in game number 1 , the Hawks started this outing with some added fire and out - scored the Wizards 28 - 20 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks made 1 final push and responded with a strong offensive run of their own , eventually finishing with an impressive 16 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Wizards shot 43 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three_point line , but with John_Wall sitting out due to a wrist injury , they were missing their most important weapon . Bradley_Beal finished with 20 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 7 assists over 43 minutes . Bradley_Beal has now combined for 48 points , 7 assists and 3 steals over the first 2 games of this series , so he 's been very effective and should continue as the Wizards head back home to Washington . Paul_Pierce recorded 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 5 - 8 3PT ) and 5 rebounds , while Otto_Porter chipped in with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 5 assists off the bench . DeMarre_Carroll led the team , finishing with 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Paul_Millsap and Al_Horford contributed with 18 points a piece . Paul_Millsap added 11 rebounds and 4 steals , while Al_Horford had 6 assists and 3 steals . While not something they 're usually known for , the combined steals from both Al_Horford and Paul_Millsap helped force the Wizards into 16 turnovers , while the Hawks committed just 10 of their own . Coming off the bench , Kent_Bazemore went a perfect 3 - for - 3 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three_point line to score 10 points over 17 minutes .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 35 - 12 ) beat the Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 23 - 24 ) , 85 - 74 . Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook each shot 5 - of - 16 from the field , and Dion_Waiters converted 3 - of - 14 shots as the Thunder scored 12 points in the fourth quarter . They recorded 15 assists on 27 made baskets . Zach_Randolph recorded his 12 straight double_double , tallying 21 points , 18 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block in 37 minutes . Mike_Conley did n't score after the first quarter but finished with 10 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds in 29 minutes
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 6 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 11 - 20 ) Monday 101 - 95 at AT_&_T_Center in San_Antonio . Kawhi_Leonard continues to play like an All-Star , as he led the way with a double_double of 17 points and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes . Boba Boban_Marjanovic matched Leonard 's 17 , recording as many in just 15 minutes off the bench while shooting 7 - for - 7 from the field . Andrew_Wiggins led the way scoring for Minnesota in the losing effort , posting 18 points and 6 rebounds in 37 minutes , while rookie star Karl-Anthony_Towns recorded a double_double of 10 points and 12 boards in 31 minutes . Additionally , while Ricky_Rubio struggled shooting from the field ( 2 - of - 9 ) and finished with just 7 points , he did manage to dish out 14 assists to just 1 turnover on the night . Zach_LaVine also had a solid outing off the bench , scoring 15 points in 25 minutes .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Phoenix Suns 106 - 100 at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Sunday . The Warriors ( 2 - 1 ) rode their 2 biggest stars to victory , as Kevin_Durant and Stephen_Curry combined for 65 points on a 19 - for - 33 tally from the field . Kevin_Durant has , for the moment , at least , taken the title of team MVP from Stephen_Curry , as he 's averaged 31 points over his first 3 contests in a Warriors uniform while playing between 37 and 38 minutes in each . Although Golden_State struggled considerably from three_point range as a team , managing only a 28 percent success rate , Stephen_Curry was lights out from beyond the arc , draining 5 of his 8 long - distance attempts . Kevin_Durant 's 37 points led all scorers , a figure that he supplemented with 4 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 steals and 1 block . Klay_Thompson came up empty on 6 three_point tries but did manage 14 points , along with 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Zaza_Pachulia and Draymond_Green only managed 5 points apiece , but hauled in 10 and 13 boards , respectively . Draymond_Green also added 9 assists and 3 blocks in 38 minutes . The Suns ( 0 - 3 ) had a curious stat sheet overall , 1 that was decidedly tipped towards TJ_Warren and Eric_Bledsoe . TJ_Warren continues to thrive as a starter , tallying a team - high 26 points , along with 6 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Eric_Bledsoe contributed 21 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal . Tyson_Chandler provided a modest 8 points , but in typical fashion brought down 18 rebounds , and he also dished out 1 assist . Devin_Booker 's night was notable for his struggles from the field , as he was only able to muster 7 points while finding the net on 3 of 12 shot attempts overall . Brandon_Knight , the third member of the talented backcourt rotation , did n't fare much better with an identical shooting tally , but did pace the reserves with 9 points , while adding 3 assists , 1 rebound and 2 steals .
The Indiana Pacers ( 1 - 3 ) came away with their first victory of the season in Tuesday 's trip to the Palace of Auburn Hills , knocking off the previously undefeated Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 1 ) , 94 - 82 . The frontcourt reserve trio of Jordan_Hill , Myles_Turner , and Lavoy_Allen covered well for Mahinmi 's absence , combining for 20 points , 16 rebounds , and 3 blocks over 60 minutes . They weren’t the only contributors off the Indiana bench , which outscored its Detroit counterparts by a 43 - 2 margin . Backup guard Rodney_Stuckey led the charge with 23 points against his former team . Paul_George chipped in 16 points to go along with 7 rebounds , 6 assists , and 2 steals . The Pistons finished with 23 turnovers against just 14 assists , with point guard Reggie_Jackson ( 6 turnovers ) the most egregious offender . Andre_Drummond also turned the ball over on 4 occasions , but more than made up for it with a super - size double_double of 25 points ( 12 - for - 17 shooting ) and a career - high 29 rebounds . He 's now averaging a Chamberlain - esque 19 boards over the Pistons ' 4 games .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 104 , Wednesday at AT_&_T_Center . The Spurs ( 50 - 13 ) elected to rest stars Kawhi_Leonard and LaMarcus_Aldridge for the night , and their impact , or lack thereof , could be felt in the first quarter , as San_Antonio fell behind by 22 points after the first 12 minutes of the game and ultimately went into halftime facing a 15 - point deficit . However , the second half was a much different story , as the Spurs ended up winning the second 24 minutes by an astonishing 25 points to bury the visiting Kings ( 25 - 39 ) . Without the 2 stars , Manu_Ginobili managed to turn back the clock and lead the way scoring for San_Antonio , recording 19 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals in 25 minutes off the bench . Patty_Mills shined off the bench as well , recording 17 points and 10 assists in 27 minutes as a reserve . David_Lee also took advantage of the extended playing time , recording a double_double of 18 points on 8 - of - 9 shooting and 10 rebounds in 31 minutes as a member of the starting lineup . As for the Kings , Tyreke_Evans shined in his first start since being traded , scoring a game - high 26 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting from the field . There were n't many other highlights from what turned out to be a disappointing performance from Sacramento , but rookie big man Skal_Labissiere continues to show his potential , as he recorded an efficient 15 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting from the field in 15 minutes off the bench Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 15 ) 104 - 79 on Saturday . The Cavs made life miserable for Orlando shooting - wise , as the visitors could only muster a 38 percent success rate from the field , and 24 percent figure from beyond the arc . On the offensive end , Cleveland also took excellent care of the ball , committing only 6 turnovers in contrast to the 14 they forced from the Magic . Orlando was actually led by Aaron_Gordon 's 11 points off the bench , which he complemented with 7 rebounds and 2 assists . Evan_Fournier 's 9 points paced the starting 5 , a group that bottomed out with a scoreless effort from Elfrid_Payton over 16 minutes . LeBron_James led the charge for the home team , totaling 29 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Kyrie_Irving played a highly efficient 21 minutes while serving as the second - highest scorer on the night , pouring in 13 points and adding 5 assists and 2 rebounds . The frontcourt tandem of Tristan_Thompson and Kevin_Love put together a pair of 10 - point double_doubles that were supplemented with 12 and 13 boards , respectively . LeBron_James_Jones came off the bench to pace the Cleveland reserves with 10 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist .

In fact , the Celtics went 24 - of - 36 from the field to lead by 14 points at the half , as it never got within 6 points from there . The Celtics ( 35 - 19 ) have been 1 of the best teams in the NBA over recent weeks and a road win in Utah just adds to their impressive resume ' . The Indiana Pacers ( 25 - 34 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 13 - 46 ) 94 - 74 on Sunday at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers got out to a quick start in this game , grabbing a 59 - 46 lead at half , therefore giving them a comfortable lead for the rest of the game . Along with the hot start , the Pacers were also the superior shooters , going 41 percent from the field , compared to the Sixers who finished at just 35 percent . The Pacers forced the Sixers in 18 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have also played a big factor in the win . George_Hill had a strong showing on Sunday , finishing with a team - high of 17 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 0 - 2 FT ) , to go along with 9 rebounds and 4 assists . Hill also received some help for Roy_Hibbert , who posted 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , 15 rebounds and 5 blocked shots in 31 minutes . Rodney_Stuckey has had a nice couple of games in a row , combining for 31 points , 10 rebounds and 8 assists over his last 2 . Robert_Covington had the most production , finishing with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) and 3 rebounds . Jason_Richardson finished with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) , 3 reobunds and 2 steals in 26 minutes . After shooting over 44 percent in each of his last 2 games , he really struggled this time around , going just 33 percent from the field and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . Ish_Smith added 11 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) , 4 rebounds and 5 assists in 25 minutes off the bench .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 38 - 8 ) extended their winning streak to 17 games Wednesday against the Brooklyn Nets ( 18 - 27 ) . With the tally resting at 113 - 102 in favor of the Hawks at the final horn , the Mike Budenholzer-coached squad marked a fifth consecutive margin of victory in double_figures . Joe_Johnson paced Brooklyn with 26 points in 37 minutes , while Jarrett_Jack got back on track , recording 14 points and 13 assists . Alan_Anderson proceeded to post 15 points and a season - high 6 assists , but other than Brook_Lopez 's 18 points and 7 rebounds , the bench mob contributed a paltry 11 points and 7 boards .

After trailing by as many as 16 points in the second quarter , the Raptors outscored the Pacers 35 - 23 in the third . DeMarre_Carroll signed a 4 - year contract with the Raptors this offseason to provide energy , and he did just that Wednesday , scoring 14 points with 8 rebounds and 4 assists while playing shutdown defense for 41 minutes . The Raptors showed a lot of resilience , hanging on for the victory despite shooting 69 percent from the charity stripe .

The Sacramento Kings ( 22 - 31 ) earned a road win Wednesday at Wells_Fargo_Center over the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 45 ) , 114 - 110 . DeMarcus_Cousins led the Kings with 28 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 12 - 17 FT ) and 12 rebounds for his third double_double in the past 5 games . Darren_Collison had a huge game off the bench , as he poured in 25 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) and turned the ball over just once in 32 minutes . Rudy_Gay scored 22 and Rajon_Rondo added 14 points with a game - high 15 assists as the Kings managed to win despite shooting just 4 - 16 ( 25 percent ) from 3 . Robert_Covington drained 7 of his 11 three_point attempts en route to a game - high 29 points , just part of a three_point barrage from the 76ers , who shot 15 - 34 ( 43 percent ) from deep . Jahlil_Okafor scored 26 points working inside ( 11 - 18 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and added 10 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocks , and Nik_Stauskas scored 16 behind a 4 - 5 effort from 3 . But the 76ers turned it over 19 times and allowed 26 points off those turnovers , dooming them despite their hot shooting .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 47 - 31 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 39 - 40 ) 107 - 104 on Wednesday in Dallas . Dirk_Nowitzki led the way for Dallas , scoring 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , including the final 4 for the Mavericks to seal the deal . But , it was Tyson_Chandler who had the monster performance Wednesday night , scoring 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and grabbing 23 rebounds in 34 minutes . Monta_Ellis scored a game - high 20 points , but it took a 10 - of - 21 shooting effort from the field to reach that mark . Rajon_Rondo was the fourth Dallas starter to score in double_figures , recording 12 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and 7 assists in 30 minutes . Off the bench , Devin_Harris contributed 12 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , while Amar'e_Stoudemire 's 10 points round out the 6 Mavericks who scored in double_figures . As a team , Dallas shot just 22 percent from 3 , but their offense still worked efficiently , as they had 18 assists to just 8 turnovers on the night . Gerald_Green was phenomenal in the losing effort , scoring 30 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 5 - 10 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) in 30 minutes , but his season - best performance was just not enough . Markieff and Marcus_Morris both got the start Wednesday and combined for 31 points , 15 rebounds and 11 assists , while Eric_Bledsoe played poorly by his standards , posting just 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , 1 rebound and 3 assists in 33 minutes . He had 10 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting in 24 minutes off the bench .

They shot a dismal 9 percent from the three_point line , while the Wizards got hot and shot 53 percent from beyond the arc . Washington was also able to out - rebound the Heat 42 - 33 giving them numerous second - chance opportunities and an advantage the Heat could n't match . John_Wall was also big for the Wizards , as he scored 18 points , and handed out 13 assists . It was his ninth double_double of the season and he 's now averaging 18 points and 9 assists on the season . Marcin_Gortat notched a double_double of his own , as he recorded 15 points and 10 rebounds . Dwyane_Wade shot 9 - for - 13 from the field and scored 20 points , without taking a three_pointer in 28 minutes of game action . The only other player to reach double_figures in scoring for the Heat was Mario_Chalmers , who came off the bench for 11 points in 31 minutes
Russell_Westbrook 's ejection for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes significantly helped the Grizzlies ' cause , but they also earned the dominant victory through their own strong offensive play , posting respective 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three_point range . Although Ty_Lawson proved to be 1 of the few Kings scorers to finish below 51 percent from the field , his 7 assists led all players . The Suns were outpaced by the Kings and had trouble finding efficient shooting on the perimeter , evidenced by the 25 percent effort as a unit .
Two of the NBA 's hottest teams met on Wednesday night as the Boston Celtics ( 32 - 23 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 35 - 18 ) in overtime , 139 - 134 . It proved to be a point guard battle , as All-Star Isaiah_Thomas led the team with a season - high 36 points while also dishing out 11 assists . Big man Jared_Sullinger also had 1 of his strongest outings of the season , scoring 21 points on 10 - for - 15 shooting while also pulling down 11 rebounds and notching 7 assists . While they got the win , the normally defense - oriented team allowed 134 points and let the Clippers convert 52 percent of shots from the field . Much of their success can be attributed to veteran Chris_Paul , who led the team again on Wednesday with 35 points and dished out 13 assists . Guard JJ_Redick also had a big night , scoring 27 points .

The Pistons ( 32 - 33 ) countered with 6 double_digit scoring performances , including 1 from each of the members of their starting 5 , on their way to a 47 percent success rate from the field . Detroit impressively battled back from 2 notable deficits as well , as they trailed by a 29 - 22 margin after the first quarter and 80 - 73 heading into the fourth period . Kyrie_Irving added 5 rebounds and 3 assists to his aforementioned scoring total . Channing_Frye was the only other Cleveland player to hit double_digit in the scoring column , as he totaled 15 points , 9 boards and 1 steal off the bench . Richard_Jefferson and Iman_Shumpert turned in modest stat lines as starters , with the former supplying 9 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists , and the latter registering 8 points , 1 rebound and 1 assist . Reggie_Jackson , who 's struggled with his consistency , led the Pistons with 21 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Andre_Drummond provided a 20 - point , 16 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists . Tobias_Harris had a near double_double with 15 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 blocks . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope matched Tobias_Harris ' point total and added 2 assists . Marcus_Morris delivered a full stat line with 12 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Ish_Smith led the bench with 12 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 122 - 114 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Friday evening . The Lakers ( 19 - 37 ) checked in to Friday 's contest with only 6 road victories in 30 games away from Staples_Center this season , so their chances of victory were n't exactly abundant against a Bucks ( 22 - 30 ) squad that had broken even at home over 26 contests . However , a 47 - point first quarter got the visitors off to a roaring start , and they maintained the hot hand from the field throughout . Los_Angeles tallied success rates of 52 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three_point range , while their bench chipped in with a collective 58 points . The Bucks put forth a late surge that saw them post 30 points in the final period , but clutch free_throws from Nick_Young , D'Angelo_Russell and Larry_Nance_Jr. helped the Lakers hang on for the upside road win . Nick_Young led the way with 26 points , which he supplemented with 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . Lou_Williams paced the bench with 21 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal . D'Angelo_Russell provided 14 points , 5 assists , 3 boards and 1 steal . Ivica_Zubac was productive as a reserve as well with 15 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Nance and Jordan_Clarkson turned in matching 11 - point efforts off the bench , with the former adding 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , while the latter dished out 4 dimes and recorded 1 steal . Malcolm_Brogdon led the bench with 18 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Michael_Beasley turned in 15 points , 5 boards , 2 assists and 1 block . Thon_Maker got first crack at the starting power forward job with Jabari_Parker ( knee ) out for the season and turned in 7 points , 6 rebounds and 1 assist
The Trail_Blazers collectively shot an outstanding 63 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three_point range . Their offensive proficiency and 35 - 27 rebounding advantage helped them overcome 14 turnovers to cruise to a relatively comfortable home victory . CJ_McCollum 's 32 points led the Trail_Blazers , a total supplemented with 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Damian_Lillard tallied 21 points . Jusuf_Nurkic provided a near double_double with 14 points and 9 rebounds . Allen_Crabbe paced the second unit with 10 points . Evan_Turner and Al-Farouq_Aminu turned in matching 8 - point efforts off the bench . Andrew_Wiggins ' 20 points paced Minnesota . Kris_Dunn led the bench with 17 points . Karl-Anthony_Towns and Ricky_Rubio followed with matching 16 - point efforts . Gorgui_Dieng totaled 13 points and Shabazz_Muhammad matched Gorgui_Dieng 's scoring total off the bench while adding 2 rebounds .
A 20 - point win from the Warriors is far from surprising , but it took a strange route to get there . In fact , there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in the first half , before the Warriors outscored the Pistons by 18 in the second half . Golden_State was lights - out once again , shooting over 50 percent from the field and from three_point range , while recording 39 assists . Marcus_Morris was the Pistons ' best player , as he tallied 21 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Andre_Drummond recorded a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double_double . Boban_Marjanovic also recorded a double_double , dropping 13 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Kevin_Durant was the player of the game , accruing 25 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists . Stephen_Curry was n't far behind , tallying 24 points , 7 assists and 5 steals . Klay_Thompson provided 23 points as well , while Draymond_Green grabbed 9 boards and handed out 13 assists .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 107 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Sunday . Brooklyn ( 7 - 19 ) have now lost 14 of their last 17 games , but they put in a strong effort in this close loss . Brook_Lopez flirted with a triple_double in the defeat , tallying 22 points , 9 rebounds and 8 assists . Bojan_Bogdanovic was second among the starters , as he scored 14 points and grabbed 6 boards . Joe_Harris led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 19 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Jeremy_Lin came off the bench once again , as he accumulated 16 points , 2 rebounds and 4 assists . Joel_Embiid added to his crazy rookie numbers , as he scored a career - high 33 points to go along with 10 rebounds and 3 blocks . Jahlil_Okafor had a strange game , as he totaled three_points and 10 rebounds on 0 - of - 9 shooting . Ersan_Ilyasova was second on the team , as he scored 22 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting off the bench .
Even with DeMarcus_Cousins ' return to the floor Wednesday after missing 2 straight games with an ankle sprain , Anthony_Davis still managed to put up a game - high 30 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting and 13 rebounds in 36 minutes . Now , since the All-Star break when the team traded for DeMarcus_Cousins , Anthony_Davis is averaging 29 points on 52 percent shooting from the field and 13 rebounds over 36 minutes per game . Before the All-Star break , when Anthony_Davis had the frontcourt to himself , Anthony_Davis was averaging 28 points on 50 percent shooting and 13 rebounds over 36 minutes per game .
The visiting Dallas Mavericks took down the San_Antonio Spurs on Sunday , 105 - 101 . Dallas ( 17 - 30 ) has struggled for much of the season but surprised many by beating 1 of the league 's top teams on Sunday . Point guard Seth_Curry helped to lead the charge for the Mavericks , scoring a team - high 24 points and pulling down 10 rebounds . Seth_Curry also dished out 5 assists . The Mavericks protected the ball exceptionally well against the tough San_Antonio defense , committing only 6 turnovers on the night . Veteran superstar Dirk_Nowitzki also contributed heavily to the win over his classic rival , scoring 15 points and pulling down 10 rebounds . Superstar forward Kawhi_Leonard led the team with 24 points and pulled down 7 rebounds , and helped to keep the Spurs close despite the loss . San_Antonio was unable to play a neat game , however , committing 11 turnovers to Dallas 's 5 and hitting just 65 percent of its free_throws .
The Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 16 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 24 - 10 ) 125 - 109 on Sunday at the US_Airways_Center in Phoenix . The Suns were hot right from the beginning in this one , having an outstanding first half where they out - scored the Raptors 70 - 53 . They finished the game shooting 54 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three_point line , while the Raptors shot 46 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns had a solid defensive effort , and forced the Raptors into 20 turnovers . Eric_Bledsoe led the team , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three_point line to score 20 points , while also adding 8 assists . Goran_Dragic also had a strong shooting display , as he went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 18 points in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , Isaiah_Thomas had a very efficient outing , scoring 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and adding 5 steals . Not really known for his defensive presence , the 5 steals were a season - high for him . Also , in only 15 minutes , Alex_Len scored 10 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) of his own . The Raptors saw an extremely strong showing by Jonas_Valanciunas , who posted 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds . The double_double pushed his season averages to 12 points and 10 rebounds per game on the year . Kyle_Lowry went 6 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three_point line to score 19 points , while also contributing 7 assists and 2 steals . Coming off the bench both Louis Lou_Williams ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 7 - 7 FT ) and James_Johnson ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) had 17 points apiece . Terrence_Ross was the other Raptor to reach double_figures , as he had 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) and 6 rebounds .
The Thunder were expected to win this game easily and a 25 - point result shows just that . Shooting was key , with the Thunder hitting 55 percent to the Sixers 43 percent . Nik_Stauskas led the way for Philly , as he dropped 20 points off the Sixers bench . Dario_Saric led the starters , as he amassed 12 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 blocks . Russell_Westbrook ended up collecting 18 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists on 6 - of - 6 shooting . Victor_Oladipo also scored 18 points . Enes_Kanter led the team in scoring , dropping 24 points and 11 rebounds off the bench .
They combined for 51 points , which included Kevin_Love 's 27 - point , 16 - rebound double_double , but it was n't enough to overcome a lack of production from the rest of the roster . Richard_Jefferson and Iman_Shumpert , the respective replacements for the idle starters , could only muster a combined 9 points on 3 - of - 12 shooting , and the Cavs did n't receive any other double_digit scoring efforts besides those of the aforementioned superstars . Paul_George led the way with a 21 - point , 11 - rebound double_double , and Jeff_Teague , Myles_Turner and Thaddeus_Young contributed another 48 points combined .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 26 - 26 ) picked up an Eastern_Conference home win Monday night at Time_Warner_Cable_Arena over the Chicago Bulls ( 27 - 24 ) , 108 - 91 . The Hornets never trailed as they jumped out to an 18 - point first quarter lead behind a brilliant offensive display , as they poured in 38 points in the period . Charlotte sustained its offense with the three_point shot , as they made a blistering 14 of 36 attempts ( 39 percent ) from behind the arc . It marks the 11th time the Hornets have sunk at least 14 threes in a game , and they improved to 7 - 4 in those contests . Kemba_Walker hit 4 of those three_pointers en route to scoring a game - high 30 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 10 - 13 FT ) , and he added 8 assists . Nicolas_Batum had a fantastic all - around game , as he scored 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , grabbed 13 rebounds , and dished 8 assists . Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist poured in a season - high 20 points , grabbed 7 rebounds and blocked 2 shots in just his sixth game back from a shoulder injury that sidelined him to begin the season . Pau_Gasol notched his eighth double_double in the past 10 games as he scored a team - high 22 points for the Bulls and added 10 rebounds to go with 7 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks . No other starter for the Bulls scored more than 12 points , although Doug_McDermott scored 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) off the bench and has scored in double_digit in 3 of the past 4 games . The Bulls shot a sharp 40 percent ( 10 - 25 ) from 3 but managed to hit just 39 percent of their two_point shots ( 25 - 65 ) .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Sacramento Kings in overtime , 110 - 109 , at Golden_One_Center on Sunday . Sacramento actually led for over 40 minutes of this game , as Utah 's largest lead was only three_points . The Jazz ( 39 - 24 ) were able to escape with a win here , as this marked their fifth win in their last 7 games . Rudy_Gobert not only tipped in the game_winner , he finished the game with 16 points , 23 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 blocks . Rodney_Hood led the team in scoring , as he dropped 28 points . Gordon_Hayward contributed 23 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists , while George_Hill accrued 15 points , 5 rebounds and 8 assists . The Kings ( 25 - 37 ) have now lost 5 of their last 6 games , but this was a great effort in a losing result . Ty_Lawson led Sacramento with 19 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists . Darren_Collison finished second on the team with 18 points , 3 rebounds and 5 assists . Kosta_Koufos totaled 12 points and 10 rebounds before fouling out in the fourth quarter , while Willie_Cauley-Stein collected 15 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists .

The Timberwolves ( 24 - 36 ) picked up just their ninth road win of the season with a relatively easy task in handling the depleted Kings ( 22 - 35 ) roster . Andrew_Wiggins finished with 27 points , 4 rebounds and 1 assist on 10 - of - 22 shooting , while Karl-Anthony_Towns added 29 points , 17 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 blocks . Rebounding was what kept the Kings out of reach as Gorgui_Dieng added 10 boards , and the Wolves totaled 52 as a unit , to just the Kings 42 rebounds . Kosta_Koufos rounded out his 14 points with 11 rebounds to finish the double_double .

The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 40 - 20 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 42 - 19 ) 103 - 98 at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Oklahoma_City stormed out to a 20 point lead behind Russell_Westbrook and Kevin_Durant , which has been the theme of their season so far . Chris_Paul and company needed a miracle to make the comeback , and that miracle was granted after DeAndre_Jordan made 2 free_throws , as part of 2 possessions that sent him to the free_throw line the old fashioned way . With just under 5:0 remaining in the fourth quarter , Wesley_Johnson drained back - to - back treys to pull within 8 points of the Thunder . Kevin_Durant led all scorers with 30 points , to go along with 11 rebounds , 5 assists and 5 blocks , while Russell_Westbrook , who 's shot selection late in the game became strange , finished with 24 points , 6 rebounds and 12 assists . Serge_Ibaka pitched in a double_double with 11 points and 11 boards , and the Thunder bench was led by Enes_Kanter 's 8 points and 8 rebounds . On the Clippers end , it was Paul 's unselfish leadership , as he finished with 21 points , 4 rebounds and 13 assists . Wesley_Johnson deserves a lot of credit down the stretch , as he pestered Kevin_Durant with fabulous defense , and scored 11 points off the bench . The volume shot selection was not the best of choice , seeing as he took 16 shots , but the ones that fell came at the right time to bail out the 4 - of - 16 shooting . DeAndre_Jordan nailed his free_throws when they mattered most and totaled 20 points and 18 rebounds .
The dynamic duo of Kemba_Walker and Nicolas_Batum led the Hornets to their 11th win in 17 home games , with the former scoring a game - high 22 points and the latter providing 16 . Kemba_Walker complemented his scoring total with 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal and Nicolas_Batum filled out the stat sheet with 13 rebounds , 8 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . Goran_Dragic could only muster 5 points on 2 - of - 11 shooting , while Hassan_Whiteside went for 8 points and 10 rebounds .

Oklahoma_City ended up shooting 55 percent from the field , while holding Philly to just 43 percent . The Sixers ( 26 - 45 ) continue to play shorthanded and results like this are inevitable with their best player sidelined . Robert_Covington matched Dario_Saric 's 12 points , adding 2 rebounds and 1 block to his tally . Shawn_Long finished second on the team , totaling 13 points and 6 rebounds off the bench . The Thunder ( 41 - 30 ) now have 26 wins at home , as they 've made Chesapeake_Energy_Arena an absolute fortress . Russell_Westbrook finished the game with 18 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists on 6 - of - 6 from the field . Enes_Kanter led the team in scoring , as he provided 24 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Victor_Oladipo accrued 18 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist .
Kevin_Love has had a great start to the 2016 - 17 season and has looked like his old self , averaging 22 points and 11 rebounds per game thus far . Tuesday night against the Jazz , Kevin_Love posted just 12 points and 9 rebounds in 37 minutes while shooting a sorry 4 - of - 14 from the field and 2 - of - 6 from behind the arc . So , while his numbers look solid , he 's averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds through those 4 games , Kevin_Love is playing at an alarmingly inefficient rate .
They spearheaded a red - hot offense that managed 57 percent shooting , including 60 percent from three_point range . The Bucks notably outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin after intermission . Six Bulls players finished scoring in double_figures , led by Jimmy_Butler 's team high 28 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jimmy_Butler added 4 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals across 30 minutes of action . Dwyane_Wade added 18 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists in 24 minutes , while 8 Chicago players came off the bench to provide some rest for the starters in the fourth quarter . Russell_Westbrook had a quiet outing as compared to most of his campaign so far , as the Thunder point guard finished with 28 points , 8 assists and 5 rebounds on 10 - of - 23 shooting in 29 minutes . Victor_Oladipo aided Russell_Westbrook in double_figures with 12 points , but the starters were simply not able to find a rhythm , especially the front court
The Toronto Raptors ( 40 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 2 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Tuesday . This was a 1 - point game going into the final quarter , but the Raptors pulled away by winning the fourth quarter 28 - 18 in a defensive showcase . With the Raptors ' strength being their backcourt , it was not a huge surprise to see the Mavericks struggle to contain Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan in this matchup , as both scored over 20 points in the victory . The Raptors added to 1 of their best starts in franchise history by limiting Dallas to 38 percent shooting from the field . They have now won their 4 games by a combined 47 points and have 3 straight double_digit victories . Dallas was led by Dirk_Nowitzki , who finished with 18 points and 7 rebounds in the loss
The Washington Wizards defeated the New_York Knicks , 119 - 112 , at Verizon_Center on Thursday . The Wizards ' ( 3 - 8 ) offense received a notable boost with the return of Bradley_Beal , who 'd missed 3 games with a hamstring injury . The talented 2 - guard posted 18 points , 5 assists and 2 rebounds over 29 minutes , knocking down half of his 5 three_point attempts in the process . The reserves were solid as well , totaling 33 points , and the Wizards shot a stellar 54 percent from the field overall and 60 percent from three_point range . The Knicks ( 5 - 7 ) saw Derrick_Rose lead the way with a game - high 27 points , which he complemented with 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Carmelo_Anthony managed 19 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Kristaps_Porzingis supplied 16 points , 7 boards , 2 assists and 4 steals . Brandon_Jennings was outstanding off the bench over 24 minutes , posting a 17 - point , 11 - assist double_double that also included 5 rebounds and 1 steal . John_Wall paced the Wizards with a 23 - point , 11 - assist double_double that he rounded out with 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Otto_Porter continued his recent stretch of strong play with 21 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steals and 0 block . Marcin_Gortat was solid down low , registering 16 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Markieff_Morris was the only Washington player not to tally double_digit scoring , but he did generate a full stat line of 8 points , 8 boards , 2 assists and 1 steal . Marcus_Thornton paced the reserves with 13 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
The Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 30 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 30 - 32 ) 108 - 100 in All-Star Jimmy_Butler 's first game back from injury . Jimmy_Butler posted 24 points , 11 rebounds , and 6 assists to help lead the Bulls past the struggling Rockets . Jimmy_Butler was not the biggest story , however , as big man Pau_Gasol led the team with 28 points and 17 rebounds . 36 points from James_Harden did n't make a difference on Saturday , as the Rockets fell to the faltering Bulls . The All-Star delivered 5 rebounds and 8 assists as well , but could not compensate for the rest of his team 's struggles . Center Dwight_Howard in particular had issues , posting just 8 points and being completely outmatched by the Bulls ' Pau_Gasol
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 100 - 88 , Monday at Spectrum_Center . Kemba_Walker lead the way with yet another great all - around performance , scoring a game - high 28 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting from the field to go along with 7 assists and 6 rebounds in 35 minutes . Nicolas_Batum was n't too far behind , scoring 21 points in 43 minutes . In the end , however , it was Charlotte 's defensive effort that guided them to victory , as the team tallied up 10 steals and forced the opposition into 15 total turnovers . Their opposition , the Pacers ( 32 - 31 ) , struggled mightily offensively outside of their star Paul_George , who finished with a game - high 36 points on 15 - of - 25 shooting from the field , 10 rebounds and 5 assists in 36 minutes . Unfortunately for Indiana , those 36 points were nearly half of the team 's total points , and his teammates were ice cold from the field . Outside of Paul_George , the Pacers shot 22 - of - 56 ( 40 percent ) from the field , and their inability to support their start ultimately cost them Monday 's game .
The Houston Rockets ( 33 - 32 ) defeated the host Boston Celtics ( 39 - 27 ) 102 - 98 , Friday evening at TD_Garden . Houston struggled shooting from deep in this one , hitting only 5 - 26 from long range and gave up 17 turnovers on the game ; but on the other hand managed to keep the Celtics to just 37 percent shooting from the field . James_Harden led all scorers as he finished with 32 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 13 - 15 FT ) , along with 4 assists , 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . However , James_Harden also gave up 6 turnovers in his 36 minutes on the court . Michael_Beasley tallied 18 points ( 9 - 19 FG ) and 8 rebounds , in only 15 minutes , as the second highest scorer for the Houston . Dwight_Howard was solid in the middle , with 12 points and 12 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Meanwhile , Isaiah_Thomas was not phased as he tallied a team - high 30 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 5 - 9 3PT , 5 - 6 FT ) , along with 2 assists and 2 rebounds , in 38 minutes . Jared_Sullinger had a big night as well , with 24 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 5 - 7 FT ) , 12 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 steals , in 32 minutes , while Avery_Bradley chipped in 16 points , in 38 minutes . However , other than Isaiah_Thomas , Jared_Sullinger and Avery_Bradley , the rest of the Celtics team accounted for only 28 points .

He amassed 18 points , 9 assists , 4 rebounds , 3 steals , and 2 block in 31 minutes . His backup , Jameer_Nelson , also scored 18 points and hit 4 three_pointers . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 53 - 29 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 40 - 42 ) 113 - 100 on Sunday at Quicken_Loans_Arena in their first meeting of the first round of the Eastern_Conference Playoffs . Not only was he hitting shots , but he was making all the tough ones as well , including a three_pointer with a hand in his face at the buzzer to end the first half , putting the Cavaliers up 62 - 54 at the break . Kyrie_Irving went 11 - for - 21 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three_point line to finish with a game - high of 30 points , while also adding 3 rebounds and 2 assists . As a team , the Cavaliers shot 45 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three_point line , while the Celtics finished at 47 percent from the floor and 36 percent from deep . Like Kyrie_Irving , this also marked Kevin_Love 's NBA playoff debut and he made it count with 19 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) and 12 rebounds . His 12 rebounds helped give the Cavaliers a 46 - 34 rebounding advantage over the Celtics . LeBron_James , on the other hand , finished with 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with 6 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 steals . With Kyrie_Irving having such a big game , LeBron_James was able to focus on getting his teammates involved , as his 7 assists were a team - high . The Cavaliers also received a solid contribution from their bench , as Tristan_Thompson chipped in with 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) and 6 rebounds in 26 minutes of tough play . Isaiah_Thomas went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding 5 rebounds and 10 assists in 32 minutes off the bench . Kelly_Olynyk did everything he could to help Isaiah_Thomas and had a strong first half , but slowed down in the second to finish with 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) and 2 blocked shots off the bench . Evan_Turner finished with 12 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 5 assists , while Brandon_Bass added 10 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 2 assists .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 20 - 15 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 14 - 21 ) 117 - 116 in double overtime Tuesday . Rudy_Gay was outstanding in his own right , managing 31 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Darren_Collison acquitted himself well in subbing for the injured Rajon_Rondo ( back ) , posting a 14 - point , 12 - assist double_double , and supplementing it with 4 rebounds and 2 steals . Marco_Belinelli made some clutch baskets , and contributed 14 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists to pace the Kings ' bench . Deron_Williams shook off an ailing hamstring to lead Dallas with 25 points . He also handed out 4 assists , while hauling in 2 rebounds and tallying 2 steals . Dirk_Nowitzki pitched in with 23 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists , while Wesley_Matthews was sharp from the field , amassing 20 points and adding 3 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . Zaza_Pachulia managed only 9 points and was the sole Mavs starter that failed to tally double_digit scoring , but he brought down an impressive 17 rebounds and collected 5 steals . Chandler_Parsons had to leave the game after 29 minutes with a hip injury , but managed 10 points and 6 rebounds during his time on the court . JaVale_McGee was outstanding off the bench over just 17 minutes , posting a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double_double .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 20 - 7 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 20 - 9 ) 105 - 102 on Monday at the American_Airlines_Center in Dallas . Following the end of the third quarter , the Hawks had out - scored the Mavericks 82 - 63 , but the Mavericks came out in the fourth on fire and were able to out - score the Hawks 39 - 23 . Dennis_Schroder led the team with 22 points and 6 assists , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the free_throw line . Kyle_Korver also found success with his shot , going 4 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from beyond the arc to score 18 points . He was able to get to the free_throw line 8 times , and converted on 7 of those 8 attempts . Recording his sixth double_double of the season , Paul_Millsap recorded 13 points and 12 rebounds . DeMarre_Carroll and Al_Horford contributed 15 and 17 points respectively , helping edge the Hawks to a victory . The Mavericks were led by Monta_Ellis , who shot 8 - for - 22 from the field , but only 1 - for - 6 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 18 points . Dirk_Nowitzki had 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) of his own , while also chipping in with 6 rebounds . He 's now averaging 19 points and 6 rebounds on the season . In only his second game of the season with the Mavericks , Rajon_Rondo notched his first double_double with his new team , recording 13 points and 11 assists . Tyson_Chandler had a huge night on the boards , as he recorded 19 rebounds to go along with 8 points .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 35 - 8 ) manhandled the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 29 ) , 110 - 91 , on Wednesday . Nevertheless , CJ_Miles topped all teammates , notching 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 8 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) in 27 reserve minutes .
Paul_Millsap finished with 21 points , 9 rebound , 5 assists , 2 steals and 5 blocks on 4 - of - 12 shooting , while Tim_Hardaway_Jr. stepped up again for the injured Thabo_Sefolosha and is close to becoming a more permanent part of the starting lineup . The Golden_State Warriors ( 20 ) defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 97 - 87 on Monday at Oracle_Arena in Oakland in game 2 of their first round matchup of the Western_Conference playoffs . The Pelicans got off to a really quick start in this game , out_scoring the Warriors 28 - 17 in the first quarter , as both Anthony_Davis and Eric_Gordon finished the quarter in double_figures . After a tight third quarter , the Warriors finally broke out in the fourth , as Klay_Thompson got hot and scored 14 points in the final quarter to help push the Warriors to the 10 - point win and give them the 2 game advantage in the series . Including scoring 14 in the fourth quarter , Klay_Thompson finished the game with a team - high of 26 points , as he shot 11 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from deep . Stephen_Curry , on the other hand , posted 22 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , 4 rebounds and 6 assists over 37 minutes . He notched a double_double and did a little bit of everything in the win , finishing with 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds , 6 assists , 1 steals and 2 blocked shots . Andrew_Bogut chipped in with 14 rebounds as well , helping give the Warriors a 49 - 42 rebounding advantage . Anthony_Davis recorded 26 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 8 - 8 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots , while Eric_Gordon added 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 5 - 10 3PT ) and 2 assists . Tyreke_Evans was back in the lineup Monday though and the injury did n't look to hold him back , as he finished with 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 7 - 12 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 7 assists in a near triple_double effort . Norris_Cole provided a nice contribution off the bench as well , scoring 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 0 - 1 FT ) in 28 minutes .

The Washington Wizards ( 23 - 27 ) fought off a second - half rally from the New_York Knicks ( 23 - 32 ) to win 111 - 108 at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday . Despite being outscored by 13 in the third quarter , Washington was able to narrowly pull out a win in the game 's final minutes . John_Wall played a whopping 43 minutes in 4 quarters and turned the ball over just once despite being the focal point of the Washington offense . Meanwhile , John_Wall 's backcourt partner in crime Bradley_Beal drilled 5 three_pointers and poured in 26 points overall . Bradley_Beal shot a disappointing 5 - for - 9 from the free_throw line , but more than made up for it with his impressive shooting from the field ( 8 - of - 14 ) and his stellar defense ( 4 steals ) . Rebounding , however , proved to be an issue for the Wizards , as they pulled down just 32 boards to New_York 's 46 . Superstar Carmelo_Anthony was unsurprisingly the leader for his team on Tuesday , as he posted a game - high 33 points to go along with 13 rebounds . Melo hit 3 three_pointers and was perfect from the line , helping his team post an impressive 53 percent from the field . Carmelo_Anthony saw help in the form of Latvian rookie Kristaps_Porzingis , who scored 20 points and blocked 3 shots . The Knicks struggled , however , to match their opponents ' heat from beyond the arc , as they shot just 31 percent from three_point territory .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 107 - 91 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday . Things did n't seem to exactly be pointing in the right direction early on Sunday , as Kevin_Love was forced from the game after 12 minutes with back spasms . The Thunder ( 28 - 20 ) also held a 24 - 21 lead after 1 quarter , but LeBron_James and Kyrie_Irving turned things up a notch during the second period . Cleveland outscore OKC by a 37 - 21 margin over that span , building 58 - 45 lead heading into halftime . Russell_Westbrook did manage to record yet another triple_double , but was `` contained ' to a manageable 20 points , 12 rebounds , 10 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , shooting just 7 - of - 26 from the field . Victor_Oladipo did n't fare much better , posting 17 points ( on 6 - of - 18 shooting ) , 7 boards and 4 assists . Domantas_Sabonis provided 12 points and 5 rebounds . Steven_Adams tallied 7 points but also hauled in 10 boards , along with 1 assist and 1 block . Joffrey_Lauvergne led the bench with 13 points , 6 rebounds and 1 assist . Kyrie_Irving paced Cleveland with 29 points , 10 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . LeBron_James supplied 25 points , 14 boards , 8 assists and 1 steal . Tristan_Thompson contributed a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 4 steals and 4 blocks . Reggie Richard_Jefferson led the second unit with 8 points , 4 rebounds and 1 steal .
The Toronto Raptors ( 20 ) were able to pull away on the road from the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) in the second half of Friday 's game , winning by a score of 113 - 103 . Terrence_Ross was a star performer off the bench for Toronto , notching 21 points on 8 - for - 12 shooting . DeMarre_Carroll knocked down 4 three_pointers to finish with 21 points , while Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan both shook off poor shooting nights to combine for 37 points . That offensive deficiency was further exacerbated by the team 's ineffectiveness on the glass , with Toronto outrebounding Boston by a 53 - 38 count . Amir_Johnson chipped in 11 points and 8 boards off the bench , while fellow frontcourt reserve Kelly_Olynyk contributed 11 points of his own .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 104 - 89 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday evening . They shot 38 percent from the field and only 2 - of - 15 from long range . The Heat ( 32 - 34 ) on the other hand , came out on fire , with a 32 - point first quarter and won the second quarter 27 - 15 , to take a 59 - 41 lead into halftime . Dion_Waiters was the high - point man for Miami , with 20 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , including 4 - of - 6 from deep . Goran_Dragic had his night cut short after 17 minutes of action , as he took a hit in the eye , which resulted in swelling . Hassan_Whiteside double_doubled , with 12 points and 14 rebounds , to go along with 4 blocks , in 33 minutes , while Tyler_Johnson added 16 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , despite shooting 5 - of - 16 , DeMar_DeRozan was the high point man for the Raptors , with 17 points in 28 minutes of action . Norman_Powell got the start in place of DeMarre_Carroll and finished with 14 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting . Jonas_Valanciunas finished with 10 points on 5 - of - 6 shooting , and 10 rebounds , in only 21 minutes .
Kyrie_Irving 's red - hot start continued Tuesday , with his 10 - for - 19 shooting tally from the field and 4 - for - 6 mark from beyond the arc leading the Cavs to record 52 and 50 percent success rates from the field and three_point range , respectively . They out_rebounded the Rockets by a 46 - 32 margin as well , in large part due to LeBron_James and Tristan_Thompson combining for half of that tally . The Rockets continue to lean heavily on James_Harden , who once again paced the team with 41 points while setting up another 30 - plus through his 15 assists
