The Memphis Grizzlies ( 50 - 21 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 14 - 57 ) 103 - 82 on Monday at Madison_Square_Garden in New_York . The Grizzlies were the much better shooting team in this game , going 52 percent from the field and an impressive 58 percent from the three_point line , while the Knicks ended at just 42 percent from the floor and a meager 22 percent from deep . Zach_Randolph led the way , finishing with a team - high of 23 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 7 rebounds and 5 assists . He 's played well of late for Memphis and is averaging 19 points and 7 rebounds over his last 5 games . Marc_Gasol also had a strong showing , posting 21 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 8 rebounds over 32 minutes . Jeff_Green chipped in with 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 3 rebounds as well . Vince_Carter finished with 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 6 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) in 21 minutes , while Kosta_Koufos recorded 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and 5 rebounds in 16 minutes . Langston_Galloway did his best to keep the Knicks in this game , going 7 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding 7 rebounds and 5 assists . Andrea_Bargnani did his part as well , posting 18 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and 2 blocked shots in 31 minutes . With Alexey_Shved sidelined with a rib injury , Shane_Larkin moved into the starting lineup , but he contributed just 4 points ( 2 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and 7 assists in 44 minutes . Lance_Thomas chipped in with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 2 steals , while Jason_Smith came off the bench for 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 4 rebounds .
The 76ers shot a fairly poor 43 percent overall from the field , while the Pelicans managed to shoot just 39 percent . Philadelphia struggled to make it to the free_throw line , shooting just 13 attempts and only making 9 of them ( 69 percent ) . And while New_Orleans did get to the line more often , shooting 25 shots from the charity stripe , they made just 68 percent of those . Where the Pelicans excelled was in taking care of the basketball , committing just 12 turnovers on the night , but the 76ers still found a way to be better there , committing just 10 turnovers .

The Denver Nuggets ( 24 - 37 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 50 ) 117 - 107 at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday . It was far from a pretty showcase between the 2 teams , but the Lakers received another strong performance from rookie point guard D’Angelo D'Angelo_Russell , who scored 24 points on 9 - of - 21 shooting , to go along with 1 rebound and 6 assists in 36 minutes . D'Angelo_Russell has broken through in the second half of the season , and heading into Wednesday , he had posted a 5 game stretch averaging 21 points , 4 rebounds , 6 assists on 55 percent shooting . Brandon_Bass added 11 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting off the bench , but helped bring his team within striking distance of the Nuggets down the stretch , forcing a couple of turnovers and defending both the paint and wing at an exceptional level . Kobe_Bryant 5 points in 11 minutes of game time , while Julius_Randle fell short of a double_double with 17 points and 7 rebounds . The Nuggets held on to win , but it looked bleak after surviving an 8 minutes stretch of play between the third and fourth quarters where they scored an underwhelming 2 points . Denver shot 1 - of - 12 during that stretch , and save for the Lakers inability to rebound the ball , the 8 minute stretch could have been extended . The unlikely hero came on the back of DJ_Augustin , who rallied the Nuggets after the scoring drought and finished with 26 points , 7 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal on 7 - of - 11 shooting in 23 minutes off of the bench . Emmanuel_Mudiay put together a strong game , and the rookie matchup with D'Angelo_Russell made for the most entertainment , as he rounded out the box score with 22 points , 4 rebounds and 7 assists on 10 - of - 20 shooting .

The Suns shot only 44 percent from the field , including 29 percent from deep . They also had a troubling 18 turnovers , 1 of which led directly to the loss . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Golden_State Warriors 132 - 110 Monday at Pepsi_Center . The result was the game essentially being over by halftime , with Denver holding a convincing 25 - point advantage after the first 24 minutes of the game . Nikola_Jokic recorded a triple_double of 17 points , 21 rebounds and 12 assists in 36 minutes . But it did n't stop there for Denver , as 3 starters managed to score at least 20 points Monday night , with Juan_Hernangomez scoring a game - high 27 points to go along with 10 rebounds , Will_Barton scoring 24 points and Jameer_Nelson adding 23 of his own . As a team , the Nuggets were simply unstoppable from behind the arc , shooting 59 percent from long range . Kevin_Durant was remarkably efficient , scoring 25 points in 27 minutes , but it was n't nearly enough to tame the high - powered Denver offense . Stephen_Curry really struggled , putting together 1 of his worst performances of the season and finishing with just 11 points on a brutal 4 - of - 18 shooting from the field

The Miami Heat ( 7 - 4 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 4 - 9 ) 116 - 109 on Thursday . Although they found themselves in a 56 - 46 hole at the half , the Kings did finish with a healthy total of 109 points due to a number of valuable contributions across the lineup . Rajon_Rondo held up his end of the bargain trying to keep the Kings offense running on all cylinders , coming within 2 rebound of a second consecutive triple_double and fourth in 5 games . Rudy_Gay supported Rajon_Rondo 's effort with a double_double performance of his own , posting 13 points , 12 rebounds , 2 assists , and 1 steal . Meanwhile , Omri_Casspi played a season - high 39 minutes and was productive with the extended court time , chipping in with a 16 - point , 6 - rebound effort . Notably , Marco_Belinelli contributed a season - high 23 points off the bench in a highly efficient 26 minutes . Free of having to bump bodies with DeMarcus_Cousins all night , Chris_Bosh posted 23 points , 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block in 1 of his most complete performances of the year . Dwyane_Wade stuffed the stat sheet as well , amassing 24 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals against the Kings ' vulnerable shooting guard defense . Hassan_Whiteside had a relatively quiet game by his standards and could n't get on the stat sheet until well into the second quarter , but finished with a respectable 12 points , 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 4 more blocks . Much like his Kings shooting guard counterpart Marco_Belinelli , Tyler_Johnson turned in an impressive performance in a reserve role for Miami , pacing the Heat bench with 19 points over 25 minutes .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 20 - 51 ) defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers ( 51 - 21 ) 104 - 95 , Thursday evening at Barclays_Center . Brooklyn came out tough from the start and led 59 - 49 at halftime , however Cleveland responded with a big third quarter and took a three_point lead into the fourth . The Nets were relentless as they battled back in the fourth , beginning with 10 points in the first 4 minutes , including 8 from Rondae Hollis-Richard_Jefferson . Brook_Lopez led the way with 22 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists , in 31 minutes , while Shane_Larkin also came up large , with 16 points , 7 assists and 3 rebounds , in 31 minutes . The Nets assisted on 28 of their 41 field goals while their defense held the Cavs to only 44 percent from the field , 26 percent from long range and forced Cleveland into 14 turnovers . LeBron_James had a very solid outing , with 30 points ( 13 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal , in 35 minutes of action , but it was not enough to get his team over the hump in this one . Only 2 other players scored in double_digit other than LeBron , including Kyrie_Irving , who shot 6 - 22 , on his way to 13 points , and Kevin_Love , who shot 5 - 14 , for 11 points .
The Pistons shot 42 percent from the field and struggled from long range , where they hit on 3 - of - 13 . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope was the only starter to score in double_digit for Detroit , as he finished with only 10 points on 4 - of - 12 shooting , in 29 minutes . Three players chipped in double_digit off the bench , including Ish_Smith , who added a team - high 16 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting . Aron_Baynes chipped in 12 points and hauled in 12 rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench , while Tobias_Harris also finished with 12 points off the bench . Meanwhile , Gordon_Hayward led the Jazz with a team - high 25 points , to go along with 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal , in 34 minutes . Four other players scored in double_digit for the Jazz , including Joe_Johnson , Rudy_Gobert and Joe_Ingles , who chipped in 12 points each .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Denver Nuggets , 123 - 113 , Wednesday at Pepsi_Center . The Wizards ( 39 - 24 ) , who have now won 3 straight road games to improve their record away from home to 13 - 15 , won Wednesday 's matchup in fairly effortless fashion , as they opened up the game early and went into halftime with a 17 - point lead . That was thanks in large part to an incredibly hot shooting performance from Washington , as they shot 57 percent from the field and 42 percent from behind the arc . The Wizards were once again led by a pair of great performances from their starting backcourt , with John_Wall posting a game - high 30 points and 10 assists , while Bradley_Beal scored 23 points of his own . As a team , the Nuggets shot 53 percent from the field and a scorching 46 percent from behind the arc , but the 123 points they gave up ended up being too much to overcome . Gary_Harris led the way for Denver , shooting 10 - of - 15 from the field and 6 - of - 9 from behind the arc en route to scoring a game - high 26 points . Wilson_Chandler added 21 points of his own , while Mason_Plumlee added 19 points and 10 rebounds for a double_double .

The Nets pulled away with a 35 - point third quarter , climbing into the eighth spot in the Eastern_Conference , The Nets played the final game of their 8 - game road trip , finishing 3 - 5 during that stretch . They hit 44 percent of their three_pointers , improving to 10 - 1 when making at least 40 percent from beyond the arc . Deron_Williams contributed 25 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal , 4 three_pointers , and 1 turnover in 35 minutes . Bojan_Bogdanovic returned to the lineup after missing 3 games , playing 11 minutes off the bench . His replacement , Markel_Brown , was limited to 21 minutes after injuring his ankle . Dirk_Nowitzki added a team - high 20 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 three_pointers in 31 minutes . Devin_Harris supplied 14 points off the bench , and Al-Farouq_Aminu didn’t miss a shot , recording 12 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 4 steals , 2 blocks and 2 three_pointers .

This all too familiar circumstance must have ignited Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan , who went into clutch mode , hitting 2 three_pointers each , combining for 12 points in the last 3 and a half minutes . Kyle_Lowry really helped Toronto get over the hump in this one as he scored 12 of his 21 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) in the final quarter . Kyle_Lowry also tallied 6 assists and 3 rebounds , in 39 hard fought minutes . DeMar_DeRozan poured in a game - high 31 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) , along with 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals , in 38 minutes . Cory_Joseph finished with 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 5 - 8 FT ) , 6 assists and 2 rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench . He did however give up an unsightly 6 turnovers , in his 32 minutes on the floor . The Washington Wizards defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 109 - 99 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday night . Washington saw a 112 - 111 lead go by the wayside at the buzzer courtesy of a Marcus Markieff_Morris tip - in , and they were facing another formidable challenge in the form of a surging Hornets ( 23 - 22 ) squad that had won 3 in a row . Washington played very well on both sides of the ball , tallying 54 and 40 percent success rates from the field and three_point range , respectively , and also limiting Charlotte to 39 and 25 percent figures in those categories . John_Wall 's 24 points paced the Wizards , and he added 7 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Markieff_Morris followed with 23 points , a total he supplemented with 8 rebounds and 2 assists . Bradley_Beal was a highly effective third wheel with 18 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Otto_Porter_Jr. contributed a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists . Marcin_Gortat put forward a modest 8 points and 7 boards , along with 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. led the second unit with 10 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 blocks and 1 steal . Kemba_Walker led the way for the Hornets with 21 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 block . Marco_Belinelli tallied 18 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal to lead the bench . Cody_Zeller and Marvin_Williams followed with matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks , and the latter supplying 8 boards , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist totaled 8 points , 7 boards , 1 assist and 1 block , and Nicolas_Batum had a relatively quiet game by his standards , especially on the scoreboard , posting 4 points , 6 assists and 7 rebounds .
It was 1 of the best nights of the season for Washington , as the Wizards blew out their divisional rival by almost 30 points . Rising star Otto_Porter_Jr. was at the forefront of the winning effort , leading the team with 21 points while pulling down 11 rebounds . Star point guard John_Wall , meanwhile , scored 19 while dishing out a team - leading 9 assists . The Hawks shot just 36 percent and under 29 percent from three_point range . It may have been the worst night of the season for All-Star Paul_Millsap , who shot just 1 - of - 7 for 4 points and 4 rebounds . Center Dwight_Howard , however , had a double_double with 12 points and 13 boards .

The Spurs were simply fantastic offensively in this matchup , as they shot over 50 percent from the field and accumulated 35 assists as a team . The third quarter was when the tide turned for both teams , as the Spurs scored 42 points in the quarter , which included an 180 run . The problem for the Hornets was that the only player who scored more than 13 points was Kemba_Walker and that simply wo n't get it done against a team like the Spurs . They also shot below 65 percent from the free_throw line and all that makes for a recipe of disaster . The Spurs were at top form on Saturday , as they outscored the Hornets by 16 points in the second half . They played some typical Spurs basketball , as they dished out 35 team assists , while shooting 56 percent from the field . No other member of the starting 5 managed double_digit in the scoring column , although Marcin_Gortat had a near double_double with 8 points and 9 rebounds . Brandon_Jennings led the second unit with 18 points and Bojan_Bogdanovic totaled 17 . Ian_Mahinmi managed 16 points , while Kelly_Oubre_Jr. and Jason_Smith were productive as reserves as well with 9 and 8 - point efforts , respectively . Jeremy_Lin supplied 14 points , while Isaiah_Whitehead , Archie_Goodwin and KJ_McDaniels all generated 10 - point efforts off the bench as well .

The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 113 - 94 Thursday at Quicken_Loans_Arena . Los_Angeles got out to a slow start , but were able to pull away from Cleveland with the help of big second and third quarters where they outscore the home team by 24 points . JJ_Redick led the way with a superb shooting night , scoring a team - high 23 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 6 from behind the arc . As a team , the game was won for the Clippers with their outside shooting , as they shot 42 percent from long range overall . For the Cavaliers , this is the second dud they 've put up in as many games , shooting just 41 percent from the field and recording 18 total turnovers to just 12 assists . Kyrie_Irving had a solid evening , scoring a game - high 28 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting from the field , but both LeBron_James and Kevin_Love failed to produce much offensively , combining for 32 total points on 12 - of - 25 shooting . The only other Cleveland player to score in double_figures was Richard_Jefferson , who scored 12 points in 22 minutes off the bench .

Kenneth_Faried came close to matching DeAndre_Jordan 's 20 - 20 performance , but came up a little shy with 19 points and 17 rebounds .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 125 - 109 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Saturday . Cleveland checked in to Saturday with 22 victories in 27 tilts at Quicken_Loans_Arena , and with an injury - hampered Nuggets ( 24 - 30 ) squad on tap , they went into the game as heavy favorites . LeBron_James and Kyrie_Irving insured that they did n't squander the opportunity , leading the way with matching 27 - point efforts . The Cavs were excellent on both ends of the floor , posting success rates of 55 percent from the field and 50 percent from three_point range , while limiting Denver to respective tallies of 40 and 34 in those categories . Nikola_Jokic stepped up as usual for the Nuggets , pacing them with a 27 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists and 2 blocks . Jamal_Murray matched Gary_Harris ' scoring total while leading the second unit , and he added 1 assist and 1 steal . Wilson_Chandler drew another start for Danilo_Gallinari ( groin ) and provided 13 points , 6 boards and 1 assist . Jameer_Nelson filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , 8 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals . Will_Barton was productive as a reserve as well with 12 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Kyrie_Irving supplemented his aforementioned scoring total with 5 assists , 4 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . LeBron_James dished out 12 assists , hauled in 5 rebounds and recorded 2 steals . Kevin_Love had a near double_double with 16 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 0 block . Tristan_Thompson supplied a 13 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Kyle_Korver led the second unit with 14 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .

Jae_Crowder was all over the court , forcing jump balls , nabbing 2 steals , and blocking 3 shots to go with 7 rebounds and 16 points .

The Washington Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 14 ) 103 - 91 on Friday . It was John_Wall 's turn to save the day again Friday , as he led Washington to a 31 - 19 fourth quarter that allowed them to pull away from the pesky Magic . The 25 - year - old impressively tallied 12 points and 5 assists in the final period to spearhead the Wizards ' offensive attack and secure the victory . Victor_Oladipo served as the Magic 's top gun Friday , collecting 20 points and adding 5 assists , 1 rebound and 4 steals over 31 minutes . John_Wall led Washington with an overall tally of 24 points , 13 assists , 2 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Ramon_Sessions and Kris_Humphries paced the Wizards ' bench with 13 and 11 points , respectively .

They held Memphis to just 39 points in the second half and 38 percent shooting throughout the game . They had just 13 assists and made only 30 baskets in a dreadful game . Mike_Conley led the team with 20 points scored and Marc_Gasol put in a 16 - point , 8 - rebound effort . There were some fun moments , as Dirk_Nowitzki turned back the clock to dunk and record 1 block in this game . Zaza_Pachulia had yet another double_double , as he snatched 10 points and 18 rebounds in the win . The most encouraging sign here was the effort by Chandler_Parsons , who accumulated 16 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists in 31 minutes of play .

While Derrick_Rose led the team in scoring with 24 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and 7 assists , the Bulls got production from all over . Joakim_Noah posted 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) with 14 rebounds and 6 assists . Detroit only played 8 players in this game , and while 7 of the 8 scored at least 9 points , no 1 scored more than 19 . Both Josh_Smith and Greg_Monroe had double_double 's , with Josh_Smith collecting 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 blocks . Greg_Monroe scored 16 points ( 8 - 15 FG ) to go with 10 rebounds and 2 assists .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Boston Celtics , 102 - 101 , in Game 1 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs on Saturday at Philips_Arena . Boston shot just 23 percent in a 34 - point first half and that ultimately built too deep of a hole to climb out of . The defense was key for Atlanta , as they held Boston to 36 percent shooting from the field and stifled for the majority of the game . The Hawks also took 35 free_throws compared to the Celtics 19 , as Boston simply couldn’t stop fouling . Isaiah_Thomas led the team with 27 points and also dished out 8 assists in the loss . Avery_Bradley had 18 points through 3 quarters , but had to leave early with what appeared to be a hamstring injury . Jae_Crowder recorded a double_double in a 14 - point , 10 - rebound outing . Al_Horford led the team with 24 points , while also snatching down 12 rebounds . Jeff_Teague was fantastic as well , accumulating 23 points , 12 assists and 4 rebounds in the win . Kent_Bazemore had 1 of his best games of the season , scoring 23 points and grabbing 8 rebounds .
The Jazz fell behind by a 42 - 29 margin after 1 quarter , but limited Orlando to just 65 points the rest of the way . Utah shot a stellar 49 percent , although the Magic countered with an impressive 46 percent success rate . Aaron_Gordon_Hayward 's 23 points led Utah , while Rudy_Gobert managed a 19 - point , 19 - rebound double_double . Derrick_Favors registered 17 points , and George_Hill and Rodney_Hood turned in matching 14 - point efforts . Joe_Ingles and Alec_Burks led the second unit with a pair of 8 - point tallies . Elfrid_Payton posted a game - high 28 points for the Magic . Serge_Ibaka supplied 13 points despite a sore shoulder . Jodie_Meeks notched a spot start for Evan_Fournier ( foot ) and collected 12 points , while Jeff_Green 's 11 points led the bench .

The Houston Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) 115 - 109 on Wednesday at the Toyota_Center in Houston . After coming out of the first quarter down by 11 , the Clippers took off in the second behind Blake_Griffin , out_scoring the Rockets 41 - 21 to take a 9 - point lead into the half . The Clippers shot 45 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three_point line , while the Rockets finished at 43 percent from the field and just 19 percent from deep . While he hit only 30 percent of his three_point shots , James_Harden did what he does best and got to the free_throw line . He went a perfect 15 - of - 15 from the line , helping the Rockets shoot a whopping 64 free_throws . Dwight_Howard went just 8 - for - 21 from the free_throw line , but he still managed to score 24 points ( 8 - 11 FG ) in 35 minutes . Dwight_Howard recorded 16 rebounds and 4 blocked shots as well , helping the Rockets to secure a 54 - 40 rebounding advantage , which also made a big difference . Trevor_Ariza chipped in with a 15 - point ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) , 13 - rebound double_double as well . Blake_Griffin recorded 14 points in the first quarter alone , and then went on to score a game - high of 34 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 8 - 11 FT ) , while also adding 15 rebounds and 4 assists . DeAndre_Jordan notched a double_double of his own , recording 16 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . Jamal_Crawford added 19 points off the bench , but he shot just 6 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 8 from the three_point line , as he seemed to struggle with his shot .

The Timberwolves ' bench only chipped in 9 points in the contest , despite having the newly acquired and energetic Lance_Stephenson as a part of the troop .

He also managed to drain 12 of his 23 attempts from the field , and 4 of his 10 three_point attempts . He also dished out 8 assists , hauled in 6 rebounds and recorded 1 steal . While Bismack_Biyombo was the game 's biggest story , shattering his personal rebounding record while also scoring 16 points on just 6 field goal attempts and recording 2 blocks , All-Star Kyle_Lowry also had a big night . Kyle_Lowry scored 28 points and neared a triple_double , also recording 8 rebounds and 8 assists . All in all it was a big night for the Raptors , who were able to walk away victorious despite an abysmal 36 percent shooting night . The Pacers , meanwhile , had an equally horrific shooting night , going just 39 percent from the field . Star Paul_George led the way with 18 points and 9 rebounds , but no 1 Pacer took over the game in the way Bismack_Biyombo and the Raptors backcourt were able to . Guard Monta_Ellis came up with 4 big steals and dished out 7 assists , but shot just 3 - for - 11 on the night .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 14 - 20 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 12 - 21 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday night . The starters were the big difference in the game , as the Trail_Blazers starting - 5 outscored Denver 's 76 - 53 . The Nuggets defense struggled yet again , as Portland shot nearly 50 percent from the field . Will_Barton played his homecoming game here and performed spectacularly , tallying 31 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists in the defeat . Gary_Harris also played well , as he scored 19 points and grabbed 4 rebounds . He had yet another great game here , as he contributed 29 points , 2 rebounds and 4 assists in the win . Allen_Crabbe also had 1 of his best games of the season , as he scored 20 points and grabbed 5 boards .
The Portland Trail_Blazers evened their Western_Conference first - round playoff series against the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers with a 98 - 84 win Monday in Game 4 at Moda_Center . Al-Farouq_Aminu finished with 30 points in the contest , and at times looked like he would not miss a shot . Damian_Lillard finished with 12 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal on 4 - of - 15 shooting , while CJ_McCollum added 19 points . Maurice_Harkless contributed 12 points and 7 boards and Mason_Plumlee played efficiently as a utility man , as he completed a double_double with 14 rebounds and 10 assists . Allen_Crabbe went a perfect 5 - of - 5 from the field on his way to 12 points in 27 minutes off the bench . Prior to Chris_Paul leaving the game , he was the main difference maker for the Clippers success in the first half , as he was responsible for his team 's first 10 points on 5 - of - 5 shooting , but eventually cooled off and finished with 16 points , 1 rebound and 4 assists . Jeff_Greene and Jamal_Crawford aided the starters with a combined 29 points off the bench , while Blake_Griffin 17 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists on 6 - of - 15 shooting .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Tuesday at the Pepsi_Center in Denver . Tim_Duncan reached double_figures as well with 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) . He had a season - low of 5 rebounds , but the Spurs were still able to secure the win . He went a perfect 3 - for - 3 from the field and 9 - for - 9 from the free_throw line to score 15 points in only 15 minutes . The Milwaukee Bucks ( 39 - 40 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 15 - 64 ) 99 - 91 on Friday in New_York . But they were able to kick it up a notch in the third quarter and outscore the Knicks by 13 in the period , and they were able to take care of business from there . Giannis_Antetokounmpo was thrust back into the starting lineup after a DNP ( coach 's decision ) in Milwaukee 's last game , and he played very well , scoring 23 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 9 - 11 FT ) and grabbing 9 rebounds in 31 minutes . Khris_Middleton was not far behind , posting 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , 7 rebounds and he was very active defensively with 6 steals in 35 minutes . Michael_Carter-Williams also continued his strong play as of late , scoring 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , 7 assists and 4 steals in 31 minutes . As a team , the Bucks recorded an astounding 17 steals , and the victory keeps them in sixth place in the Eastern_Conference . Langston_Galloway was once again solid in the losing effort , scoring 20 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 35 minutes . The Knicks recorded a dreadful 24 turnovers to just 22 assists , and they continue to boast the worst record in the NBA this season .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 25 - 35 ) defeated the visiting Houston Rockets ( 29 - 31 ) 128 - 121 , on Monday night at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center . That trend continued Monday night as they trailed 32 - 26 after 1 quarter for the 10th straight game . Despite winning the last 6 match - ups versus Milwaukee , Houston came up short this time as the Bucks racked up a season - high 128 points behind huge nights from Jabari_Parker , Khris_Middleton and Giannis_Antetokounmpo . Jabari_Parker led the Bucks in scoring with a career - high 36 points on 16 - 25 shooting from the field , along with 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 steals , in 40 minutes . Khris_Middleton added a cool 30 points , in part thanks to perfect 15 - 15 shooting from the free_throw line , while Giannis_Antetokounmpo recorded the second triple_double of his career , with 18 points , 16 rebounds and 11 assists , along with 4 steals and 2 blocked shots , in 42 minutes . Milwaukee recorded 30 assists and shot a blistering 59 percent from the field and 53 percent from deep . Michael_Carter-Williams was a late scratch with a sore knee , while Jared Jerryd_Bayless returned after missing games , to contribute 18 points , in 35 minutes off the bench . Although 121 points is usually enough to win an NBA game , Houston failed to record 1 blocked shot , allowing the Bucks to cruise to a season - high 128 points . Dwight_Howard had a huge game with 30 points and 13 rebounds , in 35 minutes , while James_Harden tagged along with 26 points , 9 assists , 6 rebounds and 3 steals , in 40 minutes . Trevor_Ariza also filled the stat line , with 20 points , 11 assists , 8 rebounds and 2 steals , in 35 minutes . Donatas_Motiejunas was quiet in his second game back , with 6 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists , in 19 minutes off the bench .
The Los_Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 41 ) defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 31 ) 99 - 96 on Thursday . His remarkable run continued Thursday , with the 37 - year - old registering a team - high 27 points , and adding 12 boards , 2 assists and 2 steals in leading Los_Angeles to only their fifth road victory of the season . The steady Jordan_Clarkson followed Kobe_Bryant 's performance with 18 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists of his own . Julius_Randle had a tough assignment against Anthony_Davis , but did contribute 11 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists as the only other Lakers starter to post double_digit scoring . D'Angelo_Russell stepped in off the bench to pace the reserves with 13 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists , while Nick_Young provided 11 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Anthony_Davis unsurprisingly dominated a vulernable Lakers frontcourt throughout the night , tallying 39 points , 11 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Bryce_Dejean-Jones , who has been a revelation during Eric_Gordon 's absence due to a finger injury , pitched in with 17 points , 9 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals . His contributions were particularly relevant on a night when backcourt mate Norris_Cole could only manage 2 points , 2 assists and 2 steals , and during which Anthony_Davis was the only other starter to post double_digit points . Jrue_Holiday was outstanding off the bench , supplying a near double_double in 34 minutes of action with 19 points , 9 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Ryan_Anderson was n't far behind with a productive effort of his own , totaling 17 points and 4 rebounds .
Karl-Anthony_Towns scored 32 points , to go along with 12 rebounds , 7 assists and 4 blocks on 13 - of - 19 shooting across 40 minutes of action . The sophomore center was aided by Andrew_Wiggins ' 24 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting and Shabazz_Muhammad 's 20 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . The Nuggets saw their best performance from Gary_Harris , who led all Denver scorers with 22 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Jamal_Murray added another strong performance in 20 minutes off the bench , where the rookie scored 17 points , to go along with 5 rebounds and 3 assists . The Timberwolves got the better of Denver with their team shooting , as Minnesota knocked down 53 percent of their shots from the field and 40 percent of their shots from behind the arc .
Behind 3 20 - point scorers , the Phoenix Suns ( 10 - 13 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 12 - 10 ) 107 - 104 Wednesday night at the Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena . Despite trailing by 10 points with 4:18 to go in the game , the Magic roared back to tie it at 12 - 102 with 2:15 to go , fueld by 7 quick points from Tobias_Harris . But Phoenix guard Eric_Bledsoe was n't having it , as he scored the final 5 points for the Suns to seal the victory . Eric_Bledsoe and Brandon_Knight each led the Suns with 21 points . Alex_Len knocked down 20 points on a clean 7 - 10 shooting night , blocked 3 shots , and notched a double_double with 14 rebounds . Mirza_Teletovic knocked down 4 of his 8 three_pointers on what was an otherwise dreadful deep shooting night for the Suns ( 6 - 24 , 25 percent as a team on three_point shots ) , but their efficiency inside ( 35 - 56 , 63 percent ) was too tough for Orlando . Nikola_Vucevic ( 8 - 16 shooting ) led the Magic with 21 points and 11 rebounds , and Elfrid_Payton notched his own double_double with 12 points and 10 assists . It was a solid offensive night for Orlando , as they rained down 12 three_pointers on 25 attempts , but their inability to stop Phoenix inside , the Suns retrieved 11 offensive rebounds , finished them .
The Phoenix Suns ( 22 - 16 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 5 - 29 ) 113 - 111 on Wednesday at the Target_Center in Minneapolis . Despite being out_rebounded 46 - 41 , the Suns were able to force the Timberwolves into 22 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . He continues to have the slight lead over Eric_Bledsoe as the the team scoring leader at 17 points per game . Eric_Bledsoe had 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) of his own . He did a little bit of everything tonight , as he contributed 5 rebounds , 7 assists and 5 steals as well . The 5 steals were a season - high for him , as he was a big reason for the large turnover differential . Point guard Eric_Bledsoe complemented his fellow guard 's play with 23 points and a team - high 8 assists . Forward TJ_Warren shot 8 - of - 17 for 16 points , and big man Alan_Williams recorded a double_double with 14 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Chicago , meanwhile , shot only 43 percent . Superstar Jimmy_Butler had 20 points and 6 assists but shot only 6 - of - 16 . Little offense was to be found outside of Jimmy_Butler and veteran Dwyane_Wade , who scored 18 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting .
The assist margin really killed the Suns , as they committed 24 turnovers , while forcing just 15 from the Heat . Tyler_Johnson was a huge spark off the bench , providing 17 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 5 steals .

The visiting Boston Celtics defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 99 - 93 , at at Target_Center on Monday . Enter the final period , the game was firmly in the Timberwolves ' ( 4 - 9 ) grasp , as they held a commanding 13 - point lead over the Celtics ( 8 - 6 ) entering the final period after winning both the second and third quarters . Boston , however , quickly changed that when they opened up the fourth quarter on a 170 run to take a 4 point lead . From there , the Timberwolves would never lead again as the Celtics ' Isaiah_Thomas closed things out for his team by scoring 10 of their final 12 points . Isaiah_Thomas finished the outing with a game - high 29 points , while Al_Horford posted 20 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 blocks in 36 minutes . For the Timberwolves , Karl-Anthony_Towns was nearly unstoppable , shooting 11 - of - 19 from the field and 2 - of - 4 from behind the arc en route to scoring a team - high 27 points and grabbing 18 rebounds

The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks 121 - 118 Wednesday at Smoothie_King_Center . After missing the last 2 games with an ankle sprain , DeMarcus_Cousins returned in a dominant fashion , as the tandem of he and Anthony_Davis were nearly unstoppable in the Pelicans ' ( 32 - 43 ) victory Wednesday night . DeMarcus_Cousins scored 29 points and grabbed a game - high 16 rebounds while Anthony_Davis still managed to score a game - high 30 points and grab 13 rebounds of his own . As a team , New_Orleans shot 50 percent from the field and a 40 percent from behind the arc , and they needed every 1 of those shots to fall as the Mavericks ( 31 - 43 ) simply would n't go away . Five different Dallas players scored in double_figures in the losing effort , with Dirk_Nowitzki leading the way with 23 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting and 7 rebounds in 31 minutes . And overall , it was actually a very impressive offensive performance for the Mavericks , as the team shot 48 percent from the field and a scorching 52 percent from behind the arc . In the end , however , the team was just unable to overcome the 12 - point lead the Pelicans took into halftime of Wednesday 's contest .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 54 - 13 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 53 - 15 ) 114 - 95 on Wednesday at Oracle_Arena in Oakland . After suffering a 124 - 116 loss to the Hawks back in February , the Warriors got plenty of revenge Wednesday , finishing with a convincing 19 - point victory over the Hawks . The Warriors shot the ball extremely well Wednesday , going 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three_point line . Harrison_Barnes was unstoppable in this matchup , going 11 - for - 13 from the floor and 2 - for - 3 from deep to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding 4 rebounds in 28 minutes . We ca n't leave out superstar Stephen_Curry though , as he posted 16 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and 12 assists in 30 minutes . Draymond_Green added 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 7 3PT , 1 - 4 FT ) and 7 rebounds as well . DeMarre_Carroll did as much as he could to keep the Hawks close , scoring 16 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . It marked his second straight 16 - point showing , while the double_double was his first since December . Paul_Millsap matched DeMarre_Carroll with 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own while adding 9 rebounds and 2 steals . He 's played real well as of late , averaging 19 points and 9 rebounds over his last 3 games . Jeff_Teague finished with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and 3 steals , while Shelvin_Mack had 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 3 steals off the bench .

OKC also dominated on the glass , where the team held a 52 - 38 rebounding advantage . Although both clubs played well on offense , the Grizzlies were able to stay hot with their shots throughout the game , posting a 49 percent success rate from the field and 43 percent from three_point range . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Clippers , as they took an 11 - point lead after the first quarter and never allowed the Lakers to get within 8 points after that . The Clippers were lights - out from the field , as they shot 52 percent in their win . The Clippers also abused the Lakers in the paint , winning that battle , 56 - 36 . The Lakers starters really let them down here , being outscored , 77 - 41 by the Clippers starters . Brandon_Ingram was second in scoring , providing 14 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists off the bench as well . Chris_Paul was equally as good , accumulating 20 points , 5 rebounds and 13 assists . Raymond_Felton was a huge spark off the bench , providing 15 points and 4 assists .

The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 7 - 4 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 5 - 4 ) 128 - 95 in Game 4 of their second - round playoff series on Sunday in Los_Angeles . The game stayed relatively close in the first half , with the Clippers boasting just a 6 - point lead after 24 minutes . But then , Los_Angeles opened up the third quarter on a 12 - 2 run , ultimately winning the quarter 43 - 25 . This was all despite the Rockets utilizing the `` hack - a - Jordan” technique , which clearly was ineffective , DeAndre_Jordan shot an astounding 34 free_throws Sunday night , making 14 of them and finishing with 26 points ( 6 - 7 FG ) and 17 rebounds , which were game - highs in both categories . Blake_Griffin was not too far behind , as he continued his strong play in the playoffs , posting 21 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) and 8 rebounds in 33 minutes . Chris_Paul added a double_double of 15 points and 12 assists , while JJ_Redick put up 18 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) . Off the bench , it was the usual suspects for Los_Angeles , with Jamal_Crawford contributing 13 points in 27 minutes and Austin_Rivers scoring 12 points in 24 minutes . As a team , the Clippers shot 49 percent from the field and a very impressive 42 percent from behind the arc . They also dished out 27 assists to just 10 turnovers and are 1 win away from the franchise 's first ever Western_Conference Finals . Dwight_Howard personified those struggles Sunday night , as he scored just 7 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 1 - 6 FT ) , grabbed 6 rebounds and fouled out of the game after playing only 18 minutes . James_Harden was able to put together a solid stat line of 21 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 6 assists in 32 minutes , but on the court , he still did not look as aggressive and energized as her normally would . Trevor_Ariza had 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 8 3 Pt ) and 8 rebounds , while Jason_Terry added 16 points in 27 minutes . Terrance Jones and Nick_Johnson each added 10 points , and overall , it was a fairly forgettable night for the Rockets .

Their lead was 74 - 48 by halftime , which set the stage for starters from both teams to eventually call it an early night later in the second half . To say Cleveland had the hot hand from the field would be an understatement , as they posted success rates of 60 percent from the field and 63 percent from behind the arc . Forward Kenneth_Faried had a particularly big night , scoring 18 points and pulling down 14 rebounds to go along with 3 blocks . Forward Mo Maurice_Harkless delivered a promising 17 points and 6 assists in his new starting role .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 25 - 7 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 5 - 28 ) 101 - 79 on Sunday . Wesley_Matthews scored a game - high 28 points to pace the Trail_Blazers . Not needed for much in the blowout , Damian_Lillard scored 11 points and handed out 6 assists . Chris_Kaman put up 13 points and 9 rebounds in 20 minutes off the bench . Third-year center Joel_Freeland put up the first double_double of his career , posting 10 points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . While Cole_Aldrich 's success is likely just the result of a mediocre player getting more minutes on a struggling team , pulling down 19 rebounds is impressive in any context .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 85 , at AT_&_T_Center on Saturday . Both offenses struggled , with each team hitting just 40 percent of their shots . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with San_Antonio recording 29 assists to just 7 turnovers , while Charlotte committed 15 turnovers to 18 assists . Kemba_Walker led the team in scoring , as he tallied 18 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists . Jeremy_Lamb got the start for Nicolas_Batum and finished with 13 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists . Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist went 6 - of - 9 from the field to accrue 12 points , 9 rebounds and 2 steals . The Spurs ( 30 - 7 ) have now won 12 of their last 14 games , as they continue to thrive at home . Davis_Bertans led San_Antonio in scoring , as he dropped a career - high 21 points on 5 - of - 6 shooting off the bench . LaMarcus_Aldridge recorded a double_double , totaling 15 points and 11 rebounds . Kawhi_Leonard led the starters , scoring 19 points and adding 2 rebounds and 3 assists to his tally . Dewayne_Dedmon came off the bench to contribute 15 points and 10 rebounds on 6 - of - 6 from the field .
For the Thunder , All-Star guard Russell_Westbrook posted a line of 28 points , 17 rebounds , and 12 assists for his fifth consecutive triple_double . Aside from Russell_Westbrook , bench big man Enes_Kanter thrived for the Thunder on Sunday , scoring 17 points and pulling down 10 rebounds while shooting 7 - of - 13 . New_Orleans big man Anthony_Davis , meanwhile , expanded on his league - leading scoring average by pouring in 37 points against OKC . Anthony_Davis added 15 rebounds , 2 steals , and 4 blocks . The rest of the Pelicans ' starting 5 combined for just 25 points , and the team shot only 37 percent in the game .
The Detroit Pistons ( 19 - 16 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 16 ) 115 - 89 on Monday night . Rebounding has been key for the Pistons all season and that won them the game here , as the snatched down 54 boards to the Magic 's 30 . The starters were a key as well , as Detroit 's starters scored 75 points to Orlando 's 47 . He tallied 18 points , 7 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals in the loss . This is just Brandon_Jennings fourth game of the year after suffering a torn Achilles last season and he was spectacular , scoring 17 points and dishing out 6 assists in just 18 minutes . Andre_Drummond also put in a 17 - point double_double and would have approached yet another 20 - 20 game if this fixture didn’t get so out of hand late .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Sacramento Kings , 102 - 94 , at Amway_Center on Thursday . The blueprints of the Magic ( 2 - 3 ) and Kings ( 2 - 4 ) were both on display Thursday , and Orlando showed why it 's sometimes better to have a collection of above - average players than a top - heavy attack heavily focused on 1 superstar talent . The Magic received a standout performance from Evan_Fournier , who tallied a season - high 29 points , as well as double_digit scoring efforts from 3 other members of the first unit , and a double_digit assist performance from the 1 member of the group who did n't get there , Elfrid_Payton . The imbalance partially led to Sacramento progressively losing steam after winning the first period by a 29 - 23 margin , and despite a third - quarter resurgence , they produced only 16 points in the 12 minutes to fall short . DeMarcus_Cousins ' final line consisted of 33 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Ty_Lawson was the only other member of the starters to log double_digit scoring , supplying 11 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists . Arron_Afflalo registered three_points on 1 - of - 6 shooting , while Kosta_Koufos totaled 2 points but added 7 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Ben_McLemore helped make up for some of Arron_Afflalo 's shortfall with a 11 points off the bench , while Omri_Casspi paced the reserves with a 12 - point tally . Evan_Fournier complemented his team - high scoring haul with 1 assist and 1 rebound . Serge_Ibaka continued his recent stretch of solid play with 17 points , 3 boards and 1 block while frequently dealing with DeMarcus_Cousins down low . Aaron_Gordon registered a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Nikola_Vucevic came within 1 rebound of also accomplishing the feat , managing 10 points , 9 boards , 3 assists and 2 steals . Elfrid_Payton collected 6 points but added the aforementioned 11 dimes and hauled in 3 boards . Jeff_Green paced the reserves with 15 points and also had 3 rebounds .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 121 - 85 , at Philips_Arena on Friday . The Pistons ( 11 - 10 ) endured their share of offensive struggles in the early going of the season , including a recent stretch where they failed to hit the 100 - point mark in 4 of 6 contests . However , they 've certainly gotten the hot hand over the last 3 contests , posting 112 points 3 games ago and a pair of 121 - point tallies in the 2 subsequent games . Tobias_Harris followed KCP 's output with 18 points , 7 boards , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Andre_Drummond supplied a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also featured 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Marcus_Morris collected 12 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists , while Ish_Smith registered an 11 - point , 13 - assist double_double that included 5 rebounds and 1 steal . Jon_Leuer continued his strong work off the bench with a near double_double of his own , totaling 16 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Beno_Udrih and Darrun_Hilliard also contributed a pair of 11 - point efforts in a reserve role . Dennis_Schroder was the only member of the starting 5 for the Hawks ( 10 - 10 ) to manage double_digit scoring , posting 17 points , 11 assists and 2 rebounds . Kent_Bazemore and Kyle_Korver totaled only 14 points between them , Thabo_Sefolosha was in the starting lineup again with Paul_Millsap sitting out with a hip injury , but he was only able to supply 5 points , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Dwight_Howard was particularly ineffective , totaling only 2 points , 6 rebounds and 2 blocks over 25 minutes . Mike_Muscala 's and Tim Hardaway 's pair of 11 - point efforts led the way , while Kris_Humphries followed closely behind with 10 .
The Boston Celtics dominated the visiting New_York Knicks , 115 - 87 , on Friday night at TD_Garden . Isaiah_Thomas was huge for Boston ( 4 - 4 ) as he led the way offensively with 29 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , in only 28 minutes . They shot only 39 percent from the field overall but made up for it with vicious defense , forcing 25 turnovers from the Knicks . Kelly_Olynyk was solid in his second game back , with 19 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , 7 rebounds and 3 assists , in 30 minutes . Marcus_Smart finished with 12 points , 10 assists , 6 rebounds and 3 steals , while Avery_Bradley notched 15 points , 10 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . Carmelo_Anthony scored 12 points in 12 minutes before losing his temper . Kristaps_Porzingis was the high - point man with 14 points , along with 6 rebounds and 2 blocks , in 23 minutes . Derrick_Rose added 11 points , 6 assists and 4 rebounds , while the only other player to tally double_digit for the Knicks was Justin_Holiday , with 10 .
Blake_Griffin posted 43 points , 10 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals on 15 - of - 26 shooting across 42 minutes . Chris_Paul finished with 15 points , 17 assists and 9 rebounds , while DeAndre_Jordan scored 20 points and hauled in 1 9 rebounds . As for the Hornets , Kemba_Walkers scored 34 points and added 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Nicolas_Batum contributed 31 points , to go along with 8 boards and 4 assists . The Hornets shot 45 percent from behind the arc , but even Kemba_Walker 's heroics at the end of the fourth quarter were not enough to come away with the win .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 94 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Sunday . However , it was backcourt mate CJ_McCollum who took the mantle Sunday , putting up more than double the shots of Damian_Lillard and leading all scorers with a season - high 37 points . CJ_McCollum also drained half of his 12 three_point attempts on the afternoon , after having made the same amount in the last 3 games combined . Overall , Portland 's solid shooting ( 45 and 42 percent marks from the field and three_point range , respectively ) and a 24 - point fourth quarter helped secure the team 's third road win in 4 tries . Damian_Lillard contributed 19 points , 7 assists , 6 rebounds and 1 steal . He was only 3 - of - 11 from the field , but did convert all 11 free_throw opportunities . Al-Farouq_Aminu and Mason_Plumlee were modest contributors , with respective 8 - and 7 - point tallies , while also combining for 11 boards down low . Tony_Allen registered 11 points , 7 boards and 4 steals . Zach_Randolph was typically productive off the bench , leading the reserves with 15 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists . Vince_Carter was solid in a reserve role as well , providing 11 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .

Chicago took a 10 - point lead headed into the half , but really opened it up with a 33 - 17 third quarter . Chicago was clicking on all cylinders , as they shot over 44 percent from the field and held the Sixers to under 40 percent shooting . Rajon_Rondo likely would have triple_doubled if he played the fourth quarter , as he finished with 6 points , 8 rebounds and 10 assists in 26 minutes . Richaun_Holmes also provided 14 points , 5 rebounds and 3 blocks off the bench . Jerryd_Bayless totaled 11 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists in his first start of the season .

The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 103 - 97 , in their season opener Wednesday at Wells_Fargo_Center . The Thunder ( 10 ) came into the game as heavy favorites against a 76ers ( 0 - 1 ) team that was debuting some of its new , young talent . Philadelphia pushed the opposition to the final seconds of the game and even entered the fourth quarter with a 6 - point lead and plenty of confidence , but Russell_Westbrook would ultimately play spoiler , scoring 12 of his game - high 32 points in the final period and helping the Thunder win the fourth quarter by a comfortable 12 points . On top of his scoring , Russell_Westbrook managed to add on 12 rebounds and 9 assists over his 36 minutes of playing time . Steven_Adams played 36 minutes right alongside Russell_Westbrook , scoring 16 points but grabbing just 5 rebounds in that span . Enes_Kanter provided some quality minutes off the bench , scoring 17 points , 8 of which came in the fourth quarter , and grabbing 12 rebounds himself . For the 76ers , all eyes were on big man Joel_Embiid as he made his regular season debut as a member of the team and he did not disappoint , scoring a team - high 20 points , grabbing 7 rebounds and blocking a pair of shots in just 22 minutes . Nik_Stauskas , who came close to being cut before the season started , provided a huge jolt of life off the bench Wednesday , shooting 5 - of - 6 from the field en route to 13 points in 23 minutes
Denver shot only 33 percent from the field and 28 percent from long range , however was able to hit 17 - of - 20 free_throws . Wilson_Chandler was big in 31 minutes off the bench , finishing with 21 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting from the field , along with 9 rebounds . Danilo_Gallinari shot only 5 - of - 14 from the field on his way to 16 points , in 29 minutes . Rookie , Jamal_Murray recorded 9 points in 27 minutes , on 4 - of - 10 shooting , including 1 - of - 4 from deep . Kenneth_Faried had a tough night , going 1 - of - 8 from the field , finishing with 4 points in 16 minutes . Andre_Drummond was a monster for the Pistons , with 19 points and 19 rebounds , along with 3 blocked shots , in 34 minutes . John Jon_Leuer has been steadily improving for the Pistons and finished with 15 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . Stanley_Johnson was solid in 19 minutes off the bench , with 12 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting .

The Minnesota point guard contributed 13 points , 9 dimes and 4 rebounds after a 1 - point performance in his most recent contest . Zach_LaVine ( 25 minutes ) outpaced Kevin_Martin in playing time as a result , and exploded with 20 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block to lead the Minnesota reserves .

The Golden_State Warriors ( 30 ) mounted a historic comeback to defeat the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 3 ) , 123 - 119 in overtime Thursday at the Smoothie_King_Center . In a game New_Orleans needed to win to avoid a 0 - 3 deficit in its series with Golden_State , the Pelicans looked to be on their way to delivering a victory in front of the home crowd . The Pelicans took a 20 - point lead into the fourth quarter , but the Warriors remained composed and began chipping into the deficit . Golden_State 's unbelievable comeback was highlighted by Stephen_Curry 's 40 points , but second chance points laid the foundation . Draymond_Green , who is all of 6 - foot - 7 , finished with 7 offensive rebounds and 17 boards overall before fouling out in overtime . The Warriors became the third team ever to rally from a 20 - point deficit in the fourth quarter of a playoff game to win , according to ESPN Stats & Info . Anthony_Davis was dominant for much of the game , scoring 29 points to go with 15 rebounds over 46 minutes . The Pelicans got major contributions from their bench , namely 26 points from Ryan_Anderson and 16 points from Norris_Cole . Jrue_Holiday returned from a 1 game absence to finish with 10 points in 17 minutes off the bench as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 44 - 38 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 33 - 49 ) 107 - 99 at Moda_Center on Wednesday . Lillard 's backcourt partner , CJ_McCollum , who has been instrumental in the Trail_Blazers eclipsing 40 wins this season , aided the scoring department with 17 points , in addition to 3 rebounds and 5 assists . Emmanuel_Mudiay closed out his first season in the NBA with an impressive 25 point scoring performance , which led the game . Emmanuel_Mudiay added 4 rebounds and 6 assists , but played with patience throughout the game and only turned the ball over 4 times , which he has improved upon as the season went on . Nikola_Jokic added 18 points and 13 rebounds , while Kenneth_Faried contributed 12 points , 8 rebounds and 2 blocks in just under 19 minutes off the bench .

The Orlando Magic defeated the host Miami Heat , 136 - 130 , in double - overtime at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday . Shooting was key for the Magic , as they shot 50 percent from the field and from three_point range . Both teams struggled at the free_throw line , as they each failed to crack 70 percent shooting . Nikola_Vucevic was the Magic 's best player , as he totaled 26 points and 12 rebounds off the bench . Evan_Fournier matched his 26 points and added 5 rebounds and 4 assists to his tally in the victory . Serge_Ibaka accumulated 20 points , 9 rebounds and 2 assists . Elfrid_Payton came off the bench to collect 22 points , 2 rebounds and 6 assists . Hassan_Whiteside did all he could though , as he had game - highs with 32 points , 15 rebounds and 5 blocks in the defeat . Tyler_Johnson was fantastic off the bench , accruing a career - high 32 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals before fouling out in overtime . Goran_Dragic went just 6 - of - 17 from the field , but tallied 19 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists before fouling out himself . James_Johnson was also productive off the bench , providing 12 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists .
Pascal_Siakam , Toronto 's 2016 first - round pick , pitched in 9 boards while starting at power forward , but Kyle_Lowry was the only other player to manage double_digit scoring ( 10 points ) . Andre_Drummond was often overmatched by Jonas_Valanciunas and collected a modest 16 points and 6 boards . The Pistons had a similarly unbalanced box score , as Andre_Drummond , Marcus_Morris and Tobias_Harris combined for 55 of the team 's 91 points while shooting 22 - for - 41 from the field . Meanwhile , their starting backcourt of Ish_Smith and Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope went cold , supplying a combined 10 points on 5 - for - 19 shooting .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 61 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 38 - 45 ) 99 - 92 on Sunday at Philips_Arena in Atlanta in their first matchup of the first round of the Eastern_Conference Playoffs . After coming out of the first quarter with a 12 - point lead , the Hawks looked as if they were about to run the Nets right out of the gym and coast to an easy victory . The Nets brought it to within 4 points again with just under 2 minutes left in the final quarter , but the Hawks proved to be just too much and held on to a 7 - point victory despite a strong effort from Brooklyn . The Hawks shot 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three_point line , while the Nets went 46 percent from the floor and 25 percent from deep . Kyle_Korver went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 11 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 21 points , while also adding 7 rebounds and 3 assists . Kyle_Korver had hit at least 3 three_pointers in 3 of his last 4 games coming into the playoffs , so it was n't surprising to see him light it up from deep again Sunday . DeMarre_Carroll finished with 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 3 assists , while Jeff_Teague added 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , 3 assists and 1 steal . Dennis_Schroder was able to give Jeff_Teague a few breaks , while also producing 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 2 assists over 24 minutes . Joe_Johnson was harassed by the Hawks ' crowd in his return to Atlanta , but was able to overcome it with 17 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 6 3PT , 5 - 8 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 6 assists . Brook_Lopez , on the other hand , recorded 17 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) of his own , to go along with 14 rebounds and 2 steals . His 14 rebounds helped Brooklyn secure a 47 - 39 rebounding advantage over the Hawks , while the double_double was his second over his last 4 games . Also notching a double_double was Thaddeus_Young , who posted 15 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 3 assists over 40 minutes . Deron_Williams had 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) and 4 rebounds , while Jarrett_Jack finished with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 2 assists .

Damian_Lillard was the player of the game , as he scored 26 of his career - high 59 points in the first quarter . Damian_Lillard did that damage on 18 - of - 34 shooting , while also adding 6 rebounds and 5 assists to his tally . CJ_McCollum struggled , as he accrued 9 points , 3 rebounds and 5 assists on 4 - of - 20 from the field . Maurice_Harkless was the only other Blazer in double_figures , as he amassed 12 points , 3 rebounds and 3 steals .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 123 - 101 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday . The second half was particularly lopsided , with Golden_State leading by at least 20 points for the final 16 minutes . They were also very efficient , recording 37 assists on 51 percent shooting , while committing just 9 turnovers . Alexis_Ajinca got the start at center and led the starters with 17 points and 6 rebounds . Jrue_Holiday accrued 10 points , 6 rebounds and 10 assists . Kevin_Durant made his return from a knee injury to accrue 16 points , 10 rebounds and 6 assists . Klay_Thompson led the team , as he scored 20 points to add to his 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Ian_Clark and Andre_Iguodala were huge off the bench , as Ian_Clark provided 17 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists , with Andre_Iguodala tallying 15 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 126 - 125 , in overtime at Philips_Arena on Sunday . In fact , they led by 26 headed into the fourth quarter , but allowed Atlanta to outscore them 44 - 18 in the final quarter to send it to overtime . LeBron_James picked up his 15th triple_double of the year though , collecting 32 points , 16 rebounds and 10 assists before fouling out in overtime . Kyrie_Irving led the team in scoring , accruing 45 points , 2 rebounds and 9 assists . Kevin_Love finished with 11 points , 15 rebounds and 5 assists . Channing_Frye started and totaled 12 points and 8 rebounds . The Hawks ( 42 - 38 ) had 1 of their greatest comebacks in franchise history here , as they 've now handed the Cavaliers back - to - back devastating losses . Paul_Millsap returned to his starting role to provide 22 points , 9 rebounds and 2 assists . Dwight_Howard amassed 19 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists on 9 - of - 12 shooting . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. accumulated 21 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists . Kent_Bazemore was a nice spark off the bench , contributing 13 points , 2 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 steals . Mike_Muscala also played well off the bench , dropping 12 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers blew out the Houston Rockets on Monday , 125 - 96 . Superstar point guard Chris_Paul led the team with 19 points and dished out 9 assists on the night . The team finally appeared to be healthy and firing on all cylinders , as the Clippers ended with a 49 - 41 rebounding advantage and shot over 50 percent from the field on the night . It was also a historic night for veteran forward Paul_Pierce , who scored 10 points to pass John Havlicek for 15th on the all - time scoring list . That was roughly how the night went for most of the Rockets ' lineup , as the team finished shooting only 39 percent from the field . Rebounding also played a role in the blowout , as Houston was at an 9 - rebound disadvantage by the night 's end .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 73 , at United_Center on Wednesday . This game meant much more to Chicago than Brooklyn and a 39 - point margin shows just that . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Bulls , as they led by 14 after the first quarter and ended up winning the fourth quarter , 37 - 17 , to pull away in dominating fashion . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Chicago winning that battle , 62 - 48 . It was the Bulls defense that was especially feisty , as they held Brooklyn to 33 percent shooting and that aforementioned ugly three_point total . Archie_Goodwin was Brooklyn 's best player , as he provided 20 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists . KJ_McDaniels finished second on the team , dropping 15 points and 6 rebounds off the bench as well . Caris_LeVert was the only starter in double_figures , as he totaled 10 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists . Jimmy_Butler was the player of the game , as he tallied 25 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 steals and 2 blocks . Paul_Zipser finished second on the team , amassing 21 points and 6 rebounds off the bench . Bobby_Portis recorded a double_double off the bench as well , accruing 12 points and 10 rebounds .
Paul_George finished with a game - high 32 points and 11 rebounds in 40 minutes , as the potential All-NBA performer left it all on the floor when his team needed him to the most . Jeff_Teague added 19 points and 7 assists but left late in the game after coming down awkwardly on his ankle . In the starter 's absence , Ersan_Ilyasova led the way with 15 points in just 18 minutes , as he was essentially rested prior to the postseason as well . Overall , it was an ugly game for the depleted Atlanta squad , as the 86 points was their lowest point total in 5 games . And it was n't because they shot the ball poorly necessarily , but rather , they failed to take care of the basketball , as they committed 18 turnovers to just 19 team assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 97 - 83 , in Game 1 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs at Air_Canada_Centre on Saturday evening . The Bucks wasted no time , as they came out strong with a 30 - 22 first quarter . The Raptors answered by outscoring the Bucks 29 - 16 in the second quarter , to take a 51 - 46 lead into halftime . The second half started out the same way the first half did , with a strong third quarter from the Bucks , however the Raptors were not able to produce the counter punch , and were outscored 51 - 32 over the third and fourth quarters . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 28 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 38 minutes . The rookie , Malcolm_Brogdon came up huge for the Bucks with 16 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists , in 34 minutes . Greg_Monroe provided a big boost off the bench , with 14 points and a huge 15 rebounds , in 26 minutes . Meanwhile , the Raptors were slowed by the Bucks ' solid defense , shooting only 36 percent from the field , including 22 percent from long range . DeMar_DeRozan led the way with 27 points on 7 - of - 21 shooting , and 8 rebounds , in 39 minutes , while Serge_Ibaka followed up with 19 points , 14 rebounds and 3 blocks , in 36 minutes . Kyle_Lowry struggled , shooting only 2 - of - 11 from the field , including 0 - of - 6 from downtown , on his way to 4 points , 6 assists and 2 rebounds , in 34 minutes .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 107 , in Game 1 of the Eastern_Conference playoffs first - round at Verizon_Center on Sunday . It took a comeback for Washington to pull out Game 1 , as they rode a 38 - 28 third quarter to overcome a halftime deficit . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Wizards recording 28 assists to 12 turnovers , while the Hawks committed 21 turnovers to just 18 assists . Dennis_Schroder led the way for Atlanta , as he tallied 25 points , 3 rebounds and 9 assists . Paul_Millsap finished with 19 points and 2 rebounds . Dwight_Howard scored just 7 points , but brought down a game - high 14 rebounds . Kent_Bazemore led the bench , providing 12 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists . John_Wall was the player of the game , as he collected 32 points , 4 rebounds and 14 assists . Bradley_Beal amassed 22 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals . Markieff_Morris accumulated 21 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 blocks . Marcin_Gortat recorded a double_double , totaling 14 points and 10 rebounds .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 121 - 109 , in Game 1 of the Western_Conference first - round playoff series at Oracle_Arena on Sunday afternoon . Draymond_Green provided a near triple_double of 19 points , 12 rebounds and 9 assists , while adding 5 blocks and 3 steals in a superb all - around effort . Both of the latter contributions were game - high figures , and his defense helped spearhead a pivotal 15 - 2 run in the fourth quarter for the Warriors that subdued what had been a feisty Trail_Blazers ( 0 - 1 ) squad . Golden_State finished with a 53 percent success rate from the floor and limited Portland to a 43 percent tally . The Trail_Blazers were led by CJ_McCollum , who poured in 41 points and added 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . He took a whopping 28 shots on the afternoon , impressively draining 16 . Backcourt mate Damian_Lillard followed with 34 points , which he supplemented with 5 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Evan_Turner drew the start and posted a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists and 1 steal . Moe Maurice_Harkless managed 11 points , 3 boards , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Noah_Vonleh could n't contribute much on the offensive end , mustering just 2 points . He did haul in 5 rebounds and dished out 4 assists . Kevin_Durant paced the Warriors with 32 points , which he complemented with 10 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Stephen_Curry poured in 29 points and added 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Klay_Thompson posted 15 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Ian_Clark led the second unit with 12 points , 2 boards and 1 steal .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 109 - 101 , at Verizon_Center on Tuesday night in Game 2 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs . The Hawks ( 0 - 2 ) had a hard time scoring points against the Wizards ( 20 ) over their last 3 meetings in the regular season , and those issues re - emerged in Tuesday 's Game 2 . The fact that standout center Dwight_Howard ran into trouble certainly did n't help their cause either , nor did the 18 turnovers they were guilty of after committing 19 in Game 1 . Shooting was a problem as well , as Atlanta could only muster a 40 percent success rate from the field and 20 percent from three_point range . Their contributions were key in Washington overcoming the 78 - 74 deficit they entered the final 12 minutes with , and in helping them put together a 35 - point fourth quarter to seal the win . With Dwight_Howard in foul trouble , Paul_Millsap took on a more prominent role in the frontcourt and led the way for Atlanta with 27 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Dennis_Schroder followed with 23 points , which he supplemented with 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. followed with 19 points , 2 assists and 1 rebound . Taurean_Prince provided 12 points , 4 boards and 1 assist . Dwight_Howard could only muster 6 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block over 20 minutes . Kent_Bazemore paced the second unit with 8 points , 5 rebounds and 2 blocks . John_Wall led the way for the Wizards with 32 points , 9 assists , 5 rebounds , 2 steal and 1 block . Bradley_Beal was right behind his backcourt mate with 31 points , which he complemented with 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Marcin_Gortat posted a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists , 5 blocks and 1 steal . Much like Dwight_Howard , Markieff_Morris also ran into issues with the ref 's whistle , totaling just three_points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks over 20 minutes . Brandon_Jennings led the bench with 10 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers 128 - 103 in Monday 's Game 4 of their first - round playoff series at Moda_Center . Despite playing in just 3 quarters , Stephen_Curry was sensational , scoring a game - high 37 points in just 30 minutes while shooting 7 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Draymond_Green was the only Warriors player who played more than 30 minutes , and in that time , he shot 7 - of - 11 from the field , scored 21 points , grabbed 6 rebounds , dished out 4 assists and blocked 3 shots . In the end , 6 different Golden_State players scored in double_figures as the team shot a scorching 54 percent from the field 59 percent from behind the arc . As for Portland , the same could not be said , as they shot a miserable 39 percent from the field overall in the 25 - point loss . Despite the ugly game , Damian_Lillard was still terrific , scoring a team - high 34 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting from the field in 42 minutes . CJ_McCollum capped off the first - round series with a 2 - of - 12 shooting performance from the field that led to him scoring just 6 points , and through 3 quarters , the shooting guard had been 0 - of - 9 from the field . Al-Farouq_Aminu wound up putting together a solid performance , scoring 25 points in 35 minutes off the bench to go along with 7 rebounds and 2 steals .

The home team also took very good care of the ball , committing only 6 turnovers while forcing 11 from the Hawks ( 2 - 3 ) . Markieff_Morris had 8 points , 5 rebounds and 1 block , while Marcin_Gortat totaled just 5 points but also racked up 10 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 blocks .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Washington Wizards , 123 - 111 , at TD_Garden on Sunday afternoon in Game 1 of the Eastern_Conference semifinals . The comeback began during the remainder of the first period , although Boston still faced a 38 - 24 deficit entering the second . Although in - game history repeated itself to start the fourth , with the home team failing to score over the opening 4:6 , the Celtics turned it back on to still tally a 28 - point period to close out the win . Both teams shot well , but it was Boston 's excellent 49 percent success rate from long range , which consisted of a franchise playoff record - tying 19 threes , that was key to their early comeback and victory . Avery_Bradley_Beal led the way for the Wizards with 27 points , 4 assists , 1 rebound , 1 steal and 1 block . Marcin_Gortat and Otto_Porter_Jr. provided matching 16 - point tallies , with the former adding 13 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , and Porter posting 11 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 assist . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. led the bench with 12 points , which he supplemented with 1 rebound and 2 blocks . Bojan_Bogdanovic was productive on the second unit as well with 10 points , 3 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Isaiah_Thomas paced the Celtics with 33 points , which he complemented with 9 assists , 1 rebound and 1 block . Jae_Crowder supplied a surprising 24 points , along with 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal , including a team - best 6 - for - 8 tally from three_point range . Al_Horford had a near triple_double of 21 points , 10 assists , 9 rebounds and 1 block . Kelly_Olynyk led the bench with 12 points , 4 boards and 2 assists . Gerald_Green got the start at small forward once again but produced no stats over a scant 7 minutes .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Washington Wizards , 123 - 101 , in Game 5 of the Eastern_Conference semifinals at TD_Garden on Wednesday . In fact , Boston led by 12 points after the first quarter and never allowed Washington to get within that 12 - point margin for the rest of the game . The Celtics offense was unstoppable , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 48 percent from three_point range . They held the Wizards to just 38 percent from the field and 24 percent from three_point range on their end . Much of that was due to the ball movement , with Boston recording 33 assists and Washington dishing out just 21 . The Wizards ( 2 - 3 ) are going to need to win out in this series to reach the Eastern_Conference Finals , as this was 1 of their worst performances of the postseason . John_Wall led Washington with 21 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 blocks . The Celtics ( 3 - 2 ) are now 1 win away from an Eastern_Conference Finals appearance , as they have 2 opportunities to achieve that goal . Avery_Bradley was the player of the game , as he tallied 29 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists on 12 - of - 19 from the field . Isaiah_Thomas accrued 18 points , 3 rebounds and 9 assists . Al_Horford totaled 19 points , 6 rebounds , 7 assists and 3 blocks on 8 - of - 9 shooting . Jae_Crowder amassed 18 points and 8 rebounds . Marcus_Smart was a huge spark off the bench , providing 9 points , 11 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals .
The visiting Cleveland Cavaliers blew out the Boston Celtics , 130 - 86 , in Game 2 of the Eastern_Conference Finals on Friday . Cleveland ( 20 ) grabbed the largest first - half advantage in league history on Friday , jumping out to a 72 - 31 lead by the end of the second quarter . LeBron_James had 30 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting along with 7 assists . Fellow All-Star forward Kevin_Love scored an additional 21 points to go with 12 rebounds . As a team , Cleveland had 19 three_pointers and shot over 56 percent from the field . All-NBA guard Isaiah_Thomas had just 2 points in 18 minutes before exiting the game with an injury . Al_Horford , meanwhile , had 11 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting but pulled down just 5 rebounds on the night .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 120 - 108 , in Game 3 of the Western_Conference Finals at AT_&_T_Center on Saturday evening . After a hopeless showing in Game 2 , the Spurs came out with some heat in their first home game of the series and led 33 - 29 after the first quarter . The Warriors hit back in the second quarter though , and took a 64 - 55 lead into halftime , before cruising the rest of the way to the win . With no 1 to stop him , Kevin_Durant went off for a game - high 33 points and 10 rebounds .
