Draymond_Green did a bit of everything with 10 points , 7 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal in 34 minutes . The Warriors finished with a 55 percent success rate from the field and hit 11 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , the Spurs shot 47 percent from the field but struggled , going only 5 - of - 21 from long range . Pau_Gasol added 12 points and 10 rebounds off the bench .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 111 - 108 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday night in Game 3 of the Eastern_Conference finals . Such was the case heading into Sunday 's Game 3 , as the Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) looked like the proverbial lambs being led to slaughter coming into Cleveland without their best offensive weapon , and fresh off having been thoroughly dominated in 2 games on their home court . It was therefore not surprising to see the Cavaliers ( 2 - 1 ) jump out to a 66 - 50 halftime lead , and extend that advantage to 77 - 56 as late as the 6:39 mark of the third quarter . Marcus_Smart led the way for Boston in Thomas ' absence , posting 27 points , 7 assists , 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Avery_Bradley poured in 20 points overall and complemented them with 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Al_Horford contributed 16 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Jae_Crowder contributed a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists and 3 steals . Kelly_Olynyk played a key role off the bench , leading the second unit with 15 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assists . Jonas_Jerebko supplied 10 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Kyrie_Irving paced Cleveland with 29 points , which he supplemented with 7 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Kevin_Love turned in a record - setting performance , draining 7 three_pointers on his way to 28 total points , which he complemented with 10 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . The aforementioned performances helped make up for an uncharacteristically bad night for LeBron_James , who posted 11 points on 4 - for - 13 shooting and added 6 rebounds , 6 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , along with 6 turnovers . JR_Smith tallied 13 points and 8 rebounds , with all but 1 of his points coming from behind the arc .

The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 101 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Wednesday . The game was extremely close in the first quarter and the Timberwolves were actually in front , 26 - 23 , after the first 12 minutes . But Detroit ( 3 - 2 ) responded with a 40 - 18 win during the second quarter , and they never looked back . Despite the fact Minnesota ( 2 - 3 ) kept things close in the second half losing 59 - 57 over that span , Detroit did all the damage in the second quarter and moved over .500 with a convincing win in front of their home crowd . Tobias_Harris was the undisputed star of the game for Detroit , as his 34 - point performance matched a career - high for the small forward . Avery_Bradley added 20 points , Andre_Drummond contributed with a double_double of 15 points and 15 rebounds , and Reggie_Jackson chipped in with 10 points . Karl-Anthony_Towns had 23 points with 10 rebounds and Andrew_Wiggins added 21 points of his own , but it was not enough for a Minnesota squad that lost their second consecutive game . They only shot 44 percent from the field , and were out_rebounded , 47 - 37 .

However , the Lakers ( 2 - 2 ) defense rejuvenated the youthful team in the fourth quarter where they held the Wizards ( 3 - 1 ) to just 13 points . Brandon_Ingram was the hero in the fourth quarter and added 19 points and 10 boards on 50 percent shooting .

The Rockets ( 15 - 4 ) came from behind in this one , and delivered a great performance in the second half to come out on top against a Knicks ( 10 - 9 ) that just could n't keep up with Houston 's intensity on both ends of the court . The Golden_State Warriors escaped a near - upset at Staples_Center on Wednesday , defeating the Los_Angeles Lakers , 127 - 123 in overtime . Golden_State ( 16 - 6 ) looked shockingly sluggish throughout regulation , committing 20 turnovers and trailing for large portions of the second half . Former back - to - back MVP Stephen_Curry , in particular , started the game on a slow note , going just 3 - of - 10 and committing 5 turnovers in the first 2 and a half quarters . By overtime , however , Stephen_Curry looked back to his MVP form , as he finished the game 9 - of - 20 from the field with 28 points . Kevin_Durant added an additional 29 points for the Warriors , shooting 12 - of - 25 from the field . Brandon_Ingram was the game 's leading scorer at 32 points , as he put up a new career high on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Although he has largely struggled with his shot this season , Lonzo_Ball hit 3 three_pointers in Wednesday 's game . The Lakers added 49 points off the bench in what was a well - rounded team effort on Wednesday .

After falling apart late in their last game , the Raptors came out strong in this one with an early 37 - 31 lead after 1 quarter . After a tight second quarter , Toronto maintained the 6 - point advantage at halftime . The Raptors came out strong once again in the third , expanding their lead to 92 - 79 heading into the fourth . DeMar_DeRozan led the Raptors with 37 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting , 7 rebounds and 4 assists , in 37 minutes . Serge_Ibaka followed up with 21 points , 13 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , while Jonas_Valanciunas tallied 20 points and 11 rebounds . Kyle_Lowry chipped in 12 points , 7 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . The Raptors shot 44 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Troy_Daniels was on fire for Phoenix , finishing with 32 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . Greg_Monroe followed up with 17 points , 11 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal , while TJ_Warren added 17 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist . The Suns shot 45 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 112 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Thursday night . The Cavaliers ( 21 - 8 ) and the Lakers ( 10 - 17 ) engaged in quite a battle in this game , as the Lakers proved to be a harder - than - expected opponent for a Cavs team that has been on a roll of late . LeBron_James was the undisputed star for the Cavaliers , as the small forward finished with a strong triple_double of 25 points , 12 rebounds , and 12 assists but he was n't the only player who made a difference for Cleveland . Kevin_Love contributed with 28 points and 11 rebounds , and Jose_Calderon contributed with 17 points , 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Dwyane_Wade had 10 points with 6 assists . Brandon_Ingram led the way for the Lakers with 26 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists . Lonzo_Ball came close to a triple_double , as the rookie point guard with 13 points , 11 assists , and 8 boards . Two players off the bench delivered strong performances as well , as Kyle_Kuzma finished with 20 points and 7 rebounds , and Julius_Randle added 13 points with 4 boards and 3 assists .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 120 - 99 , at Toyota_Center on Monday evening . Eric_Gordon finished with a team - high 33 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting , in 36 minutes off the bench for Houston . James_Harden followed up with 26 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , while Chris_Paul tallied 18 points , 10 assists , 8 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Clint_Capela came up huge with 24 points and 19 rebounds , in 35 minutes . The Rockets shot 52 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 43 from long range . Meanwhile , Rodney_Hood led the Jazz with 26 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Joe_Ingles followed up with 17 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds , while Ricky_Rubio added 14 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . The Jazz shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from downtown .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 95 , at Philips_Arena on Wednesday night . The Pacers ( 18 - 14 ) came into the game with a vastly superior record to the Hawks ( 7 - 24 ) , but it was n't evident by the play in the first half . Atlanta hung with Indiana virtually point - for - point on their home court , leading to a slim 53 - 51 halftime advantage for the visitors . However , the Pacers managed to be just a bit better than the Hawks in the second half , outscoring their hosts by a 52 - 44 margin . They got it done with the help of some solid marksmanship , as they saw 5 players shoot better than 49 percent , and another tally a 46 percent success rate . Meanwhile , they played effective defense overall , with Atlanta 's highest scorer , John_Collins , posting a modest 18 points . Victor_Oladipo led Indiana with 23 points , which he complemented with 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Myles_Turner followed with 20 points and added 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 blocks and 1 steal . Bojan_Bogdanovic poured in 19 points and also brought in 1 rebound and recorded 2 steals . Darren_Collison registered 11 points , 1 rebound and 1 assist . Cory_Joseph turned in 11 points , 3 boards and 2 assists in 28 minutes off the bench . Lance_Stephenson filled out the stat sheet on the second unit , totaling 10 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 block . John_Collins supplemented his aforementioned team - high scoring haul with 9 rebounds and 1 block . Kent_Bazemore and Marco_Belinelli managed matching 13 - point contributions from the starting 5 and bench , respectively . Miles_Plumlee collected 10 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Ersan_Ilyasova matched Miles_Plumlee 's scoring total and added 5 boards and 1 assist . Dennis_Schroder had a rare down game with 8 points on 4 - for - 15 shooting , and he also dished out 8 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Taurean_Prince had 8 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block .

On Friday , he was the backbone of the Denver offense , scoring a team - high 27 points and dishing out 6 assists . Though it was a slow night for sophomore point guard Jamal_Murray , who had 7 points on 3 - of - 10 shooting , the team was able to find production elsewhere
The Golden_State Warriors defended their home court , beating the Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 106 , at Oracle_Arena on Friday . Jordan_Bell had 20 points and 10 rebounds , along with 1 block and 1 steal . Still , it was established superstar Kevin_Durant who decided the game , scoring a team - high 33 points , including 4 points in the final minute of regulation to help seal the win . Rookie point guard Lonzo_Ball had 1 of his best shooting nights to date , scoring 24 points while going 5 - of - 6 from beyond the three_point line . Kyle_Kuzma scored a team - high 27 points to go along with 14 rebounds .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 107 , at Philips_Arena on Saturday evening . The second quarter stayed tight as well , with neither team taking a lead greater than a couple of possessions , with the Mavericks leading 53 - 48 at halftime . They continued to apply pressure and led for most of the third before the Mavericks rallied back to take a 1 - point , 80 - 79 , lead heading into the fourth . Dennis_Schroder led the way for the Hawks , with 33 points on 13 - of - 23 shooting , 7 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal , in 36 minutes . Ersan_Ilyasova followed up with 21 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , while John_Collins chipped in 13 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Hawks shot 56 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison_Barnes led Dallas with 22 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting , in 35 minutes . JJ_Barea came up large off the bench , with 15 points , 12 assists , 3 steals and 2 rebounds , in 29 minutes . Dirk_Nowitzki finished with 18 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block . The Mavericks shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from distance .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Miami Heat , 109 - 94 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday . New_Orleans were lights - out , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 60 percent from three_point range . Miami shot just 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . The Pelicans ( 17 - 16 ) were led by Anthony_Davis , as he tallied 16 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 4 blocks . DeMarcus_Cousins finished with 16 points , 7 rebounds , 8 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks . Jrue_Holiday collected 13 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Ian_Clark was huge off the bench , as he dropped 19 points on 5 - of - 7 from three_point range . The Heat ( 17 - 16 ) were led by Tyler_Johnson , as he amassed 20 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assists . Goran_Dragic totaled 13 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists . Josh_Richardson accrued 12 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
On paper , the matchup between 1 of the Eastern_Conference 's best squads and the struggling Mavericks ( 10 - 25 ) looked like a considerable mismatch , but that 's why the games unfold on the hardwood . The Mavericks jumped on the visitors early , forging a 31 - 23 first - quarter lead on the strength of impressive efforts from the frontcourt duo of the ageless Dirk_Nowitzki and the emerging Maxi_Kleber . Toronto mounted enough of a comeback in the second period to close the deficit to 57 - 53 by halftime , but the home squad did just enough in the second half to maintain their razor - thin advantage . Kyle_Lowry led the way for the Raptors with 23 points , which he supplemented with 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal . Jonas_Valanciunas posted a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist and 1 steal . Serge_Ibaka provided a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double_double in his own right while also recording a trio of blocks . DeMar_DeRozan had 1 of his worst shooting nights of the campaign , draining only 3 of his 16 shot attempts on his way to 8 points . He did add 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Jakob_Poeltl led the bench with 9 points and also supplied 4 boards , 1 steal and 1 block . JJ_Barea paced the Mavericks with 20 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . Dirk_Nowitzki followed with 18 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 blocks and 1 steal . Harrison_Barnes posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists . Maxi_Kleber poured in 15 points to go along with 8 rebounds , 2 assists , 5 blocks and 2 steals . Dennis_Smith_Jr. contributed 8 points on 3 - for - 14 shooting , but he also tallied 5 rebounds and 4 assists . Wesley_Matthews had trouble finding the net as well , going just 2 - for - 9 from the field while totaling a modest 5 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block .

The Suns ( 13 - 23 ) and the Grizzlies ( 10 - 24 ) played a very entertaining game that went down to the wire until the final seconds . Phoenix went up by 10 in the first quarter , but Memphis answered right back to the point that they evened things up 76 - 76 heading into the fourth . Marc_Gasol contributed on both ends of the court , as he ended with 18 points , 6 rebounds , and 4 blocks . James_Ennis_III added 11 points and 5 boards with 2 assists off the bench .

The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 105 , at TD_Garden on Sunday evening . The Celtics ( 30 - 10 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game , but they had to work harder than expected against a hard - working Nets ( 13 - 23 ) team that made things quite complicated for Boston . Even though the Celtics jumped to a 10 - point lead after the first quarter , the Nets answered and cut the deficit to 2 points at the break . One of the big differences was both teams ' shooting from the field , as the Celtics hit 49 percent of their shots while Brooklyn converted just 41 of theirs . Star point guard Kyrie_Irving led the way for Boston , as he finished with 28 points . Jaylen_Brown had 13 points , and Al_Horford contributed with 10 points , 10 rebounds , 5 assists , and 3 blocks . The shooting guard contributed with 14 points and 8 rebounds , while the power forward chipped in with 15 points of his own . Six Brooklyn players scored in double_digit , led by Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson who contributed with 22 points and 12 rebounds . Allen_Crabbe had 12 points , and Spencer_Dinwiddie chipped in with 10 points and 9 assists . Caris_LeVert had a monster game off the bench as well , finishing with 16 points , 7 assists , 6 rebounds , and 2 steals . Quincy_Acy had 14 points as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 127 - 110 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday evening . Matters were n't looking too positive in that regard in the first half , as the Trail_Blazers ( 19 - 18 ) , buoyed by the return of their star point guard Damian_Lillard from a hamstring injury , forged a 56 - 53 halftime lead . However , Cleveland came out firing on all cylinders offensively after intermission and never let up , scoring an impressive 74 points over the final 24 minutes to put together a comfortable double_digit home win . Isaiah_Thomas ' encouraging play was certainly an added bonus , as he produced 17 points and 3 assists over just 19 minutes , shooting 50 percent ( 6 - for - 12 ) from the field . Damian_Lillard paced the Trail_Blazers in his return from a 5 - game absence , managing 25 points , 6 assists and 1 steal . Jusuf_Nurkic tallied 23 points , 7 boards , 4 assists and 2 steals . CJ_McCollum took on a less pronounced role in the offense with Damian_Lillard 's return but still supplied 19 points , 5 boards and 4 assists . Evan_Turner filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . Al-Farouq_Aminu mustered a modest 5 points but also brought down 9 rebounds , dished out 2 assists and recorded 1 steal . Noah_Vonleh led the reserves with 6 points and added 3 rebounds . LeBron_James led the Cavaliers with 24 points , 8 assists , 6 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 block . Kevin_Love , questionable until earlier in the afternoon with an illness , registered 19 points , 7 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Jae_Crowder tallied 17 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Isaiah_Thomas led the bench with his aforementioned scoring total , while Dwyane_Wade ( 15 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists ) and Jeff_Green ( 10 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 steals ) were productive off the second unit as well .

The Detroit Pistons defeated the Houston Rockets , 108 - 101 , at Little Caesars Arena on Saturday evening . The hard - fought contest featured a first half in which both clubs matched each other virtually basket for basket , leading to a slim 58 - 57 halftime advantage for the Rockets ( 27 - 11 ) . However , the third quarter is when the Pistons ( 21 - 17 ) managed to distance themselves , as Detroit racked up 31 points while limiting Houston to a modest 19 . That enabled them to enter the final 12 minutes with a relatively comfortable 88 - 77 advantage , which allowed them to withstand a strong 24 - point period by the visitors . Detroit consistently got it done on the offensive end , as evidenced by a 51 percent success rate from the field , including 48 percent from three_point range . Chris_Paul led the way once again for the Rockets , managing a 16 - point , 13 - assist double_double that also included 7 rebounds and 2 steals . Eric_Gordon , Trevor_Ariza and Gerald_Green all followed with 15 - point efforts , with the latter making his contributions from the bench . Eric_Gordon also posted 7 assists and 3 rebounds , Trevor_Ariza provided 4 boards and 1 assist and Gerald_Green added 3 rebounds to his scoring total . Clint_Capela posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 2 blocks . Tarik_Black was productive on the second unit as well with 13 points , 6 rebounds and 1 block . Tobias_Harris paced the Pistons with 27 points , which he supplemented with 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Ish_Smith managed 17 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Dwight_Buycks followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Reggie_Bullock supplied 14 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Avery_Bradley registered 12 points , 3 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal

Milwaukee had to pull off their win in comeback fashion , as they outscored Washington , 28 - 18 , in the fourth quarter . Despite the fact that Milwaukee is the worst rebounding team in the league , they ended up controlling the glass here , outrebounding the Wizards , 45 - 34 . Milwaukee was also much better at taking care of the ball , as they recorded 11 steals , while Washington only mustered up 6 . John_Wall accumulated 16 points , 3 rebounds and 16 assists , Marcin_Gortat totaled 17 points , 7 rebounds and 3 blocks . Markieff_Morris provided 14 points and 10 rebounds .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Denver Nuggets , 106 - 98 , at Golden_One_Center on Saturday . The Kings ( 13 - 25 ) had been slipping a bit recently , having gone just 1 - 3 through the first 4 games of their current home stand . De'Aaron_Fox led the team with 18 points and 7 assists . One of those players , Willie_Cauley-Stein , had 17 points and was a major factor on the defensive end . Willie_Cauley-Stein came away with 7 steals , a new career high and the most by any Sacramento player this season . Three different Nuggets starters - Nikola_Jokic , Jamal_Murray , and Wilson_Chandler - committed 5 turnovers on the night . Nikola_Jokic , Denver 's star center , had an interesting night , as he led the team with 10 assists but struggled to crash the glass or find his shot . He went just 3 - of - 10 from the field en route to 8 points and had only 7 rebounds .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 111 - 110 , at Moda_Center on Sunday evening . The second quarter was tight as well but the Spurs pulled away towards the end to take a 53 - 48 lead at halftime . CJ_McCollum led the way for Portland with 25 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , in 38 minutes . Jusuf_Nurkic added 17 points and 13 rebounds , while Maurice_Harkless tallied 19 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Evan_Turner finished with 8 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting , in 24 minutes , and Shabazz_Napier added 15 points , 7 assists and 5 rebounds . The Trail_Blazers shot 52 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , LaMarcus_Aldridge led the Spurs with 30 points and 14 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Pau_Gasol tallied 16 points . Manu_Ginobili came up big with 26 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 49 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 23 from long range .

The Raptors always seemed to be in control , but the Nets found a way to respond time and time again , including on a 36 - 29 fourth - period lead that sent the game to OT . Joe_Harris chipped in with 12 points .
The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 114 - 106 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . Indiana ( 21 - 10 ) tried to fight back after they quickly fell to a 12 - point hole after the first quarter and they made things complicated at times for Miami , but the Heat managed to hold on to their advantage and secured another win that continues their surge in the Eastern_Conference standings . Hassan_Whiteside posted a strong double_double of 16 points , 15 rebounds , and 4 blocks . Josh_Richardson chipped in with 14 points , and Kelly_Olynyk added 11 of his own . The bench produced as well , as the trio of Wayne_Ellington , Bam_Adebayo and Tyler_Johnson all contributed with 15 points . Domantas_Sabonis contributed with 18 points , and Thaddeus_Young added 12 points with 9 rebounds . Bojan_Bogdanovic had 15 points and 6 rebounds , and Lance_Stephenson added 15 points coming off the bench .

The Jazz ( 17 - 24 ) came into the contest facing relatively steep odds of a win , considering they 'd notched only 3 road victories in 20 tries and the Wizards ( 23 - 18 ) owned a solid 13 - 7 mark at home . Matters looked even bleaker after Washington jumped out to a 32 - 25 lead after the first quarter . Both teams shot notably well , with the visitors posting a 47 percent success rate from the floor and the Wizards countering with an even more impressive 53 percent mark , including 40 percent from three_point range . Joel_Embiid led the way with a monster double_double of 29 points and 14 rebounds in 38 minutes .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 124 - 108 , at Moda_Center on Wednesday . CJ_McCollum set a new franchise record with 28 points in the first quarter alone , finishing with 50 points overall . Thanks to CJ_McCollum 's historic contribution , the Trail_Blazers finished the first quarter with a massive 22 - point lead . CJ_McCollum seemingly could not miss on Wednesday , as he went 18 - of - 25 from the field . He was the driving force of a strong Trail_Blazers offense , which shot 56 percent from the field in the game . Damian_Lillard scored 13 points , but took only 9 shots as CJ_McCollum was able to take the reigns to the offense in the blowout win . Zach_LaVine led the team with 23 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting
The Phoenix Suns took down the Dallas Mavericks , 102 - 88 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . While Phoenix ( 18 - 34 ) earned a much_needed quality win , the story of the game was centered around a gruesome lower leg injury to 1 of the Suns ' players . Isaiah_Canaan was eventually helped off the floor and exited the game after only 5 minutes of play . Rookie forward Josh_Jackson continued his strong stretch of recent play , leading the team with 21 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . The Mavericks were also led by a rookie , as Dennis_Smith_Jr. scored a team - high 17 points in the loss .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 130 - 105 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Friday . That allowed them to take 99 shots while the Trail_Blazers took only 73 shot attempts . Bench production was also a huge difference , with Toronto outscoring Portland 's bench , 53 - 25 . The Trail_Blazers ( 29 - 23 ) were led by Damian_Lillard , as he tallied 32 points , 3 rebounds and 10 assists on 11 - of - 18 from the field , CJ_McCollum amassed 21 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Jusuf_Nurkic accrued 20 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists on 8 - of - 11 shooting . The Raptors ( 35 - 16 ) got a gem out of DeMar_DeRozan , as he collected 35 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists . Jonas_Valanciunas amassed 18 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists . Kyle_Lowry accumulated 15 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the host Sacramento Kings , 119 - 104 , at Golden_One_Center on Friday . The Kings ( 16 - 35 ) remained within single digits of the defending champions for the majority of the game , and trailed by just 1 point with 7 minutes left in regulation . Kevin_Durant had 10 consecutive points for the Warriors ( 41 - 11 ) , including 2 big three_pointers to help the team reclaim a double_digit lead . Golden_State scored 20 points in total in the final 7 minutes of the game , helping to open up a commanding lead on the Kings ' home court . Kevin_Durant finished the game with a team - high 33 points , which came on 12 - of - 17 shooting . Stephen_Curry had 23 points , while Klay_Thompson added another 20 . Veteran Zach_Randolph led the team with 18 points and 7 rebounds . Rookie forward Justin_Jackson added another 17 , shooting 7 - of - 13 on the night .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Orlando Magic , 115 - 98 , at Amway_Center on Saturday . A 31 - 22 third quarter was the difference , as Orlando never got the game within 15 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Ball movement was the difference in the game , with the Wizards recording 35 assists and Orlando handing out just 17 dimes . That led to Washington shooting 54 percent from the field and Orlando hitting just 44 percent of their shots . The Magic ( 15 - 36 ) had no player surpass 15 points scored , as Jonathon_Simmons led the starters with 15 points , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . Elfrid_Payton accrued 14 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists . Mario_Hezonja led the bench with 15 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steals . The Wizards ( 30 - 22 ) were led by Otto_Porter , as he tallied 20 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists . Tomas_Satoransky totaled 19 points , 3 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals . Bradley_Beal accumulated 18 points , 8 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals . Markieff_Morris amassed 16 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals .
The Dallas Mavericks took down the host Sacramento Kings , 106 - 99 , at Golden_One_Center on Saturday . While Yogi_Ferrell finished with just 11 points , the bulk of those came in rapid succession , as he knocked down 3 straight three_pointers to fuel a game - winning final push for the Mavs . The team outscored Sacramento by 11 points in the fourth , helping to push them over the edge to victory . It was a balanced approach in the win for Dallas ( 17 - 36 ) , as 6 players scored in double_digit . The team 's high scorer was Harrison_Barnes , who scored 18 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Rookie point guard Dennis_Smith_Jr. also had a solid game , scoring 12 points to go with 5 rebounds and 5 assists . The team attempted only 6 free_throws in the game , compared to 14 for Dallas . Rookie De'Aaron_Fox led the team with 15 points and also came away with 3 steals .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 109 - 94 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Bucks ( 29 - 23 ) came into Sunday 's game sporting a clear advantage on paper , and they appeared seemingly ready to validate it by taking a 36 - 22 first - quarter lead . Their edge had grown to 62 - 41 by intermission , a margin that strongly hinted at a runaway road win . However , the Nets ( 19 - 35 ) came out of the halftime locker room playing with some pride , racking up 31 points in the third period while limiting their visitors to 21 . That brief surge ultimately was n't enough , though , as Milwaukee prevented Brooklyn from narrowing their deficit beyond 7 points . As has been the case with many of the Nets ' opponents , the Bucks thrived on the glass , outrebounding their hosts by a sizable 54 - 36 margin . They also were sharp from the field , as evidenced by a 52 percent success rate overall , including a solid 42 percent from behind the arc . Eric_Bledsoe led the way for the Bucks with 28 points on 12 - for - 20 shooting , a total he supplemented with 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . John_Henson followed with a massive 19 - point , 18 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists and 2 blocks . Giannis_Antetokounmpo finished with 16 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block in 28 minutes before being sidelined . Khris_Middleton matched his scoring total and added 4 rebounds and 1 assist . Jabari_Parker was once again successful in his second game back , leading the second unit with 11 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Tony_Snell was held scoreless over 31 minutes but did pitch in 3 rebounds and 1 block . DeMarre_Carroll and Caris_LeVert co - led the Nets with 15 points apiece . Jarrett_Allen drew another start at center and generated 14 points and 7 rebounds . Allen_Crabbe poured in 11 points and also posted 5 boards . Spencer_Dinwiddie mustered a modest 9 points but dished out 10 assists and recorded 3 steals . Quincy_Acy produced 7 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Joe_Harris was productive off the bench as well with 8 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 101 - 86 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Sunday . In fact , Toronto outscored Memphis , 25 - 12 , in the fourth quarter and 31 - 20 in the second quarter . Defense was key for the Raptors , as they recorded 13 steals and 7 blocks while winning the turnover differential , 19 - 11 . They also held Memphis to just 36 percent from the field while shooting 46 percent on their end . Bench production was also critical , with the Raptors bench outscoring the Grizzlies bench , 52 - 19 . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 34 ) were led by Marc_Gasol , as he tallied 20 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocks . Andrew_Harrison accrued 16 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . The Raptors ( 36 - 16 ) got a gem out of Fred_VanVleet off the bench , as he collected 13 points , 7 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals . Delon_Wright actually led the team in scoring off the bench as well , as he totaled 15 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 steals . DeMar_DeRozan led the starters with 13 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Jons Jonas_Valanciunas totaled 12 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 102 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 31 - 22 ) have somehow managed to continue rolling along despite the absence of John_Wall , as they came into the contest with a perfect 40 record since the All-Star point guard went down to a knee injury . Washington was facing an equally surging team in the Pacers ( 30 - 25 ) on Monday , however , so the battle promised to be a hard - fought 1 . They 'd expanded their advantage to 58 - 49 by halftime , but a short - handed Indiana squad that was missing their starting backcourt of Darren_Collison ( knee ) and Victor_Oladipo ( illness ) continued to battle . Washington got it done with red - hot shooting and strong rebounding , as they tallied a 55 percent success rate from the field and won the battle on the glass by a 43 - 35 margin . Bradley_Beal led the way with 21 points for the Wizards and added 3 assists and 1 rebound . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. followed with a bench - leading 15 points , a total he supplemented with 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Otto_Porter_Jr. collected 13 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds . Ian_Mahinmi was productive on the second unit with 12 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals . Marcin_Gortat and Markieff_Morris produced matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also supplying 9 rebounds and 1 assist and the latter registering 10 boards and a pair of dimes . Mike_Scott poured in 11 of his own while also hauling in 4 boards and dishing out 2 assists . Jodie_Meeks rounded a 50 - point night for the Washington bench with 10 points and 3 assists . Bojan_Bogdanovic continued a recent offensive tear by leading the Pacers with 29 points . He also posted 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steal and 1 block . Domantas_Sabonis accounted for 15 points and added 4 rebounds and 2 assists . Lance_Stephenson drew the start for Oladipo and contributed 13 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals . Cory_Joseph was n't as successful while filling in for Collison , totaling 7 points , 4 assists and 2 rebounds . Both Thaddeus_Young ( 7 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal ) and Myles_Turner ( 6 points , 5 boards and 1 block ) turned in underwhelming efforts .
In a game that may go down as a modern classic , the Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 140 - 138 , in overtime on Wednesday . LeBron_James shot 16 - of - 22 from the field en route to a team - high 37 points . He had a triple_double as well , notching 15 assists and 10 rebounds . Despite his poor season to this point , JR_Smith scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting in Wednesday 's win . Minnesota ( 34 - 23 ) , on the other hand , balanced its attack between its 2 All-Stars . Jimmy_Butler was the team 's leading scorer with 35 points on 14 - of - 21 shooting . Karl-Anthony_Towns , meanwhile , had a ridiculously efficient 10 - of - 12 shooting night . Karl-Anthony_Towns scored 30 points and went a perfect 6 - of - 6 from three_point range

Rodney_Hood followed up with 18 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , while Rudy_Gobert tallied 8 points , 12 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . The Houston Rockets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 100 - 96 , in overtime at Toyota_Center on Thursday evening . However , the Rockets ' 4 - point cushion at the time was enough to withstand the misfires . Blake_Griffin led the way for the Pistons with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound , 10 - assist triple_double . Ish_Smith followed with a bench - leading 18 points , a total he supplemented with 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . Andre_Drummond generated a 17 - point , 20 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Luke_Kennard managed 14 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Reggie_Bullock delivered a full line of 12 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Reggie_Jackson saw a 20 - minute workload , but a 2 - for - 13 effort from the field led to just 4 points , which he complemented with 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Eric_Gordon paced the Rockets with 22 points . He added 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . James_Harden clawed his way to 21 points on sheer volume and a 13 - for - 18 showing from the free_throw line . He also supplied 8 boards , 5 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Joe_Johnson led the bench with 11 points and also tallied 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Clint_Capela generated a 10 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists . PJ_Tucker matched Clint_Capela 's scoring and also hauled in 8 rebounds and dished out 1 assist . Trevor_Ariza contributed 9 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_York Knicks , 108 - 104 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday evening . The Timberwolves ( 42 - 31 ) likely were n't taking anything for granted coming into the matchup , but the Knicks ( 26 - 47 ) probably turned out to be a more formidable opponent than they expected . Karl-Anthony_Towns paced the Timberwolves with 24 points , 13 rebounds , 3 assists , 3 blocks and 1 steal . Taj_Gibson posted 18 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Andrew_Wiggins generated a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 2 steals . Nemanja_Bjelica matched Andrew_Wiggins ' scoring total and added 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Jamal_Crawford tallied a bench - leading 13 points and also supplied 3 assists and 1 rebound . Jeff_Teague pitched in 10 points and 8 assists . Trey_Burke contributed a bench - leading 15 points , which he complemented with 9 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . Frank_Ntilikina pitched in 13 points , 5 boards , 3 assists and 1 steal . Enes_Kanter delivered an 11 - point , 15 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist . Michael_Beasley mustered 8 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 108 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday . The 76ers ( 42 - 30 ) and the Timberwolves ( 42 - 32 ) engaged in a tight battle that saw Philly break free in the first 3 quarters , and even though Minnesota managed to come back in the fourth , they did n't have enough time to change their fate . Philadelphia jumped to a 32 - 24 lead in the first quarter , but the Wolves made it closer with a 28 - 27 second quarter . Ben_Simmons led the way for the Sixers after notching another triple_double of 15 points , 13 assists and 12 rebounds . Joel_Embiid was the top scorer after finishing with 19 points , 6 boards and 3 blocks , while Dario_Saric added 18 points . Robert_Covington chipped in with 11 points , while Marco_Belinelli contributed 17 points off the bench . Andrew_Wiggins chipped in with 16 points and 8 rebounds . Karl-Anthony_Towns had 15 points with 11 rebounds , and Gorgui_Dieng ended with the same stat line . The bench provided quite a spark for Minnesota in this game , as Jamal_Crawford ( 13 points ) , Tyus_Jones ( 11 points with 6 assists ) and Marcus_Georges-Hunt ( 11 points ) all did a good job off the bench .

Milwaukee built a 27 - 15 in the first quarter , but San_Antonio answered back and the first half finished with 47 - 47 . Giannis_Antetokounmpo was the best player for Milwaukee , as he finished with 25 points , 10 rebounds and 3 assists . John_Henson had 10 points with 6 rebounds and 4 assists , while Jabari_Parker filled the stat sheet off the bench thanks to 8 points , 3 assists , 2 boards and 2 blocks . As it has been the trend all season long , LaMarcus_Aldridge was San_Antonio 's best player since he finished with 34 points and 7 rebounds . Pau_Gasol impressed coming off the bench , since he had 22 points and 13 rebounds , including 7 offensive boards . Danny_Green had 13 points , while Dejounte_Murray contributed 10 points , 9 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .
This was n't too problematic early in the game , as their stifling defense held Indiana ( 44 - 31 ) to just 39 first - half points . Victor_Oladipo had 24 points to lead the team as they steadily gained a lead through the second half . On top of Victor_Oladipo , forwards Bojan_Bogdanovic and Thaddeus_Young added a combined 34 points . The Warriors shot just 41 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 17 from three_point range . Veteran guard Nick_Young was the team 's scoring leader with only 12 points
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 98 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . Los_Angeles ( 40 - 34 ) led by as much as 14 points early on , but Milwaukee ( 39 - 35 ) responded with a major run in the third quarter . Tobias_Harris led the Clippers with 19 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . DeAndre_Jordan added a double_double , scoring 13 points and pulling down 16 rebounds . Khris_Middleton added another 22 points for the Bucks . Khris_Middleton and Giannis_Antetokounmpo accounted for 4 of Milwaukee 's 6 three_pointers , which came on just 6 - of - 23 shooting .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 118 - 101 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . The 76ers got out to a good start , with a 10 - point lead midway through the first quarter , where they went on to outscore the Knicks , 37 - 28 . The Sixers expanded their lead to 15 early in the second quarter , but the Knicks rallied back to tie it up at 56 with just under 3 minutes left in the half , before trailing 67 - 63 at halftime . The Knicks came out strong in the third quarter and kept it close for the first few minutes , however the 76ers took over the remainder of the quarter with a 19 - 8 run , to take a 93 - 80 lead into the fourth . Dario_Saric led the Sixers with 26 points , 14 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals , in 36 minutes . Ben_Simmons finished with 13 points , 10 assists , 8 rebounds and 1 blocks , while JJ_Redick tallied 21 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal . The 76ers shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Michael_Beasley was big for the Knicks , with 22 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . Emmanuel_Mudiay also finished with 22 points , and added 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Enes_Kanter tallied 17 points , 14 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , while Trey_Burke finished with 18 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . The Knicks shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Orlando Magic , 90 - 82 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . As their records clearly imply , the Bulls ( 25 - 51 ) and Magic ( 22 - 53 ) are simply playing out the string on a pair of non - playoff seasons , which theoretically could lead to an interesting dynamic when facing each other . Chicago did pull away in the second to establish a 13 - point halftime lead , but a lopsided third period in which Orlando outscored the visitors by a 25 - 9 margin gave them a three_point lead heading into the final period . However , to their credit , the Bulls flipped the script almost entirely in the fourth , forging a 24 - 13 edge that gave them the 8 - point margin of victory . Poor shooting on the part of both squads ( Bulls- 36 percent / Magic- 33 percent ) led to plenty of rebounding opportunities , and the Magic won the battle on the glass by a 55 - 53 margin . Lauri_Markkanen led the way for the Bulls with 13 points , a total he supplemented with 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Sean_Kilpatrick matched his scoring total off the bench and also delivered 4 boards and 2 assists . Cameron_Payne followed with 11 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 block . Cristiano_Felicio mustered 8 points , 16 rebounds and 1 assist . Justin_Holiday poured in 8 points of his own and also posted 1 rebound , 2 steals and 1 block . Noah_Vonleh followed with 8 points , 11 boards , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Ryan_Arcidiacono tallied 8 points as well , along with 1 assist and 2 steals . Bobby_Portis registered 7 points , 5 rebounds and 2 blocks . Aaron_Gordon paced the Magic with 18 points and also provided 7 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . DJ_Augustin totaled 15 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steal . Nikola_Vucevic accounted for 12 points , 14 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Shelvin_Mack managed 9 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Jamel_Artis went for 8 points and 4 boards . Ricky Rodney_Purvis drew the start and delivered 5 points , 2 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Orlando Magic , 94 - 88 , at Philips_Arena on Sunday . In fact , a 35 - 25 second quarter in advantage of Atlanta really set the tone , as they carried a 13 - point lead into the half and never trailed in the second half . The shooting disparity was critical , as Atlanta shot 48 percent from the field while holding Orlando to just 34 percent . Rebounding was also huge , with the Hawks winning that battle , 52 - 41 . Ball movement was also a huge factor , with Atlanta recording 33 assists and Orlando handing out just 19 . The Hawks won despite attempting just 1 free_throw attempt , the lowest total from any team all season . The Magic ( 22 - 54 ) were led by DJ_Augustin , as he tallied 20 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists . Nikola_Vucevic went just 3 - of - 19 from the field but still finished with 10 points , 14 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 blocks . Aaron_Gordon amassed 10 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists . The Hawks ( 22 - 55 ) were led by Dewayne_Dedmon , as he accrued 17 points , 10 rebounds and 3 assists . John_Collins generated 10 points , 11 rebounds and 2 blocks . Tyler_Dorsey led the bench with 19 points and 2 assists . Mike_Muscala provided 13 points , 10 rebounds and 3 assists off the bench as well .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 111 - 107 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Tuesday evening . They held the lead through the entire first quarter and took a 27 - 24 lead into the second quarter . The Warriors turned it on in the second , as they started the quarter with a 7 - 1 run and stayed in control the rest of the way until they led 57 - 47 by halftime . The Warriors maintained a double_digit lead for the first half of the third quarter , but the Thunder came back and took a momentary lead before they trailed 84 - 81 entering the fourth . Kevin_Durant led the way for the Warriors with 34 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 36 minutes . Kay Klay_Thompson followed up with 20 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals , while Quinn_Cook chipped in 12 points , 6 assists and 3 rebounds . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Russell_Westbrook led the Thunder with 44 points , 16 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals , in 41 minutes . Paul_George finished with 20 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists , while Carmelo_Anthony added 12 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists . The Thunder shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 38 from long range .

The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 115 - 86 , at Philips_Arena on Wednesday evening . Matters seemingly played out that way in the first quarter , with Atlanta taking a 29 - 23 lead in the first 12 minutes . However , it was all Heat from that point forward , as they hit or eclipsed 30 points in each of the last 3 periods while allowing their hosts no more than 21 points in any 1 quarter . The disparity lead to a comfortable and runaway victory for Miami , which produced identical 45 percent tallies from the floor and three_point range . Josh_Richardson and Kelly_Olynyk led the way for the Heat with matching 19 - point efforts , with the latter notably notching 15 of his on 5 three_pointers in the second quarter . Josh_Richardson added 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 4 blocks and 3 steals , while Kelly_Olynyk also supplied 8 rebounds and 5 assists . Justise_Winslow turned in 18 points , 5 assists and 1 rebound . Rodney_McGruder drew the start at shooting guard with Tyler_Johnson sliding over to point guard in Dragic 's place , and he produced 14 points , 2 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Wayne_Ellington poured in 11 points off the bench and also ripped down 3 rebounds and recorded 1 steal . Derrick_Jones_Jr. went for 10 points , 4 boards and 1 assist . Tyler_Johnson collected just 6 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block over 23 minutes . Hassan_Whiteside totaled a modest 4 points but did haul in 13 rebounds , dish out 2 assists and post 3 blocks . Taurean Price paced the Hawks with 20 points , a total he supplemented with 4 assists , 2 rebound and 0 steal . Damion_Lee delivered 15 points , 4 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Tyler_Dorsey matched Damion_Lee 's scoring total while leading the bench and also offered 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals . John_Collins managed a full line of 9 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block . Dewayne_Dedmon pitched in 6 points , 8 boards and 2 assists .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Orlando Magic , 137 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Friday . The Hornets ( 35 - 45 ) had 1 of their best scoring performances of the season and even though they are solely playing for their pride , it is clear that Charlotte has some nice pieces going forward . This time , they outplayed the Magic ( 24 - 55 ) right from the start of the game , and jumped to an 18 - point lead after the first quarter . Charlotte never looked back and in fact they were so dominant that they managed to win all 4 quarters separatedly : 43 - 25 , 29 - 24 , 31 - 26 and 34 - 25 . Dwight_Howard has been a beast on the paint of late , and once again delivered a great performance of 16 points , 17 rebounds and 4 blocks , so he made his presence felt on both ends of the court , Kemba_Walker had 13 points and 4 assists , while Marvin_Williams added 18 points . The Pelicans ( 46 - 34 ) established themselves early , scoring 40 first - quarter points and taking an early 8 - point lead . Anthony_Davis led the Pelicans with 34 points and 12 rebounds , padding his stellar season averages of 28 points and 12 rebounds per game . Veteran point guard Rajon_Rondo dished out a whopping 17 assists while also scoring 12 points . Kevin_Durant , meanwhile , was the Warriors ' offensive leader , scoring a team - high 41 points despite the loss . Kevin_Durant also grabbed 10 rebounds , as did fellow All-Star forward Draymond_Green , who added 11 points and 9 assists . Guard Quinn_Cook scored another 21 points and dished out 7 assists .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 119 - 93 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Hornets ( 36 - 46 ) were already out of the postseason and the Pacers ( 48 - 34 ) had locked up their seed in the Eastern_Conference , so this game had nothing but pride at stake for both franchises . Charlotte started this game with a chip on their shoulder , however , and quickly jumped to a 37 - 25 lead in the first quarter . Indiana pulled back in the second quarter ( 26 - 30 ) and made things close entering the second half , but the Hornets pulled away and won the final 2 quarters , 24 - 16 and 32 - 22 , to end the regular season on a strong note . Frank_Kaminsky was the best player for the Hornets in this game , as he finished with 24 points and 7 rebounds while coming off the bench . Malik_Monk also thrived as a substitute , as he contributed 17 points on 25 minutes . Kemba_Walker and Marvin_Williams each finished with 15 points , while Dwight_Howard and Nicolas_Batum had 14 points . Dwight_Howard also added 17 rebounds . Al_Jefferson registered 12 points , while Domantas_Sabonis came off the bench and finished with 10 points and 10 boards in 16 minutes .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 110 - 97 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 55 - 27 ) managed to secure a huge win over the Nets ( 28 - 54 ) as they managed to finish their regular - season campaign on a strong note , and it seems they are ready to take on a postseason path where they appear as 1 of the favorites to make a deep run in the Eastern_Conference . The Celtics quickly jumped ahead to a 27 - 22 lead in the first quarter , and they extended it both in the second ( 26 - 21 ) and the third quarter ( 30 - 27 ) , so they looked set to close things out with ease . The final 12 minutes of action ended 27 - 27 , so Boston closed things out with a huge 110 - 97 victory that should have them heading into the playoffs riding high on confidence . Aron_Baynes was the best player for the Celtics since he finished with a strong double_double 26 points and 14 rebounds . Guerschon_Yabusele finished with 16 points , 5 rebounds , and 2 steals . Shane_Larkin came close to a triple_double since he had 12 points , 10 rebounds , and 7 assists . Jonathan_Gibson added 18 points off the bench . D'Angelo_Russell finished with 11 points and 3 assists . Caris_LeVert contributed 11 points , 6 assists , and 3 steals . Jarrett_Allen chipped in with 10 points and 7 rebounds while only playing 19 minutes .
Willie_Cauley-Stein led Sacramento with 22 points and 11 rebounds . Buddy_Hield was the top scorer off the bench , finishing with 14 points as well as 5 rebounds and 5 assists . The Rockets , meanwhile , were led by 31 points from Gerald_Green . RJ_Hunter added another 19 points for the Rockets while receiving a spot in the starting lineup .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 97 - 95 , in Game 1 of the Western_Conference first - round playoffs at Mod Center on Saturday . Defense was key for New_Orleans , as they recorded 12 blocks and forced Portland to shoot just 38 percent from the field and 31 percent from three_point range . The Pelicans ended up hitting 48 percent from the field and 33 percent from long range . Ball movement was a huge part of that , with the Pelicans out - assisting the Trail_Blazers , 26 - 17 . The Pelicans ( 10 ) got yet another gem out of Anthony_Davis , as he collected 35 points , 14 rebounds , 2 steals and 4 blocks . Jrue_Holiday accrued 21 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Nikola_Mirotic accumulated 16 points , 11 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 4 blocks . Rajon_Rondo provided 6 points , 8 rebounds and 17 assists . The Trail_Blazers ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Damian_Lillard , as he tallied 18 points , 7 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 steals , but went just 6 - of - 23 from the field . CJ_McCollum amassed 19 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . Jusuf_Nurkic totaled 11 points , 11 rebounds and 2 blocks . Ed_Davis led the team in rebounding , grabbing 13 boards off of the bench .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 98 - 80 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday afternoon in Game 1 of their Eastern_Conference first - round playoff series . Indiana jumped out to a jaw - dropping 33 - 14 first - quarter lead , with a 29 - 10 run over the final 8:36 of the period playing a pivotal role . The Cavaliers ( 0 - 1 ) made it a game through the middle periods , chipping away at their deficit and getting as close as 76 - 69 with 10:29 remaining after a LeBron_James driving layup . Victor_Oladipo spearheaded the momentous win , scoring a game - high 32 points on 11 - for - 19 shooting , including 6 - for - 9 from three_point range . The Pacers ' defensive effort was key as well , as they limited Cleveland to 38 percent shooting , including 24 percent from behind the arc . Victor_Oladipo added 6 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 steals and 1 block to his aforementioned scoring tally . Myles_Turner provided 16 points , 8 boards , 2 assists and 1 block . Bojan_Bogdanovic poured in 15 points and also ripped down 6 boards , dished out 1 assist and recorded 3 steals . Lance_Stephenson led the bench with 12 points and also posted 5 rebounds . Thaddeus_Young took only 4 shots on his way to 7 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Darren_Collison struggled from the field ( 2 - 9 FG ) and finished with 6 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals . LeBron_James paced the Cavaliers with a 24 - point , 12 - assist , 10 - rebound triple_double that also included 1 steal and 1 block . JR_Smith registered 15 points in 29 minutes off the bench and also collected 2 rebounds and 1 assist . Larry_Nance_Jr. totaled 10 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Kevin_Love generated 9 points , 17 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Rodney_Hood matched Kevin_Love 's scoring total and also accounted for 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Miami Heat , 106 - 102 , at American_Airlines_Arena in Game 4 of their Eastern_Conference first - round playoff series . The Sixers ( 3 - 1 ) and the Heat ( 1 - 3 ) played a back - and - forth game that included fights , pushovers , a triple_double and several individual performances worth highlighting . The first quarter was quite tight , however , and it ended with a 26 - 26 draw , but Miami grabbed a 5 - point advantage heading into the break . Philadelphia reduced the margin to 4 points after 3 , but they pulled away for good in the fourth quarter . Their 27 - 19 edge during the final 12 minutes was enough to give them a huge win and a commanding 3 - 1 lead in the series . Ben_Simmons was the star of the game for the Sixers , as he finished with the first triple_double of his playoff career thanks to 17 points , 13 rebounds and 10 assists . Joel_Embiid had 14 points , 12 rebounds and 5 blocks , but also committed 8 turnovers . JJ_Redick was the team 's top scorer with 24 points , and Dario_Saric added 11 points with 8 rebounds . Marco_Belinelli and Ersan_Ilyasova each added 10 points off the bench . Dwyane_Wade was the best player for the Heat since he finished with 25 points coming off the bench . Goran_Dragic added 20 points with 4 steals and 3 assists . Hassan_Whiteside registered a double_double thanks to 13 points and 13 rebounds . James_Johnson filled the stat sheet thanks to 15 points , 8 rebounds , and 5 assists .

The Pelicans ( 40 ) figured they 'd be in for a wire - to - wire battle against a desperate Trail_Blazers ( 0 - 4 ) team trying to stave off elimination , and that 's precisely what played out in a matchup between the 2 offensive ly potent units . After New_Orleans forged a slim 58 - 56 advantage at halftime , they managed to gain some separation in the third quarter by racking up an impressive 42 points . As the robust final score implied , both teams shot especially well , with the Trail_Blazers posting a 53 percent success rate from the field and the Pelicans countering by draining 58 percent of their attempts . CJ_McCollum led the way for the Trail_Blazers with 38 points , and he added 3 assists and 2 rebounds . Evan_Turner toughed out his toe injury to post 15 points , 5 assists and 1 rebound . The Magic won despite being dominated in shooting , as Orlando shot just 45 percent from the field and 32 percent from three_point range while Cleveland hit 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from long range . The Cavaliers ( 1 - 9 ) were led by George_Hill , as he tallied 22 points , 4 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals . Tristan_Thompson amassed 19 points , 16 rebounds and 4 assists . Cedi_Osman totaled 11 points and 10 boards . JR_Smith and Jordan_Clarkson scored 14 points apiece to lead the bench . The Magic ( 4 - 6 ) were led by Aaron_Gordon , as he accrued 23 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists . Evan_Fournier collected 15 points , 5 assists and 3 steals to go along with his game_winner . Nikola_Vucevic accumulated 14 points , 10 rebounds and 2 blocks . Terrence_Ross led the bench with 15 points and 2 boards .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 115 - 107 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday evening . Both teams came out strong in the third , as they went back - and - forth to keep the score within 1 or 2 possessions , however , the Nuggets took over in the final minutes , where they outscored the Celtics 11 - 4 , to take a 7 - point lead into the fourth . The Nuggets did not look back from there , as they managed to stay 1 step ahead throughout the fourth , to earn their fifth straight win , and move to 60 at home . Jamal_Murray went off for a career - high 48 points on 19 - of - 30 shooting , in 38 minutes , to lead the Nuggets . Gary_Harris and Trey_Lyles chipped in 13 points each , while Nikola_Jokic tallied 8 points , 10 rebounds and 8 assists . The Nuggets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie_Irving led the Celtics with 31 points on 13 - of - 17 shooting , 5 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals and 1 block , in 34 minutes . Jayson_Tatum and Jaylen_Brown tallied 15 points each , while Al_Horford finished with 12 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal , in 33 minutes . The Celtics shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from deep .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 102 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets ( 6 - 5 ) and the Hawks ( 3 - 7 ) locked horns for the first time this season and while the Hawks looked surprisingly good during the first 2 quarters , eventually the Hornets tightened things up on defense and that was enough to give them their sixth win of the 2018 - 19 season , while moving them up 1 game over .500 . Atlanta jumped to a 25 - 23 lead after the first quarter and finished the first half on top by three_points ( 54 - 51 ) , but the Hornets delivered an impressive second - half effort to secure a strong win in front of their crowd . A 30 - 23 third quarter put Charlotte up by 4 heading into the final 12 minutes of action , and they did n't look back since a 32 - 25 win during the final 12 minutes was enough to close the game out with ease . Kemba_Walker was the biggest scoring threat for the Hornets in this game since he finished with 29 points , but he also added 7 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals . Marvin_Williams contributed with 20 points and 8 boards , Jeremy_Lamb added 13 points , and Nicolas_Batum filled the stat sheet with 10 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists . Malik_Monk chipped in with 13 points and 6 assists coming off the bench . Jeremy_Lin led all Hawks in this game with 19 points coming off the bench , and he also added 2 assists and 2 steals in only 18 minutes of action . Trae_Young had a double_double of 18 points and 10 assists , but he went 0 - for - 7 from three_point range . Kent_Bazemore contributed with 16 points and Alex_Len added 12 with 3 boards .
The visiting Toronto Raptors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 105 , at Golden_One_Center on Wednesday evening . Toronto ( 11 - 1 ) continued its early_season roll on Wednesday , comfortably defeating the Kings ( 6 - 5 ) in Sacramento . Kawhi_Leonard took some time to find his groove in Wednesday 's win , but still managed to lead the team with 25 points . He added 11 rebounds in what was a relatively smooth win for the Raptors . All-Star point guard Kyle_Lowry had another strong showing , finishing with 16 points and 8 assists in the win . Serge_Ibaka shot 6 - of - 10 , blocked 3 shots , and had a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double_double . In sum , the Raptors were firing on all cylinders , knocking down 11 three_pointers and shooting a comfortable 46 percent from the floor in the win . Sacramento was led by 24 points from big man Willie_Cauley-Stein . Willie_Cauley-Stein added 8 rebounds and 4 assists . De'Aaron_Fox scored another 20 points , while rookie big man Marvin Bagley added 13 . Despite shooting 48 percent from the field , the Kings could not make it happen from three_point range , where they shot just 8 - of - 23 .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 114 - 110 at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Minnesota entered the half with a 2 point lead , but the Lakers kept within striking distance all second half before taking the lead behind LeBron_James ' leadership . The Lakers ( 5 - 6 ) were given 3 possessions with just under a minute left in the fourth quarter after new addition Tyson_Chandler swatted back 2 rebounds towards LeBron_James after a missed three_pointer from himself and Kyle_Kuzma . Tyson_Chandler , who joined the team this week , made a massive impact with his 8 rebounds . The Timberwolves set a new franchise record with 20 three_pointers , 7 of which came from the 2011 MVP Derrick_Rose . Derrick_Rose has seen a resurgence in his game and scored 31 points 11 - of - 17 shooting . LeBron_James fell 1 assist shy of triple_double after he finished with 24 points , 10 rebounds and 9 assists .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 99 - 98 , at United_Center on Saturday evening . The Bulls got out to a great start at home , as they outscored the Cavs by 14 in the first quarter , to take a 37 - 23 lead into the second . The Cavs answered back in the second quarter though , as they evened things up , by outscoring the Bulls 30 - 16 in the quarter , making it a tie game at 53 , by halftime . Neither team could rebuild their lead , as the game went back - and - forth through the third , until the Bulls emerged with a 2 - point lead heading into the final frame . The Bulls stayed 1 step ahead through the fourth , but the Cavs would not go away and fought their way to make it a 1 - point game with 1:13 left in the game . However , that was the last point that either team would score , as either team failed to execute down the stretch , leaving the Bulls to walk away with the 1 - point win . Zach_LaVine led Chicago with 24 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals , in 39 minutes . Wendell_Carter_Jr. and Ryan_Arcidiacono tallied 15 points each , while Jabari_Parker finished with 13 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . They were even sharper in the second half , outscoring the Kings ( 7 - 6 ) by a 51 - 42 margin on their way to a double_digit win . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 106 - 95 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Saturday evening . The Raptors ( 20 - 4 ) received news earlier in the day that star point guard Kyle_Lowry ( back ) would n't suit up , which meant that the rest of the starting 5 would need to pick up the scoring slack . Toronto scuffled some without Kyle_Lowry in the first half , but they still forged a solid 47 - 40 halftime lead . However , the Cavaliers ( 4 - 18 ) hung around , getting as close as 82 - 75 with 9:9 remaining . Despite being short - handed , the Raptors shot a solid 49 percent while limiting Cleveland to a 39 percent success rate . Kawhi_Leonard took the Raptors on his shoulders in Kyle_Lowry 's absence , leading the way with 34 points and adding 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Danny_Green supplied 15 points , 7 rebounds and 2 blocks . Fred_VanVleet drew the start for Kyle_Lowry and also posted 15 points , adding 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Pascal_Siakam matched Fred_VanVleet 's scoring total and also offered 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Serge_Ibaka contributed 10 points and 6 boards . Tristan_Thompson and Jordan_Clarkson co - led the Cavaliers with 18 points apiece . Tristan_Thompson added 19 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Jordan_Clarkson hauled in 2 rebounds , dished out 2 assists and recorded 1 steal . Rodney_Hood and Alec_Burks followed with matching 13 - point tallies . Cedi_Osman totaled 12 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Collin_Sexton registered 10 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists .

Portland ( 13 - 10 ) entered the fourth quarter down 97 - 90 , but CJ_McCollum drained a three_pointer right out the gate to pull within 4 . Derrick_White found a clutch rhythm off the bench and knocked down 4 - of - 7 from the field on his way to 10 points , while Patty_Mills added 15 points in 25 minutes . Damian_Lillard led all scorers with 37 points , to go with 10 assists and 2 steals . CJ_McCollum added 24 points and Al-Farouq_Aminu pitched in 20 points and 9 boards .

The Kings went back to work in the third quarter , as they quickly opened up a 9 - point lead , and held on to outscore the Cavs , 30 - 23 , to take a , 96 - 89 , lead entering the final frame . De'Aaron_Fox led Sacramento with 30 points , 12 assists , 3 steals and 2 rebounds , in 29 minutes . It 's not like they rebounded in the second half though , as Boston outscored Chicago , 69 - 34 . In fact , they held the Bulls to 38 percent from the field and 25 percent from three_point range while winning the turnover differential , 15 - 7 . In addition , Boston outrebounded Chicago , 54 - 37 , while connecting on 54 percent from the field and 51 percent from long range . The Celtics also out - assisted the Bulls , 34 - 16 , and won the steals differential , 10 - 3 . The Celtics ( 15 - 10 ) had 7 players reach double_figures in scoring , as Jaylen_Brown led the team with 23 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals off the bench . Shaquille_Harrison led the team in scoring , providing 20 points off the bench . Cameron_Payne accrued 10 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists off the bench as well .

The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 122 - 113 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday . The final score certainly indicates that the game was a lot closer than it actually was , as the Thunder ( 17 - 8 ) were in full control from start to finish en route to their fifth win in the last 6 games . Paul_George 's impressive stretch continued , as the swingman scored a game - high 31 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting from the field in just 30 minutes . Russell_Westbrook struggled mightily from the field , going just 4 - of - 18 and scoring 12 points , but 11 rebounds and 10 assists gave the point guard yet another triple_double . Dennis_Schroder , however , made up for Russell_Westbrook 's struggles in a big way , coming off the bench to score 23 points in 30 minutes . They had 6 different players score in double_figures , but Donovan_Mitchell scored just 19 points to lead Utah in scoring . Rudy_Gobert added a double_double of 13 points and 14 rebounds , but for the most part , Utah 's starters were a no - show Monday night . As a team , the Jazz shot a solid 51 percent from the field , but they could n't get anything going from behind the arc , going just 8 - of - 29 from long range .
