The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 115 - 102 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday . Their offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 59 percent from the field and 40 percent from three_point range while recording 34 assists . Rim protection was also critical , with the Celtics out - blocking the T'Wolves , 7 - 2 . Bench production ca n't be overlooked either , with the Celtics outscoring the Timberwolves bench , 62 - 18 . The Timberwolves ( 17 - 21 ) got another spectacular performance from Karl-Anthony_Towns , as he collected 28 points , 12 rebounds and 7 assists . Andrew_Wiggins was just as good , as he scored a season - high 31 points to go along with 2 rebounds and 3 assists . Tyus_Jones got another start and tallied 14 points , 9 assists and 4 steals . In fact , Gordon_Hayward went 14 - of - 18 from the field to lead the bench with 35 points and 5 assists . Terry_Rozier got a rare start and totaled 16 points , 3 rebounds , 5 assists and 5 steals . Al_Horford accrued 15 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 blocks .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 101 - 94 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies took the upper hand through the second , as they outscored the Pistons by 6 in the quarter , to take a 55 - 51 lead by halftime . However , the Pistons flipped the switch in the third quarter , where they held the Grizzlies to Just 12 points , and pulled ahead to take a 72 - 67 lead into the fourth . Blake_Griffin led the Pistons with 26 points , 8 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 steals , in 39 minutes . Reggie_Jackson followed up with 16 points , 7 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal , while Luke_Kennard and Reggie_Bullock added 13 points each . The Pistons shot 43 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , Jaren_Jackson_Jr. led the Grizzlies with 26 points , 10 rebounds and 2 assists , in 35 minutes . Kyle_Anderson followed up with 15 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , while Marc_Gasol added 11 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . The Grizzlies shot 46 percent from the field , including 4 - of - 18 from deep .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 132 - 127 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday evening . They kept it up in the second , where they outscored the Suns by 11 , to take a 72 - 49 lead into halftime . The Suns came out with a purpose in the third and managed to outscore the visitors by 6 in the quarter , to cut the deficit to 17 by the start of the fourth . Joel_Embiid led the 76ers with a monstrous performance , tallying 42 points , 18 rebounds , 3 steals , 2 blocks and 2 assists , in 36 minutes . Ben_Simmons followed up with 29 points , 7 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 block , while JJ_Redick added 27 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . The Sixers shot 54 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin_Booker led the Suns with 37 points , 8 assists and 2 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Deandre_Ayton tallied 18 points , 11 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals , while Josh_Jackson chipped in 16 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Suns shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 117 - 113 , at Golden_One_Center on Thursday . In fact , Sacrament blew a 13 - point halftime lead , as the Nuggets tied the game with a 31 - 18 third quarter . Rebounding was the difference for Denver , as they outrebounded Sacramento , 54 - 33 . The Nuggets ( 25 - 11 ) were led by Jamal_Murray , as he scored 34 of his 36 points in the second half , adding 7 rebounds and 6 assists to his impressive line . Nikola_Jokic was just as valuable , collecting 26 points , 13 rebounds and 6 assists . Frank_Mason_Plumlee accrued 12 points , 10 rebounds and 4 assists while Gary_Harris led the bench with 14 points and 3 boards . The Kings ( 19 - 19 ) were led by Buddy_Hield , as he tallied 29 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Nemanja_Bjelica amassed 17 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . De'Aaron_Fox finished with 16 points , 2 rebounds and 8 assists while Bogdan_Bogdanovic led the bench with 14 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 135 - 134 , at Oracle_Arena on Thursday evening . The Warriors got out to a great start at home with a 34 - 22 lead after 1 quarter and expanded their lead to 70 - 53 by halftime . The Rockets turned it up in the third quarter and outscored the Warriors by 11 , to cut the deficit to 6 at the start of the fourth . James_Harden led the Rockets with 44 points , 15 assists , 10 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal , in 44 minutes . Clint_Capela followed up with 29 points , 21 rebounds , 2 steals , 1 assist and 1 block , while Austin_Rivers added 18 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 21 - of - 54 from long range . Meanwhile , Stephen_Curry led the Warriors with 35 points , 6 assists and 3 rebounds , in 40 minutes . Kevin_Durant finished with 26 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block , while Klay_Thompson tallied 26 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 119 - 116 , in overtime at United_Center on Friday evening . The Bulls got out to a great start at home with a 30 - 18 lead after 1 quarter . However , the Pacers rallied in the second to cut the deficit to just 4 points by halftime . The third quarter was a bit quieter , as the Pacers outscored the Bulls 21 - 20 in the quarter . Victor_Oladipo led the Pacers with 36 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals and 1 block , in 37 minutes . Domantas_Sabonis came up huge off the bench , with 23 points , 12 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , while Thaddeus_Young finished with 16 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Meanwhile , Zach_LaVine led the Bulls with 31 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals , in 35 minutes . Lauri_Markkanen finished with 27 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , while Wendell_Carter_Jr. added 15 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 3 steals and 1 block .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Orlando Magic , 120 - 103 , at Target_Center on Friday evening . The Magic ( 17 - 21 ) may have caught the host Timberwolves ( 18 - 21 ) a bit by surprise early , as they ambushed them out of the gates to the tune of a 40 - 31 first - quarter lead . That seemed to serve as a wake - up call for Minnesota , however , as they would go on to outscore their visitors by an 89 - 63 margin the rest of the way . Despite the double_digit margin of victory , the T-Wolves clearly dominated in only 1 area , that being rebounding , they won the battle of the boards over Orlando by a 54 - 35 margin . Nikola_Vucevic led the way for the Magic with 22 points , adding 7 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Evan_Fournier followed with 21 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Terrence_Ross followed with a bench - leading 13 points and supplemented them with 2 rebounds and 1 assist . Jonathan_Isaac and Aaron_Gordon turned in 10 points and 3 rebounds apiece , with Aaron_Gordon also dishing out 6 assists . Karl-Anthony_Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 29 - point , 15 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Jeff_Teague managed 23 points , 10 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Andrew_Wiggins poured in 16 points . Taj_Gibson generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double_double . Anthony_Tolliver led the second unit with 11 points and also offered 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Dario_Saric contributed 10 points .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 108 - 88 , at AT_&_T_Center on Saturday night . The Grizzlies ( 16 - 21 ) came out ready to match the Spurs ( 23 - 17 ) basket for basket , and they trailed just 27 - 25 after 1 quarter . However , the game turned in the second , as San_Antonio outscored Memphis by a 37 - 19 margin . Mike_Conley paced the Grizzlies with 21 points , adding 3 assists and 1 rebound . Jaren_Jackson_Jr. followed with 15 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 4 steals . No other Memphis player managed double_digit scoring , but JaMychal_Green supplied 8 points , 10 rebounds and 1 steal off the bench . Kyle_Anderson and Garrett_Temple had 7 points each . Derrick_White paced the Spurs with 19 points and supplemented them with 4 rebounds , 1 blocks and 1 steal . LaMarcus_Aldridge posted 18 points , 7 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . Patty_Mills generated 15 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . DeMar_DeRozan totaled 12 points , 9 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Jakob_Poeltl turned in 11 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 114 - 102 , at Fiserv Forum on Monday . In fact , Milwaukee 's biggest lead was 13 points , as it was within a single - digit margin for the first 45 minutes of action . The Bucks rode a 31 - 16 fourth quarter to that double_digit scoreline , as there were 10 ties and 23 lead changes across the first 3 quarters . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Milwaukee recording 27 assists to 10 turnovers while Utah recorded 20 assists to 15 turnovers . The Bucks ended up shooting 47 percent from the field while holding the Jazz to 42 percent shooting . The Jazz ( 20 - 21 ) were led by Donovan_Mitchell , as he amassed 26 points and 3 rebounds . Rudy_Gobert finished with 14 points , 15 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Derrick_Favors totaled 12 points , 7 rebounds and 3 blocks . Ricky_Rubio left after 5 minutes due to a hamstring injury but scored 9 points . The Bucks ( 28 - 11 ) were led by Giannis_Antetokounmpo , as he collected 30 points , 10 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Malcolm_Brogdon accrued 21 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Brook_Lopez accrued 15 points , 8 rebounds and 3 blocks while Khris_Middleton finished with 14 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists . Thon_Maker led the bench with 15 points , 5 rebounds and 2 steals .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 128 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . Los_Angeles ( 24 - 16 ) hopped out to an early lead , going up by as much as 9 in the first half . While Charlotte ( 19 - 21 ) kept the game close for much of regulation , the Clippers ' offense exploded for 42 fourth - quarter points and a double_digit win . The Clippers finished the night shooting over 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from three_point range . Montrezl_Harrell , the Clippers ' breakout big man , added 11 rebounds and 5 assists . The team also saw an impressive defensive effort from rookie point guard Shai_Gilgeous-Alexander , who grabbed 3 steals and blocked 3 shots in just 21 minutes of play . Shots were n't falling for All-Star guard Kemba_Walker , who went just 6 - of - 18 for 13 points . Sophomore Malik_Monk picked up some of the slack , though , delivering a team - high 24 points off the bench . Ultimately , however , Charlotte 's offense could not match Los_Angeles 's top - notch production , shooting just 40 percent from the field .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 106 , at Capital One Arena on Wednesday night . The Wizards ( 17 - 25 ) were coming off a significant loss to the 76ers ( 27 - 15 ) just 24 hours earlier , but they opened Wednesday 's contest ready to extract some revenge . Washington had forged a 63 - 48 lead by halftime , and they made sure to keep their foot on the gas in the second half . The Wizards also played some impressive defense for a change , forcing 24 turnovers and limiting the Sixers to a 30 percent success rate from three_point range . Joel_Embiid was a bright spot for the 76ers , posting a 35 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists , 3 blocks and 1 steal . Jimmy_Butler provided 23 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Furkan_Korkmaz furnished 16 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Ben_Simmons supplied 15 points , 10 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals . Bradley_Beal paced the Wizards with 34 points , supplementing them with 5 assists , 2 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Otto_Porter_Jr. followed with 23 points , 6 rebounds and 3 steals . Trevor_Ariza delivered 17 points , 5 boards , 1 assist and 2 steals . Sam_Dekker registered 11 points , 2 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 154 - 147 , in double overtime at AT_&_T_Center on Thursday evening . The Spurs got out to a great start at home , with a 33 - 23 lead after 1 quarter . The Thunder chipped away through the second and cut the deficit to 7 by halftime . The Spurs maintained control through the third and pushed their lead to 105 - 93 entering the fourth , but the Thunder would not back down and outscored the Spurs by 12 in the quarter to force OT . The Spurs held on for the impressive home win , mostly thanks to a career - high 56 points from LaMarcus_Aldridge . LaMarcus_Aldridge led the Spurs with 56 points on 20 - of - 33 shooting , in 49 minutes . Derrick_White followed up with 23 points , 8 assists , 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block , while DeMar_DeRozan finished with 16 points , 11 assists , 8 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . The Spurs shot 57 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Russell_Westbrook led the Thunder with 24 points , a career - high 24 assists , 13 rebounds and 2 steals , in 50 minutes . Paul_George followed up with 30 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting , 8 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 assist , in 47 minutes , while Jerami_Grant tallied a career - high 25 points , along with 12 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 assist .

The home squad then managed to hold off the Spurs during the fourth quarter to extract a measure of revenge in the form of the 10 - point win . The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 119 - 114 , at American_Airlines_Center on Sunday night . The Warriors ( 29 - 14 ) knew they were in for an uphill battle against a home - dominant squad in the Mavericks ( 20 - 23 ) , which had notched 16 of their 20 wins coming in at American_Airlines_Center . Accordingly , the defending champs found themselves down by 4 coming out of the first quarter , but they 'd forged a 62 - 54 lead by halftime . However , this was a game that would n't be decided until the final minute , with Golden_State coming back from a 5 - point deficit with 3:51 remaining to finish the contest on an 11 - 1 run . Stephen_Curry was key to both the comeback and the victory overall , as he tallied a game - high 48 points , including the last 7 . Stephen_Curry added 6 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal to his aforementioned scoring haul . Kevin_Durant provided 28 points , 7 boards , 5 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Klay_Thompson mustered 16 points , 4 rebounds and 1 assist . Alfonzo_McKinnie offered 10 points and 5 rebounds . Draymond_Green mustered just 4 points but added 7 assists , 6 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Luka_Doncic led the Mavericks with 26 points and supplemented them with 6 boards , 5 assists and 1 steal . Harrison_Barnes supplied 22 points and 4 rebounds . Deandre DeAndre_Jordan generated a 13 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists . Jalen_Brunson managed 12 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Wesley_Matthews could n't help make up for the absence of Dennis_Smith_Jr ( back ) , managing just 8 points on 3 - for - 11 shooting .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 101 - 95 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . Cleveland ( 9 - 35 ) owns the league 's worst record and had dropped 12 straight heading into Sunday 's matchup . Forward Cedi_Osman showed flashes of the talent he showcased early in the season , scoring a team - high 20 points to lead the Cavaliers . Big man Tristan_Thompson , recently returned from injury , finished with 15 points and 14 rebounds . Nearly matching Tristan_Thompson 's effort on the boards was Alec_Burks , who tallied 13 rebounds to go with 18 points in Sunday 's bounce - back win . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , saw 29 points from sophomore forward Kyle_Kuzma .

It was shaping up to be an easy win for New_Orleans ( 21 - 23 ) , as the team led by as much as 20 points midway through the third quarter . Los_Angeles cut the lead to as little as 2 points by the end of the fourth quarter , thanks in large part to a 13 - 2 run in the third quarter . It was Anthony_Davis 's seventh 40 - point outing of the season . Jrue_Holiday scored 19 points and dished out 8 assists . Julius_Randle , meanwhile , had 27 points and grabbed 6 rebounds . Danilo_Gallinari delivered 25 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , adding 4 rebounds and 6 assists . Bench big man Montrezl_Harrell led the second unit with 26 points and also had 10 rebounds .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 131 - 97 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Tuesday . Indiana came into this game as a huge favorite and a 131 - 97 scoreline vindicates that thought . A 38 - 19 first quarter really set the tone , as the Pacers won in wire - to - wire fashion . In addition , they won the first , third and fourth quarters by at least 11 points apiece . Indiana shot 52 percent from the field , 48 percent from three_point range and 75 percent from the free_throw line while Phoenix hit just 42 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 50 percent from the charity stripe . The Suns ( 11 - 34 ) were led by TJ_Warren , as he amassed 19 points and 4 boards . Devin_Booker returned to provide 8 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . DeAndre Deandre_Ayton totaled 14 points and 8 rebounds while Kelly_Oubre_Jr. led the bench with 16 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists . The Pacers ( 29 - 14 ) were led by Bojan_Bogdanovic , as he tallied 20 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Myles_Turner accrued 18 points , 6 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Darren_Collison finished with 15 points , 4 rebounds , 7 assists and 3 steals . Thaddeus_Young totaled 12 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists while Victor_Oladipo generated 8 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Tyreke_Evans led the bench with 20 points and 4 rebounds .
In a battle of the Western_Conference 's top 2 teams , the Golden_State Warriors took down the Denver Nuggets , 142 - 111 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday . Things got off to a historic start as Golden_State ( 30 - 14 ) scored a whopping 51 first - quarter points . Despite their opponent 's scoring surge , the Nuggets ( 29 - 14 ) held close behind , trailing by only 13 points at the end of the first . Kevin_Durant and the Warriors never slowed down , finishing the night shooting 62 percent from the field and 21 - of - 40 from three_point range . Draymond_Green , meanwhile , scored only 4 points but added 13 assists and 1 steals while committing only 1 turnover . On the other side of the court , it was a fairly pedestrian night for Nikola_Jokic , who tallied just 17 points and 3 rebounds . Denver saw a team - high 22 points from Malik_Beasley , while Jamal_Murray notched another 21 .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New_York Knicks , 101 - 100 , at O2 Arena in London on Thursday . The Wizards ( 19 - 26 ) and the Knicks ( 10 - 34 ) played this game on a neutral arena and there is no doubt they gave fans an unbelieveable showdown that went down to the wire , as this game was decided with a lay - up in the final second of regulation . The Knicks got off to an impressive start , though , winning the first quarter by 10 points ( 30 - 20 ) and extending their lead in the upcoming 2 quarters ( 33 - 33 and 26 - 24 , respectively ) so they entered the final 12 minutes of action up by a considerable 12 - point margin . Six Washington players ended the game scoring over 10 points and Bradley_Beal was the team 's top scorer with 26 points , 9 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . Tomas_Satoransky had 14 points and 5 assists , while Trevor_Ariza filled the stat sheet thanks to 12 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists . Otto_Porter_Jr. had an impressive effort off the bench since he chipped in with 20 points and 11 boards . Emmanuel_Mudiay led the way for the Knicks with 25 points and 7 rebounds . Luke_Kornet chipped in with 16 points and 5 steals , while Noah_Vonleh contributed with a strong double_double of 13 points and 10 rebounds . Allonzo_Trier and Damyean_Dotson each had 13 points coming off the bench . Kevin_Knox was a disappointment , however , as the rookie only had 5 points while shooting 2 - 11 from the field .

The Orlando Magic defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 122 - 103 , at State Farm Arena on Monday . In fact , the Magic won each of the final 3 quarters by at least 6 points apiece , outscoring the Hawks , 94 - 72 . Orlando ended up shooting 50 percent from the field , 38 percent from three_point range and 90 percent from the free_throw line while holding Atlanta to 45 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 70 percent from the charity stripe . Ball movement played a big factor in that , with the Magic out - assisting the Hawks , 29 - 23 . Rim protection was also huge , with Orlando recording 8 blocks and Atlanta picking up just 3 . The Magic ( 20 - 27 ) got another spectacular effort from Nikola_Vucevic , as he tallied 29 points , 14 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Evan_Fournier finished with 29 points , 3 rebounds and 7 assists . DJ_Augustin amassed 15 points and 4 assists while Terrence_Ross led the bench with 16 points , 5 rebounds , 7 assists and 3 steals . John_Collins collected 14 points , 10 rebounds and 3 assists while DeAndre ' DeAndre'_Bembry generated 11 points , 7 assists and 4 steals .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 130 - 111 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . The Warriors ' ( 33 - 14 ) win evened the season series after the Lakers ( 25 - 23 ) trounced them on their home court on Christmas Day . In characteristic fashion , the Warriors blew Monday 's game wide open in the third quarter , where they outscored Los_Angeles 45 - 25 . Golden_State already held a 10 - point halftime advantage , thanks in large part to a white - hot 21 - point first - half from Klay_Thompson . Klay_Thompson in particular remained on fire , knocking down his first 10 three_point attempts in a row . He exited the game with 44 points on 17 - of - 20 shooting . On top of Klay_Thompson 's impressive night , the Warriors saw 20 points from Kevin_Durant , who shot 8 - of - 13 from the field . Stephen_Curry , meanwhile , had an off shooting night , going just 3 - of - 12 from the floor . He did , however , tally 12 assists . Kyle_Kuzma tallied 16 points , while Ivica_Zubac led the team with 18 off the bench .
However , Boston roared back to take control for good in the second and entered intermission with a 65 - 50 lead . While the Cavaliers ( 9 - 40 ) chipped a modest three_points off that advantage in the third , the hosts made sure any thoughts of a comeback were squashed by winning the final period with a commanding 33 - 23 margin . Shooting and opportunistic defense were both key to the wins , as the Celtics drained 52 percent of their attempts and forced 20 turnovers from Cleveland . Cedi_Osman led the way for the Cavaliers with 25 points , adding 8 rebounds and 2 assists . Ante_Zizic produced 19 points and 8 rebounds . Collin_Sexton supplied 16 points , 4 boards and 3 assists . Jordan_Clarkson led the bench with 14 points , while Alec_Burks stuffed the stat sheet with 10 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Terry_Rozier did a fine job filling in for Irving , as he paced the Celtics with 26 points and also contributed 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal . Jaylen_Brown poured in 23 points and added 6 boards and 1 steal . Gordon_Hayward pitched in 18 points , 5 rebounds , 0 assist and 2 steals . Jayson_Tatum registered 17 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Marcus_Morris and Brad_Wanamaker churned out matching 11 - point , 3 - assist tallies .

The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Utah Jazz , 113 - 109 , at staples Center on Sunday evening . It was the second straight win for the Lakers ( 37 - 44 ) against a playoff team , as Los_Angeles managed to upset the Jazz ( 49 - 31 ) despite its slough of injuries . Operating without 4 members of their opening day starting 5 , the Lakers shot over 52 percent against a typically ironclad Utah defense . Los_Angeles was tenacious on the glass , grabbing 16 offensive rebounds and outrebounding Utah 49 - 35 overall . Jemerrio_Jones grabbed 16 rebounds and dished out 5 assists while playing a whopping 38 minutes . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope logged a game - high 42 minutes and scored a team - high 32 points in the win . Los_Angeles also saw 22 points from veteran center JaVale_McGee . Utah was led by 21 points and 10 rebounds from Rudy_Gobert . Donovan_Mitchell scored another 19 points for the Jazz .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 93 , at Little Caesars Arena on Tuesday night . It was therefore rather surprising to see Detroit get off to a poor start , as they were behind by a 32 - 20 margin after 1 quarter and 57 - 38 at halftime . They finally seemed to awaken to the reality of their circumstances coming out of intermission by cutting 4 points in the Grizzlies ' ( 32 - 49 ) advantage during the third quarter , but it was a monumental 21 - 4 run over the first 5:58 of the final period that finally gave them a lead for the first time since 11:44 mark of the first quarter . Although it held Detroit to just 40 percent shooting , Memphis hurt its cause by committing 21 turnovers . Delon_Wright and Bruno_Caboclo co - led the Grizzlies with 15 points , with Delon_Wright notably pulling down 9 rebounds . Tyler_Zeller totaled 13 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . Tyler_Dorsey generated 12 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Ivan_Rabb , Chandler_Parsons and Jevon_Carter had matching 9 - point tallies off the bench . Ish_Smith led the Pistons with 22 points , adding 4 assists and 3 rebounds . Andre_Drummond posted a 20 - point , 17 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 5 steals and 3 blocks . Luke_Kennard contributed 15 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist . Reggie_Jackson supplied 12 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal . Blake_Griffin , whose workload is being managed due to knee soreness , posted just 5 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block while logging 18 minutes .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Washington Wizards , 116 - 110 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 49 - 33 ) and the Wizards ( 32 - 50 ) both played their regular - season finale although both clubs had different objectives in mind , while the Celtics had already clinched a playoff berth and are vying for home - field advantage in the first round of the postseason , Washington has been eliminated from quite a while and only wanted this season to come to an end . The Wizards managed to jump to a 14 - point lead in the first quarter ( 39 - 25 ) but Boston responded with a 38 - 25 second quarter so the Wizards only had a 1 - point lead at the break . It seemed Washington would break free once again following a 31 - 26 third quarter , but Boston won the final 12 minutes by an expressive 27 - 15 and that notched them the win . The Celtics rested several starters for this game and Terry_Rozier was the top scorer since he finished with 21 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists . Semi_Ojeleye had 17 points , 4 boards and 3 assists . Jaylen_Brown contributed with 15 points but also filled the stat sheet with 3 steals , 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Both Brad_Wanamaker and RJ_Hunter had 17 points , although Brad_Wanamaker also added 6 boards and 7 assists . Tomas_Satoransky led the way for the Wizards with 19 points , while Bradley_Beal delivered 16 points , 5 boards and 4 assists . Thomas_Bryant had 14 points with 6 rebounds , and ended with an impressive 22 in 17 minutes . Bobby_Portis had 11 points , while Devin_Robinson contributed 14 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists off the bench .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 120 - 109 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday . In fact , a 33 - 18 first quarter really set the tone , as Phoenix could never get the game within 4 from there . Rebounding was a clear difference , with Dallas outrebounding Phoenix , 64 - 38 . Ball movement was also key , with the Mavericks out - assiting the Suns , 28 - 21 . The Suns ( 19 - 63 ) were led by Jamal_Crawford , as he provided 51 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists off the bench . Josh_Jackson led the starters with 17 points and 8 rebounds . Dragan_Bender totaled 12 points , 11 rebounds and 6 assists . The Mavericks ( 33 - 48 ) were led by Dirk_Nowitzki , as he tallied 30 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists on 31 shots . Luka_Doncic picked up another triple_double , collecting 21 points , 16 rebounds , 11 assists and 3 steals . Dwight_Powell amassed 11 points and 11 boards while Dorian_Finney-Smith led the bench with 15 points and 10 boards .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 118 - 108 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday . Utah shot 53 percent from the field in its final regular season home game of the season . Nikola_Jokic had 2 points on 1 - of - 6 shooting before his early exit . The Jazz were led by a season - high 46 points from sophomore guard Donovan_Mitchell . Donovan_Mitchell shot 14 - of - 26 from the field to lead Utah 's scalding - hot offensive attack . Star big man Rudy_Gobert finished with 20 points and 10 rebounds , while Joe_Ingles recorded another double_double with 10 points and 13 assists . Denver , meanwhile , saw 64 points from its bench unit in the tough loss . Malik_Beasley recorded a team - high 25 points off the bench , while sixth man Monte_Morris pitched in another 22
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 104 - 101 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . Maurice_Harkless came up in the clutch for Portland , scoring the team 's last 10 points , including a game - winning three_pointer with just 1 second remaining . Maurice_Harkless led the Trail_Blazers with 26 points . He was also active on the defensive end , blocking 4 shots . Enes_Kanter contributed a double_double for Portland in the win , finishing with 22 points and 16 rebounds . The Lakers , meanwhile , saw 32 points from Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope . Jemerrio_Jones grabbed 15 rebounds , and all 5 Lakers starters scored in double_figures in the narrow loss .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 111 - 98 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday evening . It was a similar story to Game 2 , as the Trail_Blazers ( 3 - 1 ) relied heavily on their star - studded backcourt to get the job done . The Trail_Blazers held a healthy double_digit lead for much of the third quarter before OKC ( 1 - 3 ) cut the deficit to just 9 points . Superstar point guard Russell_Westbrook struggled once again , shooting just 5 - of - 21 for 14 points . Russell_Westbrook recorded only 1 point in the second half while being outdueled by Damian_Lillard , who poured in 15 third - quarter points . CJ_McCollum led Portland with 27 points , including 5 three_pointers . In total , the Trail_Blazers knocked down 15 three_pointers in the win . For OKC , Paul_George led the way with 32 points and 10 rebounds . It was not enough to get the job done , though , as the Thunder shot a collective 38 percent from the field in Sunday 's loss . Steven_Adams had a rough night , finishing with just 6 points and 7 rebounds .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 122 - 100 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Tuesday night in Game 5 of their Eastern_Conference first - round playoff series . Philadelphia looked like they brought all of that momentum back with them from the Big Apple from the opening tip Tuesday , as they jumped out to a 32 - 15 lead . By piling on another 28 points in the second while holding Brooklyn to 16 , the home squad built a 60 - 31 halftime lead that essentially summed up the game . The Sixers were once again exceedingly sharp from the field , draining 51 percent of ther attempts , including 42 . Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson paced the Nets with 21 points , adding 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 blocks . Caris_LeVert followed with 18 points , adding 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Rodions_Kurucs mustered 14 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Shabazz_Napier generated an 11 - point , 10 - assist double_double that also included 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Joe_Harris poured in 9 points and pulled down 7 rebounds , while Jarrett_Allen and D'Angelo_Russell contributed matching 8 - point tallies . Jarrett_Allen also posted 9 rebounds . Joel_Embiid led the 76ers with a 23 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 1 steal . Ben_Simmons supplied 13 points , 6 assists and 4 rebounds . Tobias_Harris furnished 12 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals . James_Ennis_III and JJ_Redick pitched in 11 points each while Jonathon_Simmons delivered 10 .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 129 - 121 , in Game 5 of the Western_Conference first - round playoffs , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday evening . However , the Warriors managed to keep up and took the lead in the final minutes of the quarter , to take a 4 - point advantage into the second . The Clippers stayed relentless and outscored the Warriors 34 - 22 in the second quarter , to take an 8 point lead into halftime . Lou_Williams went off for the Clippers , with 33 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , 10 assists and 4 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Patrick Beverly had an amazing game as well , with 17 points , 14 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , while Danilo_Gallinari finished with 26 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Montrezl_Harrell came up big with energy plays and major effort , finishing with 24 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block , in 27 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Kevin_Durant led the Warriors with 45 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 41 minutes . Stephen_Curry followed up with 24 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 block , while Klay_Thompson was the only other player to score in double_digit for the Warriors , with 22 points , in 37 minutes .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 108 - 95 , in Game 1 of the Eastern_Conference semi finals , at Scotiabank Arena in Saturday evening . The Raptors got out to a great start at home , with a 39 - 31 lead after 1 quarter . The Sixers picked up the fight int the second but were still outscored by 1 in the quarter , as the Raptors took a 9 - point lead into halftime . The 76ers jumped out to a good start in the third and cut the deficit to 4 , however , the Raptors dug in and pulled back ahead , taking a 92 - 81 lead into the fourth . Kawhi_Leonard led the Raptors with 45 points , 11 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 38 minutes . Pascal_Siakam followed up with 29 points , 7 rebounds and 1 assist , while Kyle_Lowry finished with 9 points , 8 assists , 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . The Raptors shot 52 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 27 from deep . Meanwhile , Tobias_Harris tallied 14 points , 15 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal , in 38 minutes for the 76ers . Joel_Embiid was held to 16 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists , while JJ_Redick added 17 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . The Sixers shot 39 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 32 from long range .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 104 - 100 , in Game 1 of the Western_Conference semi - finals at Oracle_Arena on Sunday . In addition , Golden_State out - assisted the Rockets , 24 - 14 . That allowed Golden_State to shoot 51 percent from the field while holding Houston to just 42 percent from the field . The Rockets ( 0 - 1 ) were led by James_Harden , as he tallied 35 points , 4 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Eric_Gordon totaled 27 points , 4 rebounds and 2 blocks . Chris_Paul finished with 17 points , 3 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals while no other player reached double_figures in scoring . The Warriors ( 10 ) were led by Kevin_Durant , as he accrued 35 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Stephen_Curry amassed 18 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists . Andre_Iguodala started and generated 14 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists while Draymond_Green accumulated 14 points , 9 rebounds and 9 assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Boston Celtics , 123 - 116 , at TD_Garden on Friday night in Game 3 of their Eastern_Conference semi - final round series . The Bucks ( 2 - 1 ) had done an impressive job bouncing back from a relatively shocking Game 1 loss , but they had another challenge in front of them in the form of a road game at raucous TD_Garden . The Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) appeared buoyed by their passionate home crowd to start the game , as they took a 30 - 25 lead through 1 . However , Milwaukee had whittled down their deficit to 1 point by intermission . They then carried that momentum into the third quarter , shifting the dynamic of the contest with a 40 - point tally that gave them an 8 - point lead they would n't relinquish . Giannis Antetokoumpo led the way for the Bucks with 32 points , adding 13 rebounds , 8 assists , 3 blocks and 2 steals . George_Hill turned in a critical performance off the bench , supplying 21 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Khris_Middleton registered 20 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals . Patrick Pat_Connaughton poured in 14 points and added 7 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Nikola_Mirotic turned in 13 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Kyrie_Irving paced the Celtics with 29 points , complementing them with 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals . Jayson_Tatum rebounded from a pair of sub - par games to start the series , delivering 20 points , 11 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals . Jaylen_Brown totaled 18 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Al_Horford collected 17 points , 8 boards and 5 assists . Marcus_Morris netted 16 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets , 118 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Friday night in Game 6 of their Western_Conference semifinal - round playoff series . Despite being down 3 - 2 in the series , the Rockets ( 2 - 4 ) came into the contest with a certain sense of confidence knowing they 'd be facing a short - handed Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) squad on their home court . Houston was able to carve out a 5 - point cushion heading into the fourth , but Stephen_Curry remained hot throughout the second half . The sharpshooter then took over the contest with the defending champs trailing by a 97 - 95 margin and 6:43 remaining , scoring 18 of the Warriors ' final 23 points to help seal the win and a trip to the conference finals . Stephen_Curry 's 33 points led the Warriors . He added 5 rebounds and 4 assists . Klay_Thompson supplied 27 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Andre_Iguodala furnished 17 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 5 steals . Kevon_Looney totaled 14 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Shaun_Livingston poured in 11 points . Draymond_Green mustered 8 points , 10 rebounds , 7 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . James_Harden paced the Rockets with 35 points , complementing them with 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals . Chris_Paul generated a 27 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 6 assists . PJ_Tucker collected 15 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . Clint_Capela contributed a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double_double , while Eric_Gordon and Austin_Rivers had matching 9 - point tallies .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 100 - 96 , in Game 7 of the Western_Conference semi - finals at Pepsi_Center on Sunday . Denver jumped to a quick 29 - 17 lead after the first quarter , but things went downhill for them after that lead . Portland won all of the remaining 3 quarters - 22 - 19 , 32 - 24 and 29 - 24 , respectively - and the Trail_Blazers made big after big shot down the stretch . There 's no question CJ_McCollum was Portland 's best player in this match , since he finished with 37 points to go along with 9 rebounds in 45 minutes of action . Damian_Lillard also played 45 minutes and while he was n't very accurate from the floor ( 3/17 overall ) he still finished with a productive stat line of 13 points , 10 rebounds and 8 assists . Enes_Kanter had 12 points with 12 rebounds . Evan_Turner contributed 14 points off the bench . Nikola_Jokic was Denver 's most productive player since he ended with 29 points and 13 boards . Jamal_Murray had 17 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists , while Gary_Harris added 15 points . Paul_Millsap had 10 points before fouling out late in the fourth quarter
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 118 - 112 , in Game 3 of the Eastern_Conference Finals at Scotia Bank Arena on Sunday . Despite the fact that this game went into overtime , Toronto led for nearly 57 minutes of this 58 - minute game . With that said , there were still 6 ties , with the Raptors never leading by more than 11 points . Free-throw shooting was critical , with the Raptors shooting 81 percent from the charity stripe while the Bucks hit just 67 percent . Toronto also dominated through ball movement , out - assisting Milwaukee , 28 - 22 while also winning the turnover differential , 20 - 17 . The Bucks ( 2 - 1 ) leading scorer came off the bench , with George_Hill leading the way with 24 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists . Brook_Lopez led the starters with 16 points , 6 rebounds and 2 steals . Giannis_Antetokounmpo generated 12 points , 23 rebounds , 7 assists and 4 blocks . Malcolm_Brogdon accumulated 20 points , 5 rebounds and 2 steals off the bench . The Raptors ( 1 - 2 ) were led by Kawhi_Leonard , as he tallied 36 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals in 52 minutes of action . Marc_Gasol collected 16 points , 12 rebounds , 7 assists and 5 blocks . Pascal_Siakam accrued 25 points , 11 rebounds and 3 steals while Norman_Powell led the bench with 19 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Toronto Raptors blew out the Milwaukee Bucks , 120 - 102 , in Game 4 of the Eastern_Conference Finals at Scotiabank Arena on Tuesday . Milwaukee ( 2 - 2 ) got off to a quick start in Tuesday 's crucial Game 4 . The Bucks opened the game on a 12 - 5 run , forcing Nick Nurse to call an early timeout for Toronto ( 2 - 2 ) . Toronto extended its advantage to double_digit by halftime and continued its onslaught in the third quarter , where Kawhi_Leonard scored 11 points to help maintain his team 's hefty lead . Kawhi_Leonard , who delivered 36 points in Toronto 's Game 3 win , finished the game with only 19 points in total . However , he was a menace defensively , grabbing 4 steals and blocking 1 shots en route to the win . Kyle_Lowry led the way with 25 points , while Serge_Ibaka delivered a 17 - point , 13 - rebound double_double off the bench . For the Bucks , All-Stars Giannis_Antetokounmpo and Khris_Middleton combined to supply 55 points . Giannis_Antetokounmpo also tallied 3 blocked shots . No other Bucks player scored more than 11 points in the loss .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 99 , in Game 5 of the Eastern_Conference Finals at Fiserv Forum on Thursday . Toronto actually never relinquished the lead from there , as they won the fourth quarter , 33 - 24 . Bench production was the difference for the Raptors , as their 3 bench players outscored the 5 Bucks bench players , 35 - 15 . The Raptors ( 3 - 2 ) were led by Kawhi_Leonard , as he tallied 35 points , 7 rebounds , 9 assists and 2 steals . Kyle_Lowry finished with 17 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists . Pascal_Siakam accrued 14 points , 13 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 blocks while Fred_VanVleet led the bench with 21 points . The Bucks ( 2 - 3 ) were led by Giannis_Antetokounmpo , as he collected 24 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks . Eric_Bledsoe accumulated 20 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists . Khris_Middleton amassed 6 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists . Malcolm_Brogdon generated 18 points , 11 rebounds and 6 assists .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 118 - 109 , in Game 1 of the NBA_Finals at Scotiabank Arena on Thursday . The key for the Raptors was their shooting , as they shot 51 percent from the field while holding the Warriors to under 44 percent . The Warriors ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Stephen_Curry , as he tallied 34 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Klay_Thompson amassed 21 points and 5 rebounds . Draymond_Green picked up another triple_double , accumulating 10 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists . Andre_Iguodala generated 6 points , 6 rebounds and 7 assists . The Raptors ( 10 ) were led by Pascal_Siakam , as he collected 32 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocks on 14 - of - 17 from the field . Kawhi_Leonard finished with 23 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists . Marc_Gasol totaled 20 points , 7 boards and 2 steals while Fred_VanVleet led the bench with 15 points and 2 assists . Kyle_Lowry accrued 7 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 109 - 104 , in Game 2 of the NBA_Finals , at Scotiabank Arena on Sunday evening . The game got out to a hot start as the 2 teams matched each other well in the first quarter , with Toronto holding a 1 - point lead heading into the second . However , the Warriors made a run to cut it to a 5 - point game by halftime . The Warriors came out on fire to start the third , while the Raptors hit a major lull in their offense , as the Warriors scored 18 points unanswered to take a 13 - point lead by the halfway mark in the quarter . Klay_Thompson led the Warriors with 25 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal , in 32 minutes . Stephen_Curry finished with 23 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals , while DeMarcus_Cousins added 11 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks . The Warriors shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from deep . Meanwhile , Kawhi_Leonard led the Raptors with 34 points , 14 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 39 minutes . Fred_VanVleet followed up with 17 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals , while Kyle_Lowry tallied 13 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal . The Raptors shot 37 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 38 from long range .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Toronto Raptors , 106 - 105 , in Game 5 of the NBA_Finals at Scotiabank Arena on Monday . Kevin_Durant supplied 11 points in 12 minutes before being forced to exit for the remainder of the game . Still , the Warriors were able to carry a 6 - point lead into halftime . Toronto ( 3 - 2 ) was unable to mount a comeback until the fourth quarter , when it reclaimed the lead with just under 5 minutes to go . The lead change was sparked by a 12 - 2 Raptors run in which Kawhi_Leonard scored 10 points . Stephen_Curry finished as the game 's leading scorer , delivering 31 points to go with 7 assists . The Warriors saw another 26 points from Klay_Thompson and a near triple_double from Draymond_Green , who finished with 10 rebounds , 10 points , and 8 assists . On the defensive end , veteran wing Andre_Iguodala made an impact with 4 blocked shots . For the Raptors , Kawhi_Leonard notched a team - high 26 points . Kawhi_Leonard also grabbed 12 rebounds , grabbed 2 steals , and blocked 2 shots . Toronto saw another 18 points and 2 blocks from Kyle_Lowry .
